title: Udemy - Online Courses
description:
Skill up, stand out, and stay ahead - right from your phone. Udemy is where the world builds skills for tomorrow. Our app puts the power of our AI-powered skills development platform in your hands, helping you gain in-demand capabilities to advance your career, stay adaptable, and unlock new opportunities.

Whether you're preparing for your next role in tech, switching careers, or strengthening your core business, leadership or communication skills, Udemy offers dynamic, personalized tools to support continuous upskilling. Personal Plan helps you chart a custom skill-building journey that evolves with your goals, while Career Accelerators provide curated content designed to fast-track progress in high-impact areas. For hands-on development, AI Role Play simulations let you actively practice real-world scenarios like conflict resolution and team collaboration, so you’re not just gaining knowledge, you're building job-ready competencies.

Learn from real-world experts across a wide range of topics, from technology and business to creative thinking and personal development. With AI-driven recommendations, flexible formats, and tools that fit into your workflow, Udemy helps make continuous growth part of your daily life.

Here’s what makes learning with the Udemy app so valuable:

ACCESS OFFLINE: Download tools and content to continue your skill development even when you’re offline

BIG SCREEN COMPATIBILITY: Cast to Chromecast for an enhanced experience

DARK MODE: Stay focused in any lighting environment

SKILL REMINDERS: Stay on track with customized push notifications

NOTES & BOOKMARKS: Capture key insights to retain and revisit essential skills

QUIZZES: Reinforce your progress through quick in-app assessments

Q&A WITH EXPERTS: Get clarity or direction from instructors when you need support

LIFETIME ACCESS: Revisit skill-building resources whenever you need a refresher


Our instructors regularly update their content to reflect evolving tools, technologies, and workforce needs making sure you have the most up-to-date skills to succeed. Investing your time with Udemy is a direct investment in adaptability, career growth and success.

summary: Achieve your goals with online courses in AI, Coding, and more.

scraped_reviews.content: The app hasn't worked for over a year. I'm a long-time Udemy user, and LOVE the service but the app has been crashing for the better part of a year. I'm forced to watch my courses on a computer, because the mobile app crashes after about a minute. It's been this way for way too long with no sign of improvement If you want lessons on the go, don't waste your time
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: A good study resource, but could be great. The only drawback is that headphone pause buttons don't work to pause the videos. This occurs on Samsung S 2x Ultra phones and Galaxy S x tablets that are running the most recent Samung firmware updates. I cannot just tap my airpods or press the button on my sony headphones (also tried skullcandy) when I get an interruption. I'm not sure why this feature that youtube, Hulu, peacock, and others have implemented is lacking in the Udemy app.

The courses that I've taken have been well done, interesting, and thought provoking. Each instructor have presented their course expertly, I've found them to be engaging knowledgeable, and well presented. I'm thrilled to have found this app to help me develop my skills to a higher level, as well as question where I want to take the class info. Do I want to dive deeper into the subject, or was the course enough info to help me navigate within the topic I'm studying. Well done Udemy

I keep having a common issue with Udemy. The App can be useful indeed, IF IT ACTUALLY WORKED HALF THE TIME. Consistently I've had the issue where videos simply won't play no matter what I do. Restarted the device, clear cache, switch devices, change internet connections, restart, restart, restart app. And it STILL won't work. Right now I'm still looking at a spinning circle and its very frustrating. This is why technology sucks and it's time to go back to the old fashion books...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Just like james that just posted on 6/22. I too am not able to log in from my app on my phone. I keep on pressing. my log in? After I enter my email address. Waiting for either it to give me a prompt too. Put a passcode in or my password. It seems to go back-and-forth between the 2 on my app. Usually I stay logged in on my app. But since I was having issues on my browser where my boys were not able to view a couple of videos that I purchased 4 them 4 1 course who should I contact about this ?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Zac, thanks for letting us know about the issue. Please reach out to us through the following link so we can assist you directly: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: They advertise a refund policy, but it doesn't apply to subscriptions. They continue to charge your account, making canceling through the app impossible. This situation often results in hundreds of dollars in charges for a non-refundable subscription. They lack a reputable standing. Be cautious about trusting their classes due to their questionable policies. Their lack of ethics suggests that you might be learning from the wrong company.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is an app? While I like Udemy for courses and the mobile view in the browser works okay, the app is nothing more than a container for the mobile site. Quite literally, if I cover the address bar with my finger, I get the app. There's no point to having it on my phone if there is no real gain, rather than just the same experience as the mobile view.

I hate to give it such a low rating because the content is really good and it's very easy to stream videos. However, they *REALLY* need to work on this app. My biggest complaint is that progress doesn't sync with the app while streaming and if you unlock your mobile device while casting, the player will jump back to whatever video you selected last in the app. *Edit - I have to take this down to one star. It randomly skips videos when casting. I'm uninstalling and casting the web.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Edward,

Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues.

You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information.

Thank you.

Best Regards,

scraped_reviews.content: horrible in airplane mode - The app works fine when you are connected or online. But offline it is horrible. I can't play most of the contents, some courses showed downloaded when online, but when in airplane mode, you can't search for the predownloaded content. The ones that I do see, even though it showed fully downloaded, when I played the video, it would get stuck on certain videos, so you have to skip the whole video. I travel often if not fixed may have to cancel my subscription
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Peter, thanks for reaching out and I’m sorry for the trouble. Please reach out to us through the following link so we can assist you directly: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be one of my favorite learning apps. Ever since the new update or maybe it's the introduction to the monthly plans, I can only view 1 or 2 courses in every category, and there's no longer a way to filter the courses when browsing. Huge downgrade. Barely usable. Maybe it's better on the website, I'll have to look.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thank you for your message. We will be very happy to assist you. Please submit your support request using this link: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

We hope to hear from you soon.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is a bit slow and the sales are completely fake and for marketing only. That said, there are some good courses on here that really should cost more than they do. I've been using it to learn game development and I've made some great progress thanks to the courses I've found on here. Most are around just $15 (and that's the normal price, regardless of whether it says it's on sale). Definitely worth checking out if there's something you want to learn.

This app is frustrating, 1st if you pause a video it will automatically start playing and that is beyond ANNOYING, I'll pause a lecture to go do something and come back and the lessons playing, or I go to sleep and it'll just start playing in the middle of the night. I have to close out the whole app. 2nd offline is borderline pointless, when I download a course it goes through this long loading phase and sometimes want even show the courses until I connect to internet first.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Do not expect this to work. I don't post many reviews. I don't like to waste my time, but for this, I will make time. The app crashes frequently. Sometimes every few minutes and randomly for no reason. Content I own frequently doesn't populate. Downloaded content still needs a network connection to work. I thought I would be able to access downloaded content when I have NO internet connection. Not the case. I can't access the content I paid for without the app. This service is not great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John. Thanks for reaching out. I'm truly sorry to hear you have been having some issues with the mobile app. If possible, please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues like the ones you mentioned. Additionally, you can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Cente...

scraped_reviews.content: This app is in bad shape. MOST OF THE TIME it just freezes and I have to restart it over and over to get it to work. Now it shows me logged into my account but I don't have any courses which is incorrect. Add an uninstall and reinstall to the already lengthy daily task of troubleshooting. Only reason I use this is for the amount of content.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mark, thanks for reaching out and I’m sorry for the trouble. Please reach out to us through the following link so we can assist you directly: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: I am new to Udemy and cannot log into the course (Excel basic) on my laptop. The app sometimes works...and I can see the classes, at times, that are offered, and that I paid for. Unfortunately most of the time, I am unable to see or get into the classes. Have no idea what's happening. Very frustrating. So many weeks have passed and I can't get traction. Totally waste of time and my money!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Yvette,

Thanks for reaching out.

Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information.

Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has a flaw, which is that if you pause a course, or if you leave the app temporarily and come back, it starts on the NEXT lesson instead of continuing with the one you are on. I'd love for the team to fix this, and if so I'm happy to update to 5 stars. Finding courses and buying them and going through them has gone well so far. Love all the great content available for purchase at reasonable rates.

Don't do a subscription unless you are absolutely certain of the price. Udemy has zero customer support(check their web page) and they are sly about how much they charge you. I went to purchase a month to month subscription and instead was charged for a full year. Further more, they do not at all inform you that they do not, and will not refund you for a subscription. Only individual courses. I have recommended udemy on a number of occasions, but with the way they do business I cannot recommend
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jake, thanks for reaching out and I’m sorry for the trouble. Please reach out to us through the following link so we can assist you directly: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: WARNING : I found a course on sale (listed as on sale for another 5 hours) ,added to my cart, and the price increased when added to cart, so I removed it from my cart ,looked up the course again, and it listed the lower price. I again added to my cart, and the price increased. DO NOT USE THE BUY NOW OPTION !!!!!! you may very well get ripped off if you're not checking!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dave! We're sorry for the inconvenience. Can you please contact us at https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student so we could be able to investigate further for you? Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app, and I've spent quite a bit of money on courses. I've spent 3 days troubleshooting my account - cannot access it at all. I used Google login, and everytime I try to login via browser or app it doesn't even attempt to load it just reloads the page as if I never did anything. I've tried their customer service page, nothing has worked. SO disappointed in the lost money spent on courses I can't access.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The courses are good, but the app crashes to the point of being completely unusable if you try to download too many (large?) course videos. I have tried this on more than one flagship phone of different brands. The crash happens regardless of the quality of your phone. I have purchased several courses, but I probably won't purchase anything more until this issue is fixed. I like having my courses local for times when I don't have service. This bug defeats the purpose of the app for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for reaching out. Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: App has an unidentified character limit for the password. Was able to sign in on PC and on web on my mobile device using a password manager generated password that was 128 characters long. The mobile app however would not accept that password until it was shortened. I did not go through the process of figuring out how many characters but it worked once I hit 14. Other than that app is great. More than willing to change my review of this is fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thank you for your message. We will be very happy to assist you. Please submit your support request using this link: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

We hope to hear from you soon.

scraped_reviews.content: This app never sends me a code. Activate the ability for us to use our passwords to log into our accounts or this app is useless. I'm here again, 1 day after I couldn't sign in...what do you know, finally a code was sent. Hopefully this problem is solved. If not, just add the "password" option. I will add more stars if the app is consistent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thanks for reaching out.

Please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources to help resolve issues. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information.

Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Sucks!!! After I switched phones I can't log in anymore. Attempted to reset the password but the password reset email never delivers. Checked spam folder and all email addresses, especially the one that has receipts for courses I paid for and can't access. Worst part is there is no one I can talk to to resolve the issue. I've searched all over and none of their resolutions or FAQs solve the problem. I got the same generic response everyone gets. Still no solution. Wish I could give 0 stars ☹️

scraped_reviews.content: I installed but could never get past a blank screen. it was like downloading a blank app, you could push all the buttons and options but it just led you from blank screen to blank screen. When I tried ed to get support and troubleshoot it was the normal maze of options just to try and get assistance. i gave up and uninstalled, which sucks cause there were many courses i was interested in taking! fix those bugs! otherwise I have nothing to say, cause there was nothing to see.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kayla, we're are sorry for the video playback issue. In this case, could you please re-install the app to see if things work? If not, please reach out to us via https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us and we will investigate further in this case. Thanks for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm only rating this 3 stars because they offer a lot of free content and, education and self-learning are great endeavors. But, technical training offered via video is completely useless! If you cannot read and study it, and easily refer back to it when needed, then it is not worth the paper it is not printed on! If you want to learn technical subjects, be smart, buy a book (or ebook).
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Troy,

I'm sorry that you had issues with our app, please contact us at https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us so we can further assist you with this.

Thanks for your cooperation

scraped_reviews.content: The app does not work at all. It is almost impossible to login, it is impossible to download courses, it is impossible to view lectures and it is impossible to press the next button to see the next lecture. The courses themselves are good but the app is unusable. One course I bought some time ago has disappeared due to a "violation of Udemy policy" (it was a great drawing course), the money I paid for it has disappeared as well before I could finish it. A complete and utter disappointment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are very sorry for the frustrating experience. Could you try to clear the cache of the app, then uninstall-reinstall the app to see if the issue persists? Please also ensure that your app is updated to the latest version. If the trouble continues, would you please submit to us a request with more details (including any screenshots o...

scraped_reviews.content: Just like many others have said, i love Udemy, the desktop browser experience is good, but the app is terrible. Browsing and searching for courses are difficult, downloaded courses may or may not play back. While I'm traveling, i find it almost impossible to get it to connect, but i can use the website in my mobile browser. While using Chromecast the available controls are minimal and all kinds of weird things happen like lectures getting skipped.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Evert, we're sorry for the unpleasant experience. Can you please try re-installing the app to see if anything improves? Please contact us at https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student if you need further assistance. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The app was fine for a while. I recently updated it and it went back to the old problems. Multiple crashes. I had to uninstall and reinstall, losing my downloaded courses. For some unknown reason they want to expire downloads after 30 days but theres no notification until you try to access them then youre told its expired. Naturally, you find out when there is no network access. I am now reinstalling for the second time in two weeks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dennis. Thanks for reaching out. I'm truly sorry if you are currently experiencing any crashes with our app. You can also submit a request to our support team via the Help Center and provide them with more information. In addition, please visit our Help Center (https://support.udemy.com), which has extensive resources regarding mobile downloa...

scraped_reviews.content: Courses are great, videos play great. But after many years of usage with over 30 courses bought, download continue to be a mess, there is no clear way to restart download, sometimes stops for no reason, it doesn't show what's on the queue and if I want to upgrade my SD card, most likely I will be forced to download everything again, So a download dashboard will be highly appreciated. If you provide a download experience comparable with the courses I will give it 5 Stars.

Hit or miss, great when it works, useless otherwise. You can download courses for offline use, listen at various speeds, play in the background while you use other apps or just have your phone locked, but it crashes randomly and becomes unusable. Also if you download a course and have this problem, then the app seems to forget you've downloaded anything and it will not be available for offline use. So you basically have to download possibly 20gigs more than once

Don't use the app!! Use your browser. If you do use the app good luck using the controls! If you are just using the courses to kill time and aren't studying, this app is fine. When really studying, it often helps to be able to stop the lecture while making notes. Not possible here. I tried to stop the lecture repeatedly using the normal parallel line button,it never worked. I went back to browser, so far, things are working perfectly there. (Maybe it could be due to the course being audio only.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joe! Our apologies for the issue you're encountering on our Android app. Could you kindly contact us directly via this link: https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student so that we can assist you further? Many thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Would give more stars if the app was able to cast to the TV properly. I try to cast 1 video and it goes to an earlier video and will not cast no matter what I do the video needed. Most classes are good. I've only had a few that I had to return. Not due to the quality of the class, but because foreign accents were so I could not understand the speaker. So, watch a preview before buying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, due to certain platform security measures, the casting option may not be available for all lectures. You can continue to take your courses by logging into Udemy.com and watching them on a desktop, laptop, or your mobile device's screen. You can also view the course on your mobile device's screen via the Udemy mobile app. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: It's fine. Sometimes it forgets where you are, but it's rare. I wish you could actually continue after you're done with a quiz, instead of having to go back and skip the quiz in order to move to the next lecture. Can't sort your courses and the way they're sorted makes no sense! Why does it keep playing when you minimize the video? How does that make sense?

Hidden pricing. I give one star for the hidden pricing at Udemy. If you look for a course without logging in or with a new account, you get discounted prices. But if only you go to check the subscription rates, the discount in your cart disappears. I literally now see on one browser, where I am logged in, a course at full price. On another browser, where I am not logged in, the same course with 82% discount.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Rasa,

Thanks for reaching out and we apologize for any confusion.

Udemy’s goal is to help match students to the right course at the right price, and occasionally that may result in different promotions for the same course.

For example, as a means to encourage new students to enroll in courses, often we run promotions that offer them a one-...

scraped_reviews.content: I like the Udemy app. I can be improved by moving the video control buttons from the middle of the screen to the bottom when I place the course video in pause. This would allow me to read the content and complete practice questions given by instructors. Additionally, when the screen is paused it gets darker and then returns normal when the I play the course again. Overall, I'm pleased and wanted to give a rating of 5 stars.

Excellent interface, videos work well, and all around good e perience. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I have to jump to a PC to review course documents or to take quizzes. I understand that, depending on the topic, some content requires a PC, but I think I should be able to read notes/documents and take quizzes on my phone.

The course videos keep jumping ahead and it's super frustrating. I have to keep going to the website to uncheck the lessons which have been arbitrarily marked as complete, even though I have NOT completed them, in order to procede with the proper lesson. This really interrupts my flow and is extremely frustrating. If it didn't do this, I would probably rate it a 4 or 5. I like being able to cast onto my TV to follow along. I'm using a Pixel 6.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thanks for bringing this to our attention and we apologize for the inconvenience.

Please write to us via our help center: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us from the email linked to your Udemy account so we can rectify this issue right away.

We look forward to assisting you. Have a great day ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is still hot garbage. Udemy works just fine on a PC, but heaven forbid you try to run a lecture on Chromecast. You might get the first one to load fine, but then it goes to auto play, starts loading the next lecture and then randomly skips to the next one. If you try to click on the right one, it skips over that one and goes back to the one prior. This has been an issue with the app since at least 2020. Hot. Garbage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Daniel,
Thanks for sharing this.
Can you please provide us more details about this using this support link? https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us
Please make sure to include the email address tied to your Udemy account and as soon as we receive your ticket, we will follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: The actual service udemy provides is great. It's a good way to learn new skills from insightful people, for a very affordable price. That said, the app is garbage. Yes, the videos take forever to load and don't play well, just like other reviewers have commented. But what's worse is that the app is incredibly difficult to navigate, classes are difficult to search for, and there are multiple courses which I have purchased that just don't appear at all on the mobile version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michael, we appreciate your feedback. Could you please try to clear the app's cache, reinstall the app or switch to another connection? From my experience, it would fix the app performance and displays your courses just right? If the issue persists, please contact us at https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student and we are happy t...

scraped_reviews.content: Great way to learn concepts and products for an affordable price, especially individual subjects. App has an issue where on auto-play, sometimes it will default to a different position of the next video. For example, if i start video #1 at 4:30 but havent watched the next video, when the auto play skips to vdeo #2, it will start at 4:30 even though I've never watched it before. Takes a minute to skip back to the beginning but can be a little annoying if casting and phone's in a different room

Edit 2: This app is not usable even on my phone anymore. I can't watch any videos, downloaded or not. I am connected to the internet and YouTube works perfectly. I can't put up with this anymore. Time to start using Coursera again. Edit: I can't see half of my courses on my tablet. Original: Video loading is extremely slow, much worse than YouTube. It's possible to download content, so that's good. But the app is a bit clunky. 3/5 overall.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, can you please contact us via https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us so we can try to work things out for you? Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: It's really good regarding just plain online usage. But when it comes to downloading course for offline use - it's a buggy, freezy, unusable mess. For example it may completely freeze when you clicked to download or when clicked to delete downloaded course, or play. It's a nightmare and judging by other reviews others have same issues for a long time. Please fix it. Your whole platform is good. ADDED. It's more than a year later and nothing is fixed, it's still unusable for offline use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there,

Thanks for reaching out and we're sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you.

In order to better assist you, could you kindly submit a request via our support center? You can do so by clicking here: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us.

Thanks for the patience and we'll gladly assist you when you submit the inquiry.

Best re...

scraped_reviews.content: A very good platform to learn new things, I passed my Comptia exams with the Total Seminar courses. I highly recommend Udemy.  My issue is with the app itself and the ads that pop up. There's nothing more annoying than a pop-up ad in the middle of a lecture of a course I paid for.    This seems to only happen on the App, I would recommend that anyone using it just download the lessons and play them in Airplane mode or just access them through a browser.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, Our apologies for any inconvenience regarding the app push notifications. Please be advised that you can turn them off from your device settings. If you have any trouble doing this, please reach out to us via https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us so we can assist you further. Thanks for your cooperation!

scraped_reviews.content: This use to be a really good app for PC/laptop. But I am finding now, that I have to close the app and reopen it in order to move forward with lessons. With in the past 30-40 minutes I have had to close the app down twice and restart. No fun. Please can we fix the bugs with the app so the flow of the lesson doesn't get interupted. In respond to developers: ok makes sense why the app would be buggy on the computer side when using it. I'll just stick with brower when it comes to the computer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello there,

Thanks for reaching out and we're sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you. Please note that we do not have any Udemy app for PC/laptop devices. Our only official supported mobile apps are for mobile Android and iOS devices. if you have any issues with these, the following Help Center article includes more information r...

scraped_reviews.content: So far, so awesome! Just started my first course. Life coaching, no real direction in mind to use this practically, just wanted to know more about the subject. Great layout and lots of information. I'd say it pays to do side research on the instructors prior to purchase, as I did see some "quacks". Be smart and think about the content before just jumping into a course.

I can't even experience it. The app doesnt even move out of the log in screen. No matter what I do it just circles. I've learned that I have no patience for apps that you can't even log in to. I guess I'm sticking to accessing through a browser. *response to developer - Thank you, for your quick response. Just like when you unplug the router, or restart a device, I un/reinstalled the app a few times, and triple checked my password...even changing it...to no avail. I will do the next step. 👍🏼
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gabrielle, we're sorry to hear that you are unable to log in to the mobile app. Please try to reinstall the app or reset your password to see if you can log in again. If it doesn't help, please contact us at https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student. Our agents will assist you further. Many thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: If there was one word I would use to discribe this app, it would be "slow". Slow to pull up, slow to buffer videos (even when they are downloaded). After particularly slow moments, the app tends to crash, telling me that it's much more heavy weight than it needs to be. I can't cast the videos to anything, so no learning on TV. If udemy didn't have such good content, I'd give the app 1 star. I would expect a much better app from a company that has so many programming teachers and students.

It won't stop. I have to open the app on my phone and click "force stop" to make the videos stop running. It's obnoxious, and I'm reluctant to open my Udemy course because it's going to be a struggle to shut it down. Update after Udemy response: The point of my negative review was that it's hard to stop the video. It just keeps running. When my phone rings or someone tries to talk to me, I have to apologize for the audio playback that won't stop.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kim, we're sorry for the unpleasant experience. Can you please contact us via https://support.udemy.com/hc/requests/new?type=student so we can look into this for you better? Thanks a lot!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the app for quite sometime with no issues and now everytime I try to login I get an "Oops" and "Check your connection". Nothing is wrong with my connection btw. I've tried things suggested in the help center and have even uninstalled and reinstalled the app more than once, but still can't get in to my courses that I've paid for! I did login on the actual website (using this same connection) and could see my courses, but it's much more convenient to be able to use the app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Glen, thanks for reaching out and I’m sorry for the trouble. Please reach out to us through the following link so we can assist you directly: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?type=student. Thank you for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: I just purchased my 1st course today. The user interface is not great. I'm not about to see any of the downloads in my phone, they just don't seem to download. I'm on the computer now watching a video and I'm not able to easily rewind or forward again to take notes. When I pause it seems to skip and freeze. It's extremely frustrating to learn this way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ambeka,

Thanks for reaching out and we're sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you.

To better assist you, could you kindly submit a request via our support center? You can do so by clicking here: https://support.udemy.com/hc/en-us.

Thanks for your patience and we'll gladly assist you when you submit the inquiry.

Best regards,
...

title: 7NOW: Food Delivery & Alcohol
description:
Why You’ll Love 7NOW:


· 7-Eleven Gold Pass™: Enjoy unlimited FREE deliveries, discounted pricing for students, free drinks, 10% cashback, and more. Sign up for a 30-day free trial today! 

· Up to 10% Cashback: Earn Cashback on your purchases! 

· Alcohol Delivery: Get your favorite drinks delivered right to your door. 

· 24/7 Fast Delivery: Craving something late at night? We’ve got you covered with super-fast delivery anytime, anywhere.


7NOW delivers all your favorites—food, alcohol, candy, snacks, drinks, ice cream, groceries, health needs, and more—in about 30 minutes.


GET 5% CASHBACK  Earn Cashback and save more on your 7-Eleven orders. Gold Pass Members earn 10% Cashback!


7-Eleven GOLD PASS™ 

Sign up for 7-Eleven Gold Pass and enjoy unlimited FREE deliveries on all your favorite 7NOW products. Discounted pricing for students, free products, 10% cashback, and tons of other perks. Sign up for a 30-day free trial today!


WHATEVER YOU WANT—DELIVERED

 Choose from over 3000+ items and counting. We deliver alcohol, snacks, food, candy, health, school & office supplies straight to your location!


NEW! LOCAL RESTAURANT DELIVERY 

Got a craving for a local favorite? Introducing restaurant delivery! Enjoy your favorite restaurant meal delivered straight to your door.


24/7 DELIVERY IN 30 MINUTES 

Stay in the moment with worry-free delivery in about 30 minutes. Now that’s super-fast!


$7 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER 

Use Promo code 711TREAT Get $7 off your first delivery purchase made through the 7NOW App. (Terms and conditions apply.)


REFER-A-FRIEND PROGRAM

 Refer a friend and get a basket discount credit as soon as they place their first order on the 7NOW app. Terms and conditions apply.


ACTIVE IN MOST MAJOR US CITIES 

7NOW is available in over 200 cities across 43 metro areas! We’re adding new cities and locations all the time.


FLAT DELIVERY FEE 

We charge a flat, low delivery fee to make things easy and simple for you. Or sign up for Gold Pass and get unlimited FREE deliveries!


NO MINIMUMS 

Order as little or as much as you want. A nominal small basket fee may apply to orders less than $15.


PAYMENTS MADE EASY 

We accept all major credit and debit cards plus Apple Pay. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.


REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING

 Track your order in the app and receive notifications for up-to-date delivery status.


GIVE US FEEDBACK 

We’re listening! You are our number one priority, and we want to hear your feedback. Have a favorite 7NOW item that you can’t live without? Located in a city outside our delivery range? Let us know!


Download 7NOW today and experience the ultimate convenience in delivery!
