summary: Order Beer, Snacks & More 24/7

scraped_reviews.content: Not sure if someone new took over control of app development, but it's gotten SO much better in the past year. I especially love that we can transfer custom amounts of money into our wallet instead of the $10 increments. My only issue is that for a while now, the only "free items" with deliveries over $10 are slurpees, whereas there used to be a good variety of snacks and drinks offered.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Miranda! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. I will share your feedback with our Product & Marketing teams. Thank you for being a valued 7-Eleven customer! 855-711-7669

scraped_reviews.content: first and foremost not a great app. that being said the gold membership or whatever is supposed to take off the delivery fee it does not and good luck getting ahold of anyone to fix this issue. even still I was willing to use them because they are closest to my work makes life a little easier. they were using doordash as their delivery service which was fine then they switched to Uber my original delivery time was an hour ago but that's fine I can go talk to someone right? nope terrible!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to ensure that our service reflects this commitment. I apologize for your disappointment. Please call us at 855-711-7669. We would be happy to help you with your order.

scraped_reviews.content: 3 years doing orders, never again. Ordered items back in June that were not delivered. Still have yet to get my money back from these thieves. Lied that they would get my money refunded back to me on 3 different occasions, after I had to keep calling. Within the app, it wouldn't let me request a refund because one of the 5 items in the order was out of stock, so it automatically canceled and refunded that item. Kept getting a "refunded already issued" message. Still paid for 3 items i didn't get
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We are always looking for ways to improve our service. I apologize for any disappointment we may have caused. We will not charge you for out-of-stock items. If an item was substituted and you are not satisfied with the substitution, we will gladly process a refund. Please call us at 855-711-7669, and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: I wasn't getting any of the messages for my code to log in. It locked me out, so I got sent to support. My call got disconnected, so I called again. I got ahold of someone to try and get my account unlocked, but they weren't able to help, so they just transferred me to someone else. Instead of transfering me to someone who can help. They transferred me to the internal store support line, not a customer service line. I've been at this for 30 minutes now and am really frustrated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew, thank you for your feedback. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to ensure that our service reflects this commitment. I apologize for your disappointment. Please call us at 800-255-0711 Option 1. We would be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I place an order, then receive a message that no drivers are available and to change delivery address or pick up order. ok, so I will pick it up. (I can't change my delivery address as this is where I live (duh). The problem is that the promo code is only good for delivery. What gives? Please explain that logic. I would rather pick up anyhow due to stuff not being in stock. please advise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Chuck, Thanks for getting in touch with us however there are promo codes that are for both delivery and pick up and once a promo is for delivery only I do apologize but there is not was around to use the promo for pick or in store purchases. Thank you for being a valued 7NOW customer. Best, 7NOW | Fulfillment

scraped_reviews.content: I placed an order and I paid for it. I receive a text stating there was a problem with the order and they had to cancel it, and would be credited back in a week. Nice, hold my money. Today I get an email that stated that they care about their customers and if I want a refund to go to help in the app, and individual businesses can do whatever they want. Give me money back you horrible people. Also, your app is awful. If you were unable to fulfill a simple order there is no excuse to take it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention. Normally, a cancellation initiated by us will either be reversed or dropped within 2-5 business days. The processing time is based on your Financial institution. I apologize for your disappointment. Please call us at 855-711-7669. We would be happy to check the status of your refund request.

scraped_reviews.content: IF I COULD GIVE NEGATIVE STARS, I WOULD! THIS APP IS NOTHING MORE THAN A SCAM! Tried to use the intro offer that advertised $10 off your first order. And when I paid successfully at that, they then turn around and say when I get to the store, the item I ordered was out of stock conveniently. But yet, they let me order it just fine. And uh, they refused to give me a refund for the money. I spent. They again did the same exact thing a day later, and now they have taken more than twenty dollars
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Drew, thank you for contacting us about your order. I assure you that customer satisfaction is always our top priority and we want our service to reflect that. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. I promise we want our promotions to work for everyone. Please call our analyst team at 855.711.7669 for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is easy to use and works pretty well. However, I have only been able to use the app once since I installed it. I signed up for the gold pass and had a delivery made. Everything went well. I then have tried to make more orders, however now I can't get delivery to my house. It always only shows pick up. I am not sure why? I am a good customer and always tip, so I'm pretty sure I am not shadow banned. I just hope I am able to use the actual app again and not have to go thru other apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing feedback about your experience with 7NOW. We are committed to improving our service, and your input is invaluable to this process. Please contact our analyst team at 855.711.7669 for assistance. We will investigate why your assigned store is no longer available.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the 7 Eleven app since before the app split between having a delivery app (this one) and their Rewards app. I noticed that suddenly, nutritional information has been deliberately left off in this app on specific food items, such as items high in sugar and fat. The only information shown is calories, saturated fat, sodium, and anything that comes up with a 0 amount. The deliberate nature of the removal of this information is frustrating and concerning. 7 Eleven should do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologize for any disappointment we may have caused you. We will forward your comments to our Product team for their review and consideration. Thank you for your feedback; it helps us enhance our service for all customers.

scraped_reviews.content: Way too many bugs and glitches in the app. Sometimes the "go to checkout" button disappears. Sometimes it would show an item is in stock but once you go to your cart it shows its unavailable. Sometimes in the homepage it will show an item is available but once you click on the item it shows the item is unavailable. The search button doesn't show all the items available with a key word. The delivery and pickup switches without asking the user. The UI and animation jitters or lags severely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ashiqur and apologies for the frustrating experience. I have shared your feedback w/ Product & Operations. When CHECKOUT button is not visible, the fulfillment store is temporarily offline. Some items can be low quantity and the last one or two sold before completing transaction. We value your feedback. 855-711-7669

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great app in theory with some really good deals if you purchase the Gold Pass for the month, which is also very reasonably priced per month... Unfortunately it's extremely hard to successfully get an order delivered... For starters, the app just does not work for days or weeks at a time and when it does 90% of time the local store just automatically cancels the order or does nothing and the status stays as order received for hours until you cancel it...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jason and apologies for the poor experience. This is not what we want for our customers. I would like to escalate to our Operations team for further review. I am unable to isolate your account using the AppStore. Please call 855-711-7669 so we can identify the delivery store. With that info our Operations team can address.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is inconsistent. One day it will accept my card and the next day it won't. it's annoying, the tracking system needs serious work. like I am loyal customer of 711. and you've been around for so long you would think you guys would put more effort in service, I have had orders come late and sometimes they won't even have items that are listed. your inventory on the website doesnt match your stores. it needs more variety. very disappointing.

The app sent the delivery driver to a 7-11 location that didn't exist and they were not able to redirect to a real location address to fulfill the order. The contact support link in the app straight up doesn't work, I had to look up the customer support number online. To top that off I was on hold for 20 minutes, 20. Minutes. Just to talk to someone. It got sorted out eventually but what an awful experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Thor and apologies for the frustrating experience. I will share your delivery feedback w/ our PRODUCT team for review. There is an option for CHAT or PHONE support, but there can be a delayed response during peak delivery. We are working to improve. Thank you for posting and for being a valued 7-Eleven customer.

scraped_reviews.content: The app rarely actually works. I tried about 15 orders and only 3 of them ever worked. The rest either give a payment error, say my card was declined (when it wasn't), gives a processing error, or goes through, only to cancel immediately or within a few hours (after not properly processing right away). The store told me it processed in their system in that case, but that it was "canceled by user". It wasn't. The app just tries to find every which way to not actually let me use it as intended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Natasha and apologies for the frustration. Pickup orders are canceled when not picked up within 2-hours. After a couple of instances, the account is no longer permitted to submit pickup orders for a period of time. I hope this clarification is helpful and we appreciate you being a valued customer.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible Horrible Horrible. Finally got smart and am uninstalling the app. On multiple occasions they had me waiting over 1.5 hours for delivery from a store less than 2 miles away, and then cancel the order. Also had multiple instances where the payment would leave my account and could be seen as paid, but would show up as unpaid in their system. Then have to wait a day for them to release the funds. Also, when the mess up the order, you have to call in to get refund. Total pain.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery services for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: The app works well; its easy to navigate and understand. The service itself is mediocre at best. My first order was over an hour late with no updates sent to inform me of a delay. The customer service line is an answering machine (even after stating there were 0 customers ahead of me). That being said, if you want something delivered from 7-11 and dont mind waiting upwards of an hour past the quoted delivery time, this is the app for you.

Out of all the apps I've had over the last 10 years, this is the worse. I've had to contact customer service multiple times. The app would pull the money from my account and then promptly post a payment failure notice. So, after the app takes money out for hours or days, you still get no service. On 2 occasions items were left out of the order and no refund was made. I've never rated an app this low before, but 7elevens low, low, low customer service has earned it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, this usually happens when the billing information used for your purchase does not match the billing information entered as a Payment Method. We see you recently changed credit cards. The new card you are using is not working because the zip code is incorrect. Update your Payment Method info, and |zip code to correct the problem.

scraped_reviews.content: I wish 0 stars were an option. This app will routinely allow you to make orders and believe you will receive them.....only to cancel them more than an hour afterwards, all while continually sending you updates that falsely advise you of updates on the status of the order. Then, refunds are inevitably slow to process. Used to spend a few hundred dollars per month at this store and on the app, through food orders, lottery, coffee, soda, etc., but I AM DONE WITH THIS COMPANY!!! UNACCEPTABLE!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan, I'm so sorry to hear your experience lately has not been up to par. Please give us a call at your earliest convenience to 855-711-7669. We'd love to assist you and share your feedback to work on improving for customers like you.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't waste your time. Selection is nill, prices are on some sort of rollercoaster, there are hidden fees, support is not helpful and the people at the store don't seem to understand how to use it yet as they will get your order wrong just about every time. My last order was completely wrong, I had to wait until the next day to get ahold of support, there "fix" was to offer a refund after 10 days for the food but still charged for the delivery and fees. Also you can't use your rewards account even thought you are ordering directly from 7Eleven.

They have made hot foods unavailable after midnight now, despite being one of the only places to get stuff from the frill after midnight. They have codes that don't apply, or don't apply to you, or don't say what "qualifying items" make it work. Customer service is terrible as well. Had to fight with them for 3 days over an error they made in the app pricing for which I was overchanrged.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery service for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst app I've ever downloaded. There's always a problem with the app; it glitches when I try to make orders. Everytime I try to make an order it will say payment failed even though I had more than enough in the account to pay. When it says that it takes the money out of your account and isn't returned for 24 hours... so basically you get to order something you won't get just to have it take your money out and make it unavailable to use for a day... Customer service also isn't of any help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, this usually happens when the billing information used for your purchase does not match the billing information entered as a Payment Method on the 7NOW app. To use a different card, please add the new card information under the Payment Method, and select as default, before submitting your order. I am sorry your order did not go through.

scraped_reviews.content: I placed at order, and was getting updates about the delivery status. A couple of minutes before the estimated delivery time, the order was marked as delivered and that was it. No one called, no one knocked on my door, no one contacted me that they were having difficulty, but i did not receive my order. The customer service is basically a voicemail service and if you try to go through another customer service line, they cant do anything because its a different system.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Meg. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations. You will receive a full refund. Please email us at GM-7-ElevenCares@7-11.com with your first and last name and your order number if available so we can make it right. Please include a copy of this thread for reference.

scraped_reviews.content: Not worth the sorry waste of time. They don't accept any Debit card, and calls them "prepaid or giftcards". They only allow credit cards for subscriptions. They claim debit cards aren't eligible to hold subscriptions, which just isn't true. They do this because most of their users use Debit, and henceforth have to pay all of the fees rather than using the Gold Pass. I'm not dropping a single penny on this app. Please, spare yourself the time too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize that your transaction cannot be processed at this time. We have shared your comments with our product team for further review. We appreciate the feedback as we are always looking for ways to better our service & your feedback is an invaluable part of that process.

scraped_reviews.content: When your order gets canceled on their end, it takes them about an hour or longer to let you know, and sometimes I have had to wait a day for the money to go back into my account. Due to the nature of my job, i cant just leave to go get lunch nor can I take a lunch past a certain time. They have canceled a handful of times and each time its been over an hour. Other than that, the delivery service is ok. Dont order slurpees. They have ALWAYS forgotten slurpees every time I order one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery processes for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been on the app, for about 3 hours, trying to take a snapshot of my Identification card and it won't take! Called the 800 number, and was told to reinstall the app, and try it again. No luck. If you have time for playing games and getting the runaround, this is the app for you! I'm done with it. And they should lower their prices to the regular store prices, since they take a chunk out your ass when you order thru the app! Smfh🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️😡😡😡
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery processes for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: Must be my 4th review, unfortunately can't go below 1 star but worse than ever. Spent many thousand of dollars on this app for well over a year, almost daily, with great selection and few problems. Several months ago the selection offered went down about 90%, half of those permanently "out of stock", and hasn't changed. For the last 6 weeks unable to order at all. Vague "error placing your order" message. Called in after the 50 or 60th try, told I'd get a call back, never happened.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi James, Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention. I am sorry we disappointed. Please call us at 855-711-7669 and let us help. 7Now Team.

scraped_reviews.content: This has been the absolute worst time I've ever had ordering food. Ever. I honestly thought I had been scammed and wasn't even dealing with 7-eleven  at times. I lost my debit card and was relying on delivery so I couldn't make POS purchases. Suffice to say if I were able to go to 7-11 in-person, I imagine it would take me less than JUST UNDER FIVE HOURS. Unfortunately, it did take 7NOW that much time to move a bag of chips and some orange juice 6 blocks to my apartment. I had ordered a pizza but it wasn't delivered. Apparently they ran out of pizzas. No one bothered to call and check on a substitute item though -and when I called the store I was yelled at by the man working there then hung up on. Sweet. The second order was MUCH quicker though. I think it only  took something like three hours to get my food. That includes the hour-plus my food sat in the lobby of my building because no one brought it to my apartment or even bothered to call me about it. Awesome, thanks!  Throughout this there was no one available to answer the 1-800 #,  nor did the drivers' number's work. DO NOT USE THIS APP! RUN AWAY!

Placed an order with food and drinks. They only came with the drinks because they conveniently didn't have the discounted pizza I wanted that made me place the order in the first place. I got a notification saying that they changed the order since an item wasn't available and they took the pizza off the receipt. My first thought was, ah they replaced it with something else because they didn't have what I wanted and discounted the whole ticket. Nope. No way to get good service here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Sean, 
Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention and I am sorry we disappointed.  Please accept our sincere apologies. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process.

scraped_reviews.content: As an update I created a 7rewards account because that was the only button that worked on the main page since I couldn't connect using Facebook or register. And when I typed in my information it says "Sorry, could not sign in at this time. Please try again." I'm trying to just make a delivery and I can't even log in. This is very frustrating. I might as well wait a few hours using instacart or shipt.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention.  I am sorry we disappointed.  Please call us at 855-711-7669 and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app a lot recently in order to limit my time outside. I have received the correct order exactly one time. It's always delivered very promptly, which is a plus, and really the only reason I'm giving 2 stars instead of one. There needs to be some sort of communication when items are out of stock or when items are being replaced in my order. Right now, there just isn't, and I only find out after delivery that I'm missing items or that they've given me something else entirely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are listening!  😊 Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience.  We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: Definitely do not recommend this app. Placed an order, gave me said time order would be delivered. Waited over an hour. No updates in app. Called customer service, rang 8-9 times and got a busy signal. The call finally went through and it was a recording. Got transferred to a rep who then had to transfer me to a "different department" because he couldn't help me. Mid transfer I got hung up on. Not even mad about the loss of money at this point. Fix your broken app/customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations and we will surely address the fact that your call went unacknowledged. You will receive a full refund and a FREE delivery to your account. Please email us at GM-7-ElevenCares@7-11.com with your first and last name and your order number if available so we can make it right.

scraped_reviews.content: It's an okay app, however there is definitely room for improvement. For example, shouldn't there be a specified location of which 7 Eleven you order from? Also, why does it take so long for orders to be processed? Most of the product you just put in a bag ahead of time with exceptions of things like icecream, cold drink, etc. I've noticed that a location near me decided to ise UberEATS instead of their own delivery app. An order for icecream, taquito and a brisk took an hour to arrive to e.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know we are working hard to expand coverage areas & reduce our delivery time.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible. It cancelled the one item I was supposed to get, did not leave me an option to cancel my order prior to pickup (after seeing they cancelled my item). I couldn't even call the store because they didn't even let me know which 7/11 my products were coming from. Terrible. Absolutely terrible. Now I have to go back out to get the item, and I darn sure won't go to 711 after wasting $16 just to get junk for free delivery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Anthony, 
Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Call us at 855-711-7669 and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: I live the app. However, the new replacement option for items not available should expand to items the customer would prefer instead of computer automation. For instance, I ordered Ben and Jerry's ice cream peanut butter flavor, and my replacement option was Snickers Ice Cream. I would have preferred another Ben and Jerry flavor, but I wasn't able to choose my own replacement item.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing us with feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We will forward your comments to our Product Team for review and consideration.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is pretty neat for ordering small things like drinks and drinks and the occasional specials and promo codes definitely make things a bit cheaper, but most of the time I can never order any of the items like pizza, hot wings, hot dogs, or taquitos. They always show up as unavailable. The total at checkout can also be very taxing if you order under $15. Even with a promo code that knocks off the delivery fee. It adds about 4-5 dollars as a "small bag fee."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. If there is anything specific we can investigate, please contact us at 855-711-7669 and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for over a year. There are many issues. Not particularly with the app itself, but with the systems in place. More often than not items will be removed or replaced even though the app says they are in stock. Several times I've received someone else's order with my name on the bag. Several times items were missing from the order yet shows on the receipt as picked. Getting refunded is a lengthy process. Call them instead of using the automated system. I've uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery processes for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not able to log in with my 7Rewards account even after resetting the password, and couldn't create a new one because my phone number was already associated with that account, so used my girlfriend's instead. Another fun quirk of this app is if you add items to your cart and then fail to log in, your cart is cleared and you have to add them all again. Half of the items I ordered didn't show up, and they didn't count the missing items properly when I looked at the receipt afterwards. Don't let people order things they won't receive. Hopefully customer support handles the refund properly. I ignored the bad reviews but you shouldn't. I recommend you avoid the frustration and use one of the many properly functioning delivery apps out there.

I have ordered thru apps( UberEAT, 7 eleven, GrubHub) probably more than 10 times. Overall 7 eleven is a huge disappointment. They got some real shady stores that would substitute your items with less expensive or less popular items. I had to confront their employees couple times about why the so called "out of stock" is fully stocked inside the fridge. It's really tiring that you never received the exact items you placed thru the app. You also pay extra fee to use the app. Bye, uninstall
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there’s anything specific we can investigate, please contact us at 855-711-7669 and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used it once. the delivery came quick so thats great. One of the items on my order wasnt available so they didn't bring anything else and refunded the amount I paid for it. It would be nice to have the opportunity to choose an alternate item when one isnt available. (2L cokes are out of stock so let me choose Sprite instead) otherwise the inventory should be current.

I've used this app a few times and totally understand the delivery is sometimes not on time. Which is fine, but the last few times I've ordered from here, the app hasn't been refreshing the ETA or been showing me the map, plus my last delivery didn't arrive and the driver told me I had to "take it up with corporate". All in all, I loved this app at first, but I am starting to see major flaws.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize that we did not meet your expectations. You will receive a full refund. Please email us at GM-7-ElevenCares@7-11.com with your first and last name and your order number if available so we can make it right. Please include a copy of this thread for reference.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: expired items in order twice! they have good deals, there always promo codes to use, delivery usually arrives sooner than projected. points system sucks a bit because you have to spend quite alot before you can use them. you should be able to see and use points balance in this app. it doesn't make sense that there's an entirely separate app for it. otherwise, I really enjoy it. I especially enjoy it because of the beer and wine delivery. I wish they'd also deliver tobacco.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are listening! 😊 Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. Today local regulations do not allow 7NOW delivery of tobacco in your area. We are working very hard to make this available for you soon.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely horrible. The app requires you to scan a type of government issued ID and when prompted to do so, it will only scan the front of whatever you choose to use. It will require the back but I have spent 45 minutes (quite literally) trying to scan the back of my license to no avail. I improved my lighting in 3 different settings as well as turned on/off flash and switching angles. When I look up solutions for troubleshooting, nothing is to be found. I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Tyler, 
Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. With every new app version, we are introducing new features and improving existing ones.  We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve further.

scraped_reviews.content: There are always great deals on offer. But the B&M locations don't always meet their end of those offers. And the delivery partner's software has much room for improvement. I'd say one big but simple change which is needed is the option to add a courier tip should occur after delivery is completed, not before the order is even sent. Overall, though, the app itself is mostly good.

Literally one of the worst delivery app experiences I've ever had. The first order I placed, I was told there an error, so I tried one more time & it went through. However, my bank account was charged twice (I'm dealing with that now). Then, when my order gets here, its the wrong type of cigarettes. I call, they say they'll refund me again. If I want the correct type, I have to order again. So I can pay 4x? NO WAY! Awful, ridiculous, & frustrating. Deleting after all issues are resolved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Brittany, 
We are listening.  Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your 7NOW experience.  I am sorry we disappointed. We are always looking for ways to better our service and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is user friendly and pretty easy to navigate. They offer the first 3 deliveries fee free. The cigarette selection is small for now knowing they have the product but it's not an option is frustrating so had to settle for something else. The tip section is either large flat dollar amounts or none. The smallest dollar was 20% of an order and up from there (4.00, 5.00, 6.00). No way to do a custom amount. So you may need cash.

After the update the app won't let me sign in. It doesn't register taps on the "sign in" button or "continue as guest" button. Definitely canceling my subscription the second I can sign in. I have a feeling I'm being scammed because I can't log in at all. Not even in the website that is still "under construction". I'm not paying over 60 bucks annually for a service that hasn't worked in over a week now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Akio, my apologies for the frustration. I am able to locate your account and will email you directly. For access, enter your phone number from which the mobile app is currently installed so you will receive the needed verification access code. I also recommend upgrading app. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered 3 simple things. I only got 1 of them and it sucked. I was only charged for one of my items but I never received a notification that I would only receive one of my items. I was really bummed because I took the time to try the app. Seemed pretty silly to only have 1 item (snapple) delivered to my door. The app itself is a great idea don't get me wrong, but hopefully some time will fix it's effectiveness.

So far, not a fan of the app. Even putting in a good tip for a 20 dollar order, I've already had 3 drivers pick up then deny the order. So going on an hour for a delivery from a store less than a quarter mile from the house, not cool. I'm just going to go back to GoPuff at least theyre delivery times are accurate. Edit : just tried using them again, got my order half of its wrong. They substituted cheap generic brand items in place of the higher priced name brand items. So f*@king trash man.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding your 7NOW experience. We are always looking for ways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process. We understand this can be frustrating. Please accept our sincere apologies. Know that we are working hard to improve our delivery services for our customers.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't waste your time. No idea how my phone number is already registered to another account? Not easy to figure out the site or even the website. Finally get to the payment part, and the checkout button just sits there and loads forever. Not sure if it's the app/website (both are acting up the same) or if it's my phone. Either way though, I need MY phone number for MY account. Not on someone else's account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention. I am sorry we disappointed. Please call us at 855-711-7669 and let us help.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app, very easy to use and highly convenient. Only two issues and then it will be 5 stars for me: I ordered the large sized bags of chips, they gave me the smaller sized bags and still charged me for the larger sized bags. Also, I would like an option where we could apply our 7Rewards points to items that we purchase, since it's all one in the same. That's about it!

title: Weather & Widget - Weawow
description: Weawow is a free (and ad-free) weather app enhanced by beautiful weather-related photos taken by photographers around the world. The photos reflect the current weather at your location, showing you whether it’s fair, cloudy, rainy, snowy, so you can decide whether you’ll need your umbrella or your sunglasses when you go out. When you open the Weawow app, you’re likely to encounter unexpected "Wow" photos, rather than a boring, text-based forecast. And that’s not all: if you take "Wow" photos yourself, you can post your "Wow" photos from our Website. Then, we can integrate them into the app, where they’ll be seen by weather watchers all over the world (the app is available in over 50 languages). The app’s layout is customizable, allowing you to select what to display like rain, wind gust, pressure, UV index, etc. The Weawow is sustained by user donations. If you like the Weawow and want to support the Weawow project, please donate to us. Of course, this is not mandatory, so please feel free to use the app. WEATHER DATA - Changeable weather providers: NWS (NOAA), DWD, Meteo France, AEMET, MET Norway, Dark Sky, AerisWeather, Weatherbit, World Weather Online, Open Weather map, (AccuWeather, Foreca). - Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all. - Detailed weather: Temperature, Feels-like temperature, Rain, Humidity, Dew point, Clouds, Pressure, Wind, Wind gust, UV index, visibility, Snow depth. Temp., Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, Dew point, Humidity, Cloud cover, UV index, Visibility, Snowfall, Feels like, Solar radiation. - Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages. - Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon. - Air Quality (CAMS, ECMWF), Severe Weather Alerts, Pollen (only AccuWeather and USA). SIMPLE INTERFACE - Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks. You can change them by swiping left / right. - Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen. WEATHER MAP, RADAR - Weather Providers: NOAA, RainViewer, MET Norway, MSC. - Globe (14 days forecast): You can check the wind animation and various weather layers with the 3D earth. - Google Maps (Radar & 1 day forecast): You can check the real rainfall radar with the Google Maps. CUSTOMIZABLE LAYOUT - As you like: You can freely change the layout to display daily weather, hourly weather, radar, etc. - Sort order: You can change the priority of weather type like Temperature, Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, UV index. - Weather Icon: You can change it from various weather icons. - Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available. CUSTOMIZABLE WIDGETS - As you like: You can always check the weather you care about, such as the hourly UV index on your home screen. - Widget themes: Simple, Clock, Hourly Graph, Daily Graph, Currently, Today, Hourly, Daily. NOTIFICATIONS - Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time. - On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather. MARKETPLACE - You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service. - The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well. https://weawow.com/marketplace
descriptionHTML:
Weawow is a free (and ad-free) weather app enhanced by beautiful weather-related photos taken by photographers around the world.
The photos reflect the current weather at your location, showing you whether it’s fair, cloudy, rainy, snowy, so you can decide whether you’ll need your umbrella or your sunglasses when you go out.
When you open the Weawow app, you’re likely to encounter unexpected "Wow" photos, rather than a boring, text-based forecast. And that’s not all: if you take "Wow" photos yourself, you can post your "Wow" photos from our Website. Then, we can integrate them into the app, where they’ll be seen by weather watchers all over the world (the app is available in over 50 languages).
The app’s layout is customizable, allowing you to select what to display like rain, wind gust, pressure, UV index, etc.
The Weawow is sustained by user donations. If you like the Weawow and want to support the Weawow project, please donate to us.
Of course, this is not mandatory, so please feel free to use the app.

WEATHER DATA
- Changeable weather providers: NWS (NOAA), DWD, Meteo France, AEMET, MET Norway, Dark Sky, AerisWeather, Weatherbit, World Weather Online, Open Weather map, (AccuWeather, Foreca).
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Detailed weather: Temperature, Feels-like temperature, Rain, Humidity, Dew point, Clouds, Pressure, Wind, Wind gust, UV index, visibility, Snow depth. Temp., Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, Dew point, Humidity, Cloud cover, UV index, Visibility, Snowfall, Feels like, Solar radiation.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Air Quality (CAMS, ECMWF), Severe Weather Alerts, Pollen (only AccuWeather and USA).

SIMPLE INTERFACE
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks. You can change them by swiping left / right.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.

WEATHER MAP, RADAR
- Weather Providers: NOAA, RainViewer, MET Norway, MSC.
- Globe (14 days forecast): You can check the wind animation and various weather layers with the 3D earth.
- Google Maps (Radar & 1 day forecast): You can check the real rainfall radar with the Google Maps.

CUSTOMIZABLE LAYOUT
- As you like: You can freely change the layout to display daily weather, hourly weather, radar, etc.
- Sort order: You can change the priority of weather type like Temperature, Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, UV index.
- Weather Icon: You can change it from various weather icons.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.

CUSTOMIZABLE WIDGETS
- As you like: You can always check the weather you care about, such as the hourly UV index on your home screen.
- Widget themes: Simple, Clock, Hourly Graph, Daily Graph, Currently, Today, Hourly, Daily.

- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.

MARKETPLACE
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
https://weawow.com/marketplace
summary: No ads, No data collected. Beautiful and powerfully customizable weather app

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best free weather app I have ever found. It is accurate and very informative, with a seven day forecast of all weather conditions, including alerts without being full of interruption and ads. They do ask for small donations to keep the app free with the cost of technology to provide their service. Well, it's worth a few voluntary bucks for a weather only, clean interface accurate reporting. You decide for yourself.

This is THE best weather app. I've never found another weather app with more options for the widgets, or an easier way to see hourly forecasts or radar without being redirected to a website. Everything I need is IN THE APP which is sadly very uncommon. Kudos to the creators, you get the sense they care a lot about intuitive presentation of data, and have put a ton of thought into their app.

So far I downloaded this app a couple of days ago and it's been great. pretty accurate weather, with so many features to look for. Everyday the backround has a different image which doesn't make it boring. and i haven't encounter anoying adds. so I'm keeping this weather app . Besides there is a feature where you can upload your own pictures and others can buy'em. dunno... pretty crazy but cool.

I have not found any weather app comparable to this one, giving a radar outlook many days in advance. While others only give you hours of radar predictions, this one gives you days ahead. I love the format as well, giving you complete weather info ,including wind speeds, barometric pressure, and so much more. I highly recommend this app to all my family, friends, and coworkers since wind speeds are important to our jobs. That's a plus not having to have 2 apps for the info needed.

Love the app! I deleted the other app I was using because the ads got so ridiculous! I couldn’t even open the app without having to watch an ad first. This one has no ads. The photos on the app are stunning! I added the widget to my home screen, I love seeing their beautiful photos there. Most importantly, the weather forecasts have been accurate. (At least as far as weather can be predicted accurately) And did I mention, NO annoying ads! Just weather! How refreshing! Thanks for the great app!

I usually don't feel compelled to write a review, unless the product is horrible. But, this weather app is fantastic. I don't know how they do it with no adds and gathering no information from you. I'm actually pretty happy to have found it. The widget looks great and overall, very easy to navigate. I gave 4 stars, because we'll, nothing is perfect. But, I'll come back soon and give the full rating, if it remains as it is. A Great weather and clock app.

This is a great weather app! I've been using it for several years and have found it helpful. It seems accurate, quick to load, and has additional information like weather alerts, moon phase, and what time the sun will rise and set. I also enjoy seeing which photo is at the top of the screen. It seamlessly changes based on time of day and maybe weather. I especially appreciate that the doesn't have ads and that it doesn't collect share, share, save personal info other than location.

Uh, wow. I've tried so many weather apps and always end up disappointed. Either the info I want at a glance isn't there or the data is inaccurate, or both. This app has everything I want: the customizability, plus picking your weather provider, and I finally found the detailed radar setting in the map. Totally worth supporting monthly. I do wish MSN was included as a weather provider as the current ones don't seem very accurate with forecasts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, you can change the map type to the actual rainfall radar from the setting screen, so please try it.
1. Launch the app
2. Custom layout on the bottom screen
3. Weather map
4. Map Type = Google Maps (Radar & 1 day forecast)

scraped_reviews.content: At first I thought the widget didn't work because it showed the max forecast temperature instead of the current temp. It turns out there is a widget for forecast/today and one for current weather, make sure to pick the right one! my only complaint so far is that I wish there was an option to make the font Bold, not just bigger, especially for the clock. it would be nice if the widget showed current temp (big) and range for the day (maybe two. numbers stacked?) make it a Temperature/Range setting

A lovely, easy to use app. Unlike many others, it offers a wealth of providers to select whichever works best in your area. There's a ton of useful information at your fingertips, but you can customize everything to avoid getting overwhelmed by details. For me, the widget is the most important feature and I find it somewhat lacking in customization. I have no doubt most users will find it completely serviceable.

I'll be honest: This is a great, simple weather app, easy to set up, easy to understand, with great widgets and, thankfully, a good number of choices for forecast providers. It's not the app's fault that weather prediction accuracy for the U.S. has been set back 50 years. That's the fault of those who dismantled the National Weather Service and NOAA.

The most wonderful weather app, full stop. After having paid for pricey full subscriptions to the major players for years, I'm sticking with this one. You can choose between several weather models, get all the usual weather data, and fully customize widgets and notification shades. I created a widget that shows UV index and air quality over the day so I know what time is best for my afternoon walks. The sunrise/sunset feature even shows the golden and blue hours. Cool.

This is an edit. I've been using the app for 2 years. I think that the forecast as far as temperatures and precipitation and wind, are pretty accurate. However, I think the probability of precipitation indicated may suggest a greater chance of rain than actual. I've found that turning on location sharing, as suggested, did increase the accuracy of the forecast. I've found the radar to be very accurate. I can now tell pretty much, when and how much rain I might get in a day. Great app.

I discovered this app when I was searching for a widget that didn't require the location to be on. I endeavor to get every minute possible out of my battery, and part of that is turning off radios that don't need to be on. I'm not a touring musician or a corporate executive who will constantly be needing the weather updated based on location. Nope, I'm in pretty much the same place every day, so I don't need the phone seeking GPS satellites.

I found this while trying to find a reliable Weather app w/widget that had very few/no ads. Bingo!!! So far, I love the app - the interface is a tad different than a lot of the others, but now that I'm getting used to it, I'm actually seeing that it's more intuitive! Keep up the great work, Folks - I think you've got a Winner!

this is actually the best weather app I've ever used on any platform. it gives you a ton of data, and a ton of options, without feeling overwhelming at all. it's a really clean interface. somehow it's also even usually a little more accurate than the other weather apps. it even shows you the moon's phases! best of all there are ZERO ads.

Great app, info and interface. Great options for weather source and widget customization. Developer is responsive to issues and suggestions. Overall it's great, I don't give 5 stars unless an app is excellent. This is! I have had an issue lately with the widget not displaying the local temperature, it's just blank where the temp should be. After opening the app it shows up in the widget, but sometimes disappears again. Otherwise it's the most stable and consistent weather app of the 4 I have!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
1) I think your weather provider in the Weawow app is NWS.
Recently, NWS may be slow.
Please change it.
1. Launch the Weawow app
2. Scroll to the bottom of the screen
3. Tap Weather provider
4. NWS = Off
2) Please tap the weather information on the widget.
The Weawow app will be launched.

scraped_reviews.content: Discovered this app a few years ago...I had it on a tablet that finally went battery dead. I just put it on my Chromebook and WOW there are so many upgrades. I love this app...so many ways to view weather and beautiful photos! It NEVER failed me. I remember using the satillite map during a major 3 day rainstorm. I could see a break in the cloud coverage to get things done outside. Not to mention the lack of ads and why...read the message from the developer. My message back is THANK YOU!!

Very nicely designed application for weather monitoring, the widgets are very flexible. I love the fact that they include the ability for people to sell and share their photos via the application. it means every time you open the application, you may get another great image. Because they pull data from multiple weather providers, it can get a little confusing. And I have found that if you're traveling, changing the weather provider may actually change and improve the prediction.

switched over to this app from another app and I am so glad I did. No ads blocking the weather! The information is detailed and what I love is how customizable it is. you can have as much or as little as you want. The only thing I miss is a way for it to tell me how long I have until it is going rain and how long until it stops. that's so useful for planning!

this is the ONLY weather app I have found which will give me weather at the locations I want, specifically lakes, parks, and campgrounds. Most apps give me nearby city location weather, which is not the same as weather 13 miles up a canyon, or out on the water. also, this app is very customizable all without having to pay subscription fees or extra per added feature. absolutely wonderful job!

My favorite weather ap. Had a problem where the entire forecast was way off and not updating. I scrolled through other providers in settings at the makers' suggestion. This has happened a few times, and each time, it turned out to be a single provider. The maker of this ap has no control over the weather providers. But, he has added numerous providers to choose from. The ap is free. No ads, etc. He works on donations, so give him a few $ if you can spare it. Great ap!

Best weather app I've ever used. I am a nerd when it comes to my weather apps, I currently have 5 installed on my phone. Weawow surpasses my premium (paid) apps with ease. Zero ads, brilliant design and very easy to read UI. The radar feature is great. Give it a try, it's totally free after all! Will be donating to devs in the hope that this little chestnut remains free for all!

This is the weather app I have been looking for forever. First off, it has miimalist widgets, even a choice as small as 1x1, where most others for some dumb reason require 3x2 or more for info that easily fits in 1x1. If you add a clock to this, it is still just 2x1 and tapping the clock is just like tapping the stock Android clock. This already makes it better than everyone I saw. The app itself is good too. You can manually enter location so you don't have to give it permissions. A++

Nice app seems to be accurate. One problem for me is that when you check upcoming daily weather the information is placed over various weather related photographs. As the information is in a white font sometimes it is difficult to see when overlaying light photos, especially ones with snow. Would be nice to disable that bit of unnecessary fluff, or at least allow use to change the font colors. Otherwise this would get 5 stars from me. UPDATE: Lately it has been a little wonky. Temps contradict

Look no further, this is the perfect widget for your home screen! Widget has many customizations including size, background, font, etc... Also links to default clock or calendar when I press the time or date on the widget. I never thought I would be reviewing a weather app, but this is really nice and very well thought out!

Lately I've noticed that the ongoing notification in my notification drop down seems to display the app icon instead of the small round temperature. It l looks right in the settings, there's the main temperature and then the small around temperature as well. But then when I go out of the app and go to my notification drop down I see the app icon instead. not sure what I could be doing wrong. Please help I will give it five stars. Thanks. My phone is an S25 Ultra running Android 15.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
The issue of the app icon appearing in notification is due to a recent change in Samsung OneUI.
Due to system specification, I am unable to fix it. Sorry.
~ Kei, Weawow

scraped_reviews.content: Does not display precise location despite the permission being granted. It's a nice looking app, but it is lacking basic information other apps are able to provide. If the feature is available it is not easily accessible. The widget itself was not very customizable, it looks fine small, but when expanded it looks like it is too spread out and it leaves a lot of empty space. If someone has the correct location it would probably be a very useful app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
When you are in a building, the app will sometimes get the wrong location with GPS.
Please lounch the Google maps or reboot your device. The Weawow app may get the correct location.
Also, you can change the widget layout to larger. Please change the font size from the widget settings.
~ Kei, Weawow

scraped_reviews.content: This is by far the best weather app out there. The weather channel, accuweather, weatherbug, and other default apps I've had on phones are complete ad-loaded trash compared to this. (Especially the weather channel one, to the point where it was unreadable since ads took up the entire screen looking at hourly forecasts...) Has all the info you could ever need, easy to read hourly charts of anything from temp, to rain chance, humidity, and even wind info without ads taking up the screen.

This is my new favorite weather app! You can customize what info is displayed and even reorder it. You get to choose what weather service you prefer and the ui is lovely! It's miles and miles better than any of the other weather apps out there that constantly change their ui, have excessive ads and place important info behind a pay wall. And it's free with no ads!

I have tried SO many weather apps. It's important that the widgets are good. I've had other apps with good widgets, but the weather itself was not very accurate. This seems like the best combo of good looking, informative widgets with accurate forecasting. Plus having local photos for the backgrounds (both in widgets & within the app) make it quite pretty to look at. New: added ability to import/export config, love it!

Excellent app. Clear, easy to read weather info for the current day and week ahead. Easy to see a large range of relevant details (eg wind speed/gust/direction) at a glance thanks to the clever layout. A great bonus is the photos section, where you can view all sorts of pictures taken by other users and follow them if you wish. You can also set up your own account to display your own photos. All for free!

My new favorite widget. it's unbelievable how difficult it is to find a simple widget that properly displays the weather and time in the size blocks that you want a widget to appear in. this one's about the best I can find, as many others have said already. I might say the use of English could be polished I kind of want the ability to customize what happens when I tap the widget also but not bad at all. I donated and may well do so again.

4 March 2023 I originally installed & thought it was great after looking at reviews. If it seems good I'll look for more detail. The other reviews I read were great. It's improved since first time I installed, it's very pleasing to the eye, doesn't cause any bother. Weather apps might look very similar but then my friends who also liked it after installing it. This one is quite different to my original which has adverts occasionally in. I like them both equally in different ways.

A beautifully setup and detailed weather. I like that one can see not only the temperatures, but the map with the pressure systems and cloud cover in your region. The moving sun ☀️/moon 🌗 and the waxing/waning moon. The background photographs are lovely, too. Very special. Highly recommended 👌

Liked it at first, radar quit showing the map below, it worked fine before, might be my phone, IDK, cool variety of pics daily! Changed to a different app, probably get sick of that one too. Sometimes the app was correct and sometimes it would be way way off, like predicting rain and it's sunny all day. yep wow!

Excellent layout and detailed information. I really like the layout of the data - which you can customise to your preferences. The app found my location accurately in UK. My only comment so far (have only been using it one day) is that choosing the data supplier from those offered is a bit confusing as they all give different data. The most accurate so far is Norwegian source. No UK data sources? So am reluctant to pay for Accuweather but would donate to the author of the app.

This app is great! The weather side of it is fairly accurate. More than the guy on the news! The real plus, for me, are the different ways I can customize the widgets. And that there are so many widgets to choose from, like 15 of them, where all others have 3, maybe 4. I bought the premium to support the devs, and installed on every smart device I own. My only gripe: I had to pay again to get it on my Xbox, but that's because my Ms account is different than my Google account. Still a great app!

I had it with Google Weather when it didn't forecast rainfall on a weekend in SoCal early summer. Wow is more accurate locally and is known for being in the top 5 accurate weather apps. It even has nice background graphics. All I want is hourly rain forecast so I can make plans. Bonus for having few to no ads and popups. That's all I want.

FABULOUS APP! Beautiful landscape mode for tablet and very customizable. I had an issue with inaccurate temperatures and i got a very quick response from the developer, telling me that I could select my weather provider in settings. That solved a problem. The widgets are very customizable as well. It seems they have thought of everything. Thanks
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
The cause is that the weather data source (weather provider) differs between the Weawow app and other app.
You can compare and choose the weather provider in the Weawow app.
Please try it.
1. Launch the Weawow app
2. Scroll to the bottom of the screen
3. Tap Weather provider
4. Compare and choose the weather provider from the charts

scraped_reviews.content: Only 2.0 stars because the app is no longer communicating with the widget. EG: App says 60°, widget says 68° & reload button stopped working. I've tried everything I can think of. I uninstalled & reinstalled the app. I reset everything to factory settings & back. I will say that it used to be my favorite weather app that I have (until lately), and I have several due to outdoor work & hobbies. UPDATE: Their 'solution' (read below) does NOTHING to help the issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, I am sorry for your inconvenience.
If the widget does not complete to refresh, please tap the widget once.
The app will launch, then, the widget load will finish.
Also, I will do my best to solve this problem.
~ Kei, Weawow

scraped_reviews.content: A weather nerd and liberty lover's dream come true! All the data anyone could possibly want, and yet zero ads, tracking or any other B.S. Created by one individual providing it as a public service instead of for profit. The app survives on donations, which are entirely voluntary, however it's definitely worth supporting. Finally, the photos add a very nice human touch. Current Temp in widget is often different from in the app, but otherwise a fantastic service! Thanks so much!

This is very, very nice. Out of all the weather apps I have tried this is the best and most pleasant to use. All the useful information and none of the useless extra stuff. With no ads!! I also appreciate the custom layout option. To the developer: Thank you so much!🙏☺️ Update: I made a small donation. After the "payment successful" notification the app crashed! Aaaand upon opening it again, ooh I can now have some extra features? Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you very much for your donation!
I will investigate your crash report.
Kindest regards,
~ Kei, Weawow

scraped_reviews.content: Genuine 5 stars for this app, I've tried at least a dozen weather apps and none come anywhere close to this one. The other apps, despite having ratings over 4.5 stars, either have tons of intrusive ads, and/or limited widget customisation, or plainly have abusive privacy policy (one of them was using collected data to sell to over 300 third parties). I am already planning to donate to this one because it's that good.

It is one of the better weather apps I have used. Big kudos for not having any ads❣️You can lock in a suburb, which is useful since the weather in my city varies between suburbs. There is a daily and hourly forecast. While it's not 100% accurate, it's close enough to help you plan ahead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, I think it's more important to compare and prepare multiple information sources than to rely on one.
This is because 100% accurate weather forecasts are impossible in our current civilization.
Please try it.
1. Launch the Weawow app
2. Scroll to the bottom of the screen
3. Tap Weather provider
4. Compare and choose the weather provider

scraped_reviews.content: Beautiful and Functional! I love the refreshing look and feel of the UI, the ease of switching options of the forecast graphs, the configurability of weather provider / icons / etc. Also, I just started playing with the widget creator which is a VERY nice feature. It's my #1 weather app nowadays hands down. I'm a developer so I understand the effort. Keep up the great work!

Absolutely love this app. I've tried so many weather apps & was disappointed. Either the app was good & the widgets sucked or vise versa along with annoying ads on top of it. This is one of two apps that I use that I"m happy with. Please keep up with the beautiful pics it's one of the best features of the app along with the great presentation of the weather.

most accurate weather app I have had so far. Region(UK). An improvement however would be to add a more detailed precipitation graph, something somewhat similar to what accuweather has. also a monthly forecast of the temperatures would not be too bad, again this is something accuweather offers. In terms of accuracy of forecasts though, this app takes the cake.

Love this app, love that you can contribute to it as well. It gives you Dawn and dusk times to help you get the best shots, would like a moonset/rise indicator too though. The only downside I can think of is that when you see a beautiful image on the widget and click on it to "like" it, it refreshes to a different image and there's no way to find the one you wanted to "like". Please fix this 🙏
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
Please tap the photographer name on the widgets.
You will be able to see that photo by web browser and post the "like".
~ Kei, Weawow

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing app! The best among others (I'm talking about free versions). And, also important, it's free from annoying stupid adds. The interface is beautiful with very nice pictures, all info is there, weather maps, great selection of amazing gadgets that can be customized. Actually, the whole interface can be customized. Really beautiful! And - important for the weather forecast apps - quite accurate. I've tested it in 2 countries so far, and I'm more than satisfied.

title: IQAir AirVisual | Air Quality
description:
The most trusted and reliable air quality information from the world’s leading air pollution data provider. Covering 500,000+ locations from a global network of government monitoring stations and IQAir's own validated sensors.

Recommended for sensitive people (allergies, asthma, etc), a must-have for families and great for athletes, runners, cyclists and outdoor sports activities. Plan the healthiest day with health recommendations, 48-hour forecasts, and check the real-time global air quality map. Learn what pollutants you are breathing, their sources and effects and stay informed about key air quality and wildfire breakouts in your area.

+ Historical, Real-time, and Forecast Air Pollution Data: Detailed figures on key pollutants and AQI for over 500,000+ locations in 100+ countries, made clearly understandable. Follow air pollution trends with enhanced month-long and 48h historical views for your favorite locations.

+ Leading 7-Day Air Pollution and Weather Forecast: For the first time, plan your outdoor activities for the healthiest experiences a whole week ahead. Wind direction and speed forecasts to understand the wind’s impact on pollution.

+ 2D & 3D World Pollution Maps: Explore real-time pollution indexes around the globe, both in a 2D panoramic view, and mesmerizing heatmapped AirVisual Earth 3D modelization.

+ Health Recommendations: Follow our advice to lower your health risk and achieve minimum exposure to pollutants. Relevant information for sensitive groups with asthma or other respiratory (pulmonary) diseases.

+ Weather Information: Your one-stop for temperature, humidity, wind, current conditions and forecast weather information.

+ Wildfire and air quality events: Stay informed on wildfires, smoke, and air quality events worldwide. See alerts and track events on an interactive map with real-time & historical data, forecasts, news updates, and more.

+ Pollen counts: View tree, weed & grass pollen counts for your favorite places and protect yourself from allergies. Plan your outdoor activities with 3-day forecasts.

+ Realtime and Historic Monitoring of 6 Key Pollutants: Track live concentrations of PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, sulphur dioxide and carbon monoxide, and observe pollutants historical trends.

+ Real-time air pollution city ranking: Track the best and worst cities by air quality and pollution for 100+ locations worldwide, based on live PM2.5 concentrations.

+ “Sensitive Group” Air Quality Information: Relevant information and forecasts for sensitive groups, including respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses, such as asthma.

+ Extended Historical Data Graphs: View air pollution trends over the past 48 hours, or daily averages over the past month. 

+ Control your air purifier: Remotely control & monitor your Atem X & HealthPro series air purifiers for safer indoor air quality with live & historical data, comparisons, filter replacement alerts, scheduled on/off and more.

+ Indoor & Outdoor Air Quality Monitoring: Synchronization with IQAir AirVisual Pro and AirVisual Outdoor air monitors to provide readings, recommendations, and control monitor settings.

+ Air Pollution Community News: Stay up to date on air pollution current events, medical findings, and developments in combating global air pollution. 

+ Educational Resources: Build your understanding of PM2.5 and other air pollutants and learn how best to live in polluted environments with respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses such as asthma. 

+ Worldwide coverage with the most extensive network of air pollution sensors: monitor United States, China, India, Singapore, Japan, Korea, Canada, Australia, Mexico, Brazil, France, Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Chile, Turkey, Germany + more - as well as cities such as Los Angeles, Sacramento, New York, Chicago, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia, San FranciscoSeoul, Mumbai, New Delhi, Tokyo, Mexico City, Bangkok, London, , Paris, Berlin, Ho Chi Minh City, Chiang Mai + more - in one place!
