summary: The reliable and trusted global air quality, wildfire, pollen, PM2.5 forecast

scraped_reviews.content: Very helpful. I like to open the windows at night, but I am in the "sensative" group for air quality. Canadian wild fire smoke was a problem last year and seems to be again, so I downloaded the app so I can plan better. I found it easy to select the reporting station I wanted. I chose one run by the state EPA rather than a private station, but the map shows all the close monitors so I can see how variable the readings are.

Where I live (Town of 30,000, and about 70,000 in a 30 mile radius), we get a lot of forest fire smoke in the summers, and temperature inversions in the winters, and air quality can be worse than a lot of large cities. I use the app to determine safe times to do rigorous exercise outdoors. I plan to add an outdoor sensor and add it to their network, and a couple of indoor sensors as well. The user interface, while descent, needs some work as it is not the most intuitive.

I like it for the most part. However, I wish there was a threshold alert option for PM 2.5 levels, as this is the most relevant during wildfire season. My area had an air quality alert, and I didn't find out until 2 days into it from a completely different app! The particulate matter was quite dangerous, but didn't trigger an AQI alert. This seems like a major design flaw! I had physical symptoms from the bad air, but could not figure out the cause. More alert options would help

Battery eater, but good air quality data. I like the data, the widgets, and the app. The app alerts/notifications and map were not intuitive and it took me a few minutes to figure out - I'd imagine less technologically inclined people may be easily frustrated by it. I also plan to uninstall this when the wild fire season ends, because my battery dies so quickly with this app installed. If I didn't need info for the "sensitive" category, I don't think I'd keep it installed.

Every time I open the app the ad for the other things they sell opens. Every time! And it's so slow because of this. When I first downloaded the app it didn't do this. I don't mind some ads here and there, but every time!?! I also wish there was more to the weather reports. I really would love one good app for air quality and weather.

Very inaccurate! According to the app, the measuring device is only a couple of streets from where I live, so walking distance away. Yet the temperature it shows is about 15 degrees higher than it really is. That's a huge difference and doesn't make me trust the allergens measurements, which was the reason I installed the app. Today it put the allergy reading in green and said that the quality was good, even though I've had lots of trouble breathing. Useless app, uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Helena, thanks for your feedback. The temperature information is not from the monitoring station but a weather information data source. If you doubt the accuracy of the pollutant data, please let us know the station name, we will check the data.

scraped_reviews.content: Very Helpful! Works great overall. I do wish the notification would automatically refresh the AQI number without having to open the app, but otherwisw...very good. I live in CO and wildfire smoke is a major AQI problem the past couple of summers. I have small kids, and being able to get data in real time helps us decide whether to let them play outside.

Pretty good app, really like that it does the air quality up in the status bar of my phone. It's often close to Purple Air, (the best data on air quality, not it's in app form.) Wish there were a sensor closer to our house, though, and I don't have the $$ to shell out for one myself. It could use some work changing between locations so you can check Quality where you're going, not just where you are, and it's really hard figuring out how to add locations. Also, the forecasts are inaccurate.

No air quality visuals on map like website. It's 100% better on the website, even on your mobile browser. The clunky earth option on the map view of the app isn't accurate at all when compared with the website map. For now, broswer bookmarks of the locations you want to monitor is still best. Gotta search for the places on Google though, then go into map view and bookmark it, because just moving the map around then making a new bookmark doesn't work.

I'm glad I found this great app to track the smoke concentrations from our horrible wildfires. Seems very accurate so far. Helps me know when I should be wearing an N95 mask outside because the odor isn't reliable after you've been in it for awhile. One thing I would like though is to be able to eliminate extra foreign cities in the notification widget when you have that set to "on". Don't need Paris, Seoul or Bejing displayed at top.

Would have kept it installed, but it was misidentified my location by about 20 miles. When you live in a wildfire risk area, the smoke and air quality overall can be significantly different with that margin of error. Worse still, though I could add my actual city/location to my favorites, the wrong city still appeared as the always on notification. That's really what made this less useful and convenient than simply googling my AQI at random. Oh well.

Extremely helpful, has tiny bit of clunkiness. The app, as said in that first bit: only issue I have is that it has points where the way the interface works could be improved. BUT, I would recommend it to anyone wanting a pollution tracker. I need to keep track daily, as I move from city to city, country to country, of the pollution levels and decide when to wear a mask to combat it for health and my voice. If wondering get it and try it. Ive been very pleased.

Clunky UI that makes everything more difficult than it needs to be. Even selecting a location to add requires selecting the continent, country, state and then city instead of simply being able start typing a city to get possible matches. Forget about searching by zip code and things like that. And the UI will allow you to set alerts without selecting a location from your list even though such alerts don't do anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for the feedback. You can type the city or country name at the search bar on top of the screen to search for any location, without going through the selection option. Please contact our team in the live chat via this link: https://support.iqair.com if it doesn't work for you. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: With the fires burning again in the Napa valley and vicinity, the Bay Area is filling with smoke - I can smell it outside and in my home. This was the only app that gave me a no nonsense access to the data from nearby weather/air quality stations. There are not a lot of them but enough to gauge the quality in my local area better than all these other forecasts. Your experience will depend on whether you have any of those stations in your vicinity. Otherwise the app is great. Thank You to makers!

The UI is perplexing; it apparently selects the closest monitor with a name that doesn't mean anything even though there's another monitor thats slightly closer.    Clicking on the monitor name doesn't show the map (or option for it); you have to bring up the separate map section and figure out where your monitor is and add other nearby monitors to your favorites.   Once figured out, it's quite useful for it's purpose but the UI needs to be simplified.

Not sure what's happened over the past 4-5 days it's no longer giving me notifications on my device. Caught me so off guard the wildfire smoke came through and my asthma went haywire. I have to open the app itself now (never even looked at it before) and it's outdated as much as a day. I've been stuck inside with air cleaners running on max. I need a working app.

I'm concerned as to how accurate this app is. The air quality for both American and Chinese indexes always seems to be a bit off or latent. I still enjoy the app for a basis, but I never seem to fully agree with the data after cross referencing elsewhere and being outside. I also live in Taiwan and the air quality can be very temperamental, but that's all the more reason I need an accurate index. To knock another star off, this app does not contain localized information for Shoufeng Township, which is a large area and roughly 10 miles from the closest data point. In fact, much of Taiwan is without direct data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear Nate,

Thank you for you feedback. We are sorry that you don't have any precise data close to your place of living. We hope to be able to provide more air quality information for Taiwan very soon.

The AirVisual team

scraped_reviews.content: The devices are stellar, but the numbers that display on the app map reflect a 24 hour average, so they're always off for current conditions. What's the point of that? I don't give a damn what the pollution was like yesterday. The only way this stuff is useful is if it's providing real time data. I hear their competitor updates their map every 10 minutes, which actually makes sense. Meanwhile, I can't sync my devices to show up on the better app's map. Absurd.

This an awesome app! It gives the accurate air quality and also has timelines if the air will worsen or improve during the day or week. It will also give notifacations if the air quality is Unheatlhy+. And it can track ANY location even if you are not in your normal country/city/state, which is a musthave for traveling! If you are those people who are alarmed about weather/air conditions (like me) you should download this! Giving it a 5 star!! 😃

Very helpful with all of these fires lately. There are multiple options to get reminders of the air quality (a constantly updating notification, daily notifications, etc). It's nice because it's not in the way but there when you need it. Also the ads are practically non-existent, probably because they have their own air quality products for sale.

I liked the app until I realized that the data isn't very reliable. Apparently the source closest to my location is consistently an outlier and stays 30-50 points higher than any other nearby source. For example, the closest source currently reports AQI 162, but other nearby sources (within a few miles each) report 128, 130. 138, 139, and there is one that is 88. Also It isn't clear whether the data comes from an indoor or outdoor sensors.

The information provided by this app is critically useful; however, over 3 years later and the city names on the map are still way too small to read on my mobile device, really tiny, and when you zoom in the names shrink again so it's tough to orientate. I can't even find Lake Tahoe at times. There are no state lines on the map. I will continue to rely on this app and its map to see local and other areas' air quality, but I would sure like a Font Size setting.

Great app to help me plan outside activities/exercise with my littles. It's simple and accurate for current air quality. It's expensive to start ones own station, or I'd do it. Prediction of future air quality isn't great, but not much worse than weather predictions. I would assume predictions can be very challenging with so many factors at play, so I'll give them a pass on that.

I've been a contributor for years now (that is: I have my own air monitoring station). this app is phenomenal. There is one repetitive bug where the "IQ Air Earth" map on the Map tab doesn't load properly--but this isn't a big deal. By closing/killing & restarting the app, this fixes it every time. No other complaints at all. It's a scary world, especially now that America doesn't regulate pollution anymore. It's more important than ever to know what's floating around in the air.

I live in one of the areas with the worst air quality in the US. Because of this more than half the population has asthma or severe allergies. This app is so useful to know when I can open my windows to air out my home and when I should cancel outdoor activities such as gardening, walking in the park, washing the car etc because we literally get to the red on air quality 🫤 Works great and the notifications are timely.

App works great to advise air quality near you, and also for any other locations you add to your list. It also notifies us when the air quality changes. We are near the Ports of LA and LB, and sometimes the pollution is really bad, so being able to know if we should close the house and start our air filters is really valuable.

Considering that this app is free and does not have a subscription service required nor makes you watch ads in order to use it I think it is remarkable the amount of information that is given away here, I don't usually like reading apps but this one I feel like I have a moral responsibility because honestly it's so much good content being given to me for free leaving you guys a radius the least I could do so thank you for this awesome data

Just a terrible app. Will randomly choose a random station. Which will sometimes be the closest one your location and at other times, is literally in another state. There's literally no way to control this. It'll just do what it wants to. You literally can't control their widget either because it'll just change location on its own will. Just an awfully designed app

huge discrepancy in data this app does not show consistent data many other apps are showing widely different pollution levels, government data is significantly lower and shows in the green why this app always shows red or severe, also another app which uses its own installed device is showing green. if this app is using its own metrics and benchmark like it claims it is useless because it does not reflect the true reality.

Hilariously broken on foldables. The UI is a complete disaster on large screens with elements cut off, scaled incorrectly, overlapping or not showing altogether. Imagine not having foldable support in 2025. Instead of pushing your AQ monitors nonstop, how about fixing your mobile client? If standard material design controls were used instead of custom garbage this wouldn't be a problem! This also applies when the app is running in Samsung DeX.
At first they was well synchonized data from other brand. However, currently, they just randomly sync the data , instead of hourly sync. After contact their support, they try tp sell their sensor.

I know my limits that I start to have greater issues with breathing. about 57 is the point where I stay inside as much as possible. it is quite amazing how 1 point makes such a difference. my only complaint is the pollen levels are not working and other parameters are not finished yet.

Amazing app! I wish it didn't collect my device data for advertising but otherwise awesome! I'm SO OBSESSED with the 1x1 widget!! Nobody ever makes those, and the struggle for space on my home screen is real. AND I'm between sensors so having a quick view in a small space is perfect. I would love to see a proposed reason - looking upstream and seeing why quality is poor. Ex. "Wildfire in Burlington Canada" or a widget that shows a specific number (pm2.5 is my main concern.

please make the place display more compact. there is tons of wasted space on weather, cutesy faces, whitespace, etc. it would be great if you could fit six or eight compact, color coded locations on the screen. right now you can only see three! save all the details for when you click.
This app is great to monitor the air quality in your city/town. It also shows my exposure statistics and offers items such as air purifiers and air monitors!

Love this app. It is a game-changer! Real-time air quality updates for my city and neighborhood help me plan my day and breathe easier. The visuals are clear, and the health tips are super helpful. Simple, informative, and a must-have for anyone who cares about clean air!

I used this app successfully and with gratitude for years, but this summer it will not function at all. I have tried un- and re-installing a couple of times, no change. The problem seems to be that it says there is no internet connection, although both wifi and cell data are available and working. Android 15 on a Samsung A53. I really miss this app and smoke notifications.

I like this app. I hope to contribute my own air quality monitor in the future and contribute that data. I have a few requests about the app which I'll try to send via your website but in the meantime I would ask if the map could automatically centre on my location when opening map mode, and for the map to not zoom in quite so much when going to my location - I doubt there are many places with more air quality stations on the map than my city and it still zooms in too much. Should zoom to show 3

I live by the fires going on in BC and with the sky full of smoke it's been nice having an app I can just pop over to and check the air quality. I got the app because I was starting to have headaches just taking my kid to school and after checking the app it made sense to why I was getting them. I have had ZERO ads which is amazing, and I can see the surrounding areas air quality with the groups for higher health risk. 10/10 for me.

In general, the app works well. However, every 5 days or so, the widgets quit working. I have to delete and recreate. This has now occurred 4 times. The widgets should also update without having to open the app.

Great app - BUT - the lack of a dark mode makes it basically unusable. Like most I expect, I check this first thing every morning to know how to prepare for the day. And since I am seldom wearing sunglasses and SPF 50+ at 04:00, the blinding glare is debilitating (and that's WITH the blue light filter set to maximum).
A very good app, helping a lot in checking air quality around me, so that me and my family adjust ourselves accordingly.

Really expensive !!!! if you want to be a contributor you need to pay 350 euros to get a sensor !!!!They haven't found a way to reimburse you a small amount monthly for example, at least to reimburse you for part of the purchase, No !! Full price for you !! You to contribute, tear up your wallet !!!
Super helpful to be able to get an accurate air quality reading anywhere you need to know.

with more and more wildfires every summer, this app has been super helpful and is easy to use. It's especially great here in Western Washington where the terrain can make the air quality vary quite a bit between nearby areas.
the widget is always in "refresh" state, and to refresh i have to open the app. not quite the point of a widget.
very accurate and good app. but there should be a feature that tells how many cigarettes do we intake in this aqi 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

Absolutely fantastic, it's really cool how anyone can get a monitor and add to the data. I'm hoping to get one in the future. Took off two stars until they fix widgets for Android 15 - otherwise this is a 5 out of 5 star program.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback, and sorry for the inconvenience. If you have more information to share, please get in touch with our team so that we can better assist you: support.ch@iqair.com.

scraped_reviews.content: So far, so good 👍🏾 I downloaded this to have a tool for understanding when I need a mask outdoors because the Saharan Dust made me sick again, and I'd like to avoid it better in the future. I'll see how reliable it is in its forecasting, but so far I think it's going well. I plan to mask up whenever the rating goes from green to yellow.

Great Daily Notification tool!!! I use this app every night before bed and throughout the night to check the air quality. I use it to decide if or when to open my windows since the Gifford fire is so close to Santa Maria (CA). It has really helped to make this wildfire ordeal more bearable. Thanks so much!

scraped_reviews.content: Good exercise selection and combination, no distracting music, good readable design and a well understandable voice. Two things keep me from giving it 5 stars but I will eventually revise when they get fixed: 1. The exercise videos only play during the pauses, sometimes it would be great to see them during the exercise. 2. I once missed registering the rest day, so the rest day and the next exercise day were lumped together and I lost my streak. It would be great to be able to edit days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your kind words. The exercise videos should be playable during the workouts as well. Please send us a screen recording showing the issue you mentioned via "Settings - Feedback". We'll try to identify and resolve the issue. We'll also consider optimizing the interaction for rest days in future updates to enhance your user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: I have no problems with the app, and I like the workout plan I selected. You can rate your workout when you finish each one so if what you're doing is too hard then the app will adjust the next workout to be a little easier until you get the one that works best. The workouts will gradually get harder, and that is what helps you get in better shape. Vise versa if they are too easy. It does take a subscription, so beware of that. Push the site a bit and you could probably get a good price a bit.

I'm on day 18 of my journey and I like it. The app was a bit clunky to navigate at first, but I bought the premium, answered the questions at the beginning, the app created my 4 week plan. I had to have exercises that are easy on my knees be side of arthritis and not only are they easy on my knees but they are starting to feel better. The work out themselves are great, hit start and just follow along as it takes you through warm-up(would like variation) then the workout. I am feeling stronger.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello dear! Thanks so much for your sharing and glad to know you're enjoying your experience with our app! We are committed to bringing you the best support in your fitness journey, and will definitely keep improving our workout design to bring you a better experience. If possible, a 5-star rating would really encourage us! Thanks in advance!🌹

scraped_reviews.content: I am 2 months postpartum with my third child and haven't done much deliberate exercise in the last 4 years. The set-up questionnaire was very smartly designed to accurately size up your fitness and goals. I just finished my first workout and it was PERFECT. Just hard and Short enough, allowed for modifications, and I actually feel energized after it (haven't felt that from a workout in a longgg time). I have a feeling I might want the membership after the 7 Day Free Trial!

I don't understand all the good reviews. This app just took my to a registration web site that collects your fitness information, charges you for a plan, and then requires you to install another app (Mad Muscles) to access the workouts. The registration process is confusing enough that I inadvertently paid for access to some ridiculous extra articles. When I complained and asked for that part to be refunded, I just got a reply pointing me to "no refunds" policy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Sorry for the inconvenience. It seems you accidentally clicked on an ad, leading you to another page. You can return to our app with your device's back button. We'll also report this ad to the relevant team to take necessary actions. As for the refund, please contact the official account of the organization you mentioned for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is perfect for everyone! The app builds you a routine based on how you answer the questions when it first opens. From there a colada scope of fitness possibilities opens up before your eyes. Whether your just a beginner or been away from exercise for a minute, beginner, or we'll trained gym enthusiasts, there's an exercise for you. Upper body, lower body, full body work out, it's all there. For the small price of this app, you will be doing your muscles a favor, and your wallet also!

In going back to the basics right at beginners level. There's no shame here because I'm being real with myself (I haven't worked out for quit some time). Plus, I'm doing this at my own will. Just finished doing my first day training as a beginner and already felt somethings of my body that I forgot I could feel again, and that feeling is awesome! Also, I'm a stress person. This isn't just about working out for me but also to lessen my stress level and to have a healthier, productive lifestyle.

The app asked me which days I wanted to train (I selected Mon/Tue/Fri), which made me believe it would create a custom schedule around those days. After paying, this was completely ignored and I was forced into a fixed 28-day plan with daily sessions and preset rest days. I had to manually set reminders as a workaround — not ideal and not what was advertised. Workouts themselves seem decent enough, but the onboarding feels like a bait-and-switch. I won't be renewing my subscription
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi William! Sorry for not meeting your expectation. We appreciate your feedback and will consider improving the workout schedule to better meet users' needs. If you have any other issues when using our app, please reach out via Me → Settings → Feedback. We'll try our best to help you! 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: It's really good! That's all there is. You can choose your goal, and it gives you a workout plan that it guides you through. You can pay a subscription fee if you really want, but the ads don't show up during the workout anyway, and it also doesn't block Spotify so you can listen to music while you're at it!

It has no equipment, especially it's calculate the weight and height and it's easy to do the workout everywhere. And I appreciate the guides for help to me. The only disadvantage is that the duration of the total workout is only 14 mins. Please increase the duration of 60 mins.

for some reason I can't open the 28 day basic free routine, without doing a 7 day free trial and subscribing. So what's up with this? If it is decent workout I probably would get a years subscription. So I'm not doing anything until they get their act together one way or another. You either offer one or the other. Don't advertise one thing and expect people to do another.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello John! Kindly note that our basic version is 100% free. You can click the "X" button to exit the purchase page and enjoy brilliant workouts for different target areas on the "Plan" page without any payments. Besides, the paid workouts can be unlocked by watching ads. If this helps, please consider giving us more stars! 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great app, but I hate that the input screen disappears every time I go to enter in the weights or sets numbers. each digit has to be re entered then you have to bring the screen up for the second or third digit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jeremy! Thanks for bringing this to our attention. The issue will be fixed in our next version. Please stay tuned for the future release and update the new version in time. Any other problems, please contact us again via "Me - Settings - Feedback". We will do our best to improve our app to provide you with better services! 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: Such a good App! I am 145kg currently at the moment. and I just finished my first day complete which leads me to Google App to rate this wonderful and easy App if you dont have a personal Trainer. it was easy and Im so glad I found this App.

It giving you a few excersize can be useful for someone that has never moved before, but you will quickly notice that 90% of the exercises are the same few basic ones, that they sprinkled some glitter on... You will make unnecessary movements that will only mess up your form. The video tutorials are good and showing you the movement, the little tips are good for beginners. But for anyone that does this for more than a month you'll quickly grow out of the app and need to do some research yourself
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Blender! Thanks for your feedback. Our workouts are programmed to gradually increase in intensity over time to ensure a steady and healthy progression. We'll also take your feedback seriously and keep improving our workout design. You may explore extra workouts on the "Discover" page for more variety. Any other feedback, please let us know! ❤️

scraped_reviews.content: woo!!! here I'm sweating well thanks to this app I'm on my way to achieve a great shape every man should have. well I have used different home workout apps but this one is the best so far. Let's go 💪🏽💪🏽💪🏽

beautiful app worked my whole body I love it.this is app is incredible. Allows for all kinds of ages gender and work outs. If you have weights, no weights. if u go to the gym or home . If you want to do heavy or light. It's up to u....and this here coach. Try it you will enjoy it and who knows you might start liking your self again especially in the mirror 💘
It is a very cool application I like to add music in the gym app now I found it and it's really work I have become stronger than before and I also like all of the exercises that are simple and easy
Nice for doing exercise at home. It sometimes shows adds but its completely fine. It makes our goals clear which help us achieve them.
They walk you through step by step and give you the option to skip the rest period if you are in a hurry. I was also introduced to some workouts that I had never seen before.
Quite a workout each time I jump into this application and the whole process of having a voiceover while working out is splendid.
With determination and focus, training becomes more friendly and interesting. Consistency in training boosts physical improvement. it's a nice app but the ads delay high morale.

I'm giving this app 5 stars ⭐ because of its work it gives me more and more workouts and you can make your training plan and do them everyday and give the option to skip the rest time I LOVE WHAT I SAW .....

I want the whole plan for free , if you people will give one time plan free then we will download your app again in our life whenever we will miss you or want to learn from you then we will purchase your plan next time I just want this because your plan is in dollars and it is also little little bit expensive. but next time when I will download this app for my cousin brother then I will download it . thank you your first day is little bit hard but when I will start it regularly it be easy

The exercises and dynamics are pretty much the same as with the other apps. What I find annoying is that stretching after exercise isn't part of the routine. Also, doing only abs without balancing with exercises for at least the lower back with it can actually be hurtful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Veljko! Glad to receive your valuable feedback. We aim to make exercising enjoyable and effective, and your suggestions really make sense. We'll strive to improve our workout design when planning future updates. Any further feedback, feel free to let us know via "Me - Settings - Feedback". Best regards. 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: it provides a good challenge so far. For what I'm looking to get out of it. I'm in the beginning of this workout regiment. It holds good promise as long as I stay the course. I'll make an edited review a couple months down the road.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cyrus! Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We're glad you're finding the workouts challenging and promising! 😊 If you have any questions or feedback as you continue, feel free to let us know. Would you consider giving us 5 stars? ⭐ Your support means a lot as we work to improve the app!

scraped_reviews.content: very good app for exercise without equipment. I am rating it 5 star for its performance. it is very helpful app for both boys and girls.
Day 1: I find that the exercises push me just enough to feel the burn without wanting to give up. It keeps the goal insight!

I just finished my first workout and it killed me but the movements are tailored to the parameters that you set when creating your profile. This app is everything that you need to get started in hopes of getting fit and strong no matter your size or current health. I'm sticking with this one!! 5 Stars!!
They ask you if you want to skip exercises because of injuries. I chose to skip pushups because of my wrist. The second exercise after squats was pushups.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry for the inconvenience. We take your feedback seriously and will continually work to improve our app to make the workouts more adjustable for different needs. Any other problems, please contact us via "Me > Settings > Feedback". 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: this app is very good for beginners i recommend to use it one thing that disappointed me is they give very easy excercise

very good exercise choices. I am a YouTube influencer and I do videos on extreme exercises but I have never heard of half the exercises the app makes me do it is a great app you can Skip the paying part and just go straight to the workouts I would recommend doing this and I would recommend using this app because it works you hard
what an amazing app. I haven't worked out in 20 years so I needed to go slow. But I used to be in the army so I needed to feel like I was doing something. this is it.
this app will give you commitments where you want to commit. others apps you may want to give up but, this one you set a goal and you will finish it. and you should never give up no matter what.

It's actually a good app and the ads are quick, so i don't even worry about it, the only big bad thing about it is it doesn't kill calories a lot. I sometimes feel my body burning but other times it just feels normal and I'm on advanced I even try hard and it is almost the same, I wish I could make my own routine that I used to do that made burn alot of fat
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Fadumo! Thanks for your feedback. You may also try to adjust the exercise duration and cycles of sets for more challenge or explore the "Discover" page for more intense workouts. We will also look into some improvements when planning future updates to bring you a better workout experience. Thanks for your input! ❤️

scraped_reviews.content: I'm over weight for my age but this app helps me get stronger and skinnier its hard at first but you will get used to it. PS. "it helps you look better for the huzz."

it's awesome! I got a year on sale for $45. For that price it's awesome, for the base price I wonder if it's worth it. If you're like me, it might be! I can't remember exercises on my own, and I find looking at posters on the wall to be not informative enough and reading them on paper too tedious. But this app guides you thru it. And it adjusts for injuries, and all fitness levels. So I can hypothetically use it for life, from hurt to normal to healthy to fit to buff... hopefully. Wish me luck!!
after first session I feel worked! good app easy to use and exercises that affect my whole body.
home workout app it's very important 👌 and give me confidence, power force to anything you want to do guys download the home workout app for you to get the confidence and peace in your life
this the perfect app everyone wants to try this app this have best exercises for fat losses and abs or everything just download and enjoy hard work
Great for exercise routine and it works for everyone. lets get grinding and stopwasting time💪💪💪🔥🔥🔥

if a certain exercise was done with a certain weight, why doesn't the app remember that weight when the same exercise is done again the next time? when typing the weight and number of reps, after each digit, the keyboard disappears from the screen. (pixel 8 pro, default Google keyboard)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Max! Thanks for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and have passed this on to our team for future improvements. Any other suggestions or questions, please reach out via "Me → Settings → Feedback". Thank you again for your input! 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: the experience of the app is very nice but it has very few minutes in a day i think they need to increase the duration

For anyone desiring to begin the challenge of building up their body flexibility or muscle first time in their life, though rating just now in day 1 of the exercise, it's really a hopeful experience for the 28day objective being provided.
I would really appreciate it if you add spine correction or perfect posture exercise
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Noori! Thank you for your suggestion. We truly appreciate feedback like yours, and we'll definitely consider adding related workouts when planning future updates. Any other ideas or needs, please feel free to share with us! 🌹

scraped_reviews.content: Just great in experience for a first timer I would give extra information on the app their is more applinices in My opinion.

your really making full body workouts work for me and making me gain abs triceps forceps and leg muscles. I love this app I will use everyday like I have for a lot of days thank you so much who ever made this app!!!😁😁😁.
wonderful exercises. I feel rejuvinated with the variety of available exercises.

I've just completed day 5 of 28 of the full body workout program, it's testing more muscle than other programs which is great, I was getting a little bored - at 61 I needed a change to get to the next level of my strength and fitness in my all round health journey.
I love this app, the exercises are easy and very intensive, good to good 💯 😊
Nice workout daily help easily work and health. Good application for my body fitness

title: Guns of Boom Online PvP Action
description: • Easy and intuitive controls: get a hang of the game from the get-go and start climbing up the ranks! • Vivid graphics and support for older devices: stunning visuals will keep you glued to the screen, while the hardware requirements remain very moderate. • Engaging PvP battles: enjoy team-based fun across numerous maps and game modes. The adrenaline-filled action never stops in GoB! • Character customization: create a unique hero by using a combination of various perks and equipment skills, and find the perfect look with hundreds of cosmetic items. Creating a flexible build for your play style is as easy as ever. • Regular updates and events: with constant content additions, new features, and colorful themed events, you’ll never be bored. This game just keeps on giving! • Pro Play Mode: eSports events with players from globally acclaimed teams. Can a mobile FPS be truly competitive? You bet! Guns of Boom is a competitive multiplayer FPS with awesome 3D graphics and gripping gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat could learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to spark the interest of competitive eSports players who’re used to extremely challenging and clutch tournament-style battles. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different cunning tactics. Get the ultimate FPS experience with fast-paced matches that take less than 5 minutes on average. The game is on! This game is intended exclusively for users aged 18 and over due to the inclusion of in-app purchases.

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this game when it first came out, and played it whenever I got a chance to. It wasn't very Pay-to-Win, played smoothly, and gameplay was less restricted, allowing you to put together any 4 primary weapons, a pistol and knife, and any three pieces of special gear. Now however, I'm not enjoying the current version of this game- It's loadout system is very restrictive with gear and weapons, and it's very Pay-to-Win now. Plus, I can't manage to get into a match at all.

Don't download. Ruined game. This WAS a fun little shooter with a lot of flexibility. A bit greedy, but well worth the $10 I spent for the season passes. Now it is broken. You can't dominate with skill due to perks that can be bought (p2w)/ammo limit. Also they have specializations now that don't allow the best combos of gear sets or allow duplicate weapons in loadouts. Money grab and constant ads. I am deleting the game and never playing again. Insanely difficult to get good gear also.

Simple rule to this game, to win a lot, you have to spend a lot. Developers have ruined this game. I appreciate that they are trying to make money, but the way the game is setup now it is impossible to be competitive without spending hundreds of dollars. There was initially a F2P setup you could use and be competitive, but they made sure to destroy that. It's fun in lower levels, but as soon as premium guns are unlocked, you're either spending a lot or losing all the time.

Played the game for over a year. Great gameplay, terrible pay to win system. If you're willing to spend $100+ you can win some games very easily, others who want to earn their weapons suffer because of this. Recently spent multiple hours on end playing an event to unlock a gun, and even caved and spent money in the final couple days. Was very disappointed to find that as the event goes on, your odds drastically decrease in winning, and my money was wasted. 995/1000 pieces, and 12+ hours wasted.

Great game! You know what would be really cool, if there was a mode where you could bet "gun bucks" on how you would place once the match is over. It would be a fun way to get upgrades faster etc. For example you bet $500 on coming in top 3 and $1000 you will come in 1st place. At the end of the match the results are posted and the gun bucks are divided up amongst the top 3 players. So you could make a killing. We need an option to get rid of guns we no longer want.

This game is great! I have been looking for a game like this and all the other ones I installed didn't even come close to this. Simple controls and awesome gameplay! But a four star because sometimes it will kick me out of the app and I have to restart another game and also it's a bit laggy. But other than that it was great! I do have suggestion though, could you guys maybe add a battle royale mode? That would just be too cool!

Awesome game, just returned after 2 years. I honestly still love it. One request would be keyboard and mouse controlls for chromebook. If that happened, this game would explode. It would be the most popular fps on chromebook because their isn't any yet. I have it on mine and the game runs great andit is smooth. Keyboard and mouse controls would be the cherry on top.

This game starts off okay. It is fun at first but when you level up, it gets worse. And if you pay for guns, it doesn't help you AT ALL. Trust me. As someone who paid for some stuff, buying new weapons doesn't help you. You will always be put into matches with bad teammates, their trophy system is the worst, some guns are too OP for their own good and even when YOU get them, you'll still lose because of teammates. If you're reading this, don't waste your time, and more importantly your money

Graphics are good, shooting mechanics are probably the best on the play store thanks to auto-fire which takes away most of the difficulty of playing an FPS on touchscreen.   But all that is meaningless in a game that is so extremely pay-to-win, it doesn't even try to hide it. Thus most of your games will be completely lopsided to whichever team has the player with the most decked out weapons and armor thanks to being able to upgrade them with in-game currency or weapons and armor exclusive to premium currency. Its the only game I can think of in which getting the first shot advantage means nothing if the other player can wipe you with a single bullet from their premium guns. Absolutely atrocious balancing.   Don't even get me started on the progression system, which compared to most ftp games, is the slowest I've seen in any game ever. On a good match you can earn 100-200 bucks but weapons cost around 40-70,000 bucks and the daily challenges barely let you scratch 1000 per day. Its obviously designed to get you to grind or pay premium to expedite the leveling process but the former is way too much even by ftp standards, taking 20-30 hours and still not get a single new gun.

This game used to be fun but it became seriously overpowered by all the players who "pay to play". The makers of this game make you put in a serious amount of work and time for basic weapons, gear, and armor, while other players are just paying for it. And getting it immediately. And if you're not doing that, the competition is going to be so staggering and you're not gonna have any fun because your just gonna get merked the whole time. It's no longer fair play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Almost anything in Guns of Boom (except for unique customisation) can be obtained for free by simply playing the game, completing daily quests and participating in events. If you die too often, don't forget to upgrade your armor, use consumables, learn maps and find proper weapon/armor combinations for your play style. Good luck in battle!

scraped_reviews.content: I played this game for a few years and finally just deleted it. The issues with it just became too much. The players that pay real money are at such an advantage that it's not even fun to play anymore. And the matchmaking is deeply flawed. I ended up switching to Call of Duty Mobile and the experience is SOOOO much better. The game more balanced, the graphics are better and there's a battle royale mode too. I'd come back to GoB if they had separate modes for people who pay and people who don't.

Simply amazing! Not one for paying games on my phone bit since getting this game it's all I do! Found my new addiction! #GOB Update: ever since they switched to the new layout where u have to change ur weapons and defense system and whatnot, IT SUCKS!!! I was such a huge advocate of this game but now I find it just to be an app that takes up a lot of space and RARELY gets used....damn shame, was such a fun game, ever heard of the saying "leave well enough Alone"??????

If you guys made the matchmaking more even instead of having one team with a 1.2 k/d ratio average and the other with a 2.0+ average, and made it easier to get good guns. I've played off and on for awhile (year) and still don't have one of the guns you have to unlock by having pieces. Granted I don't spend $ and don't play all day everyday, but you shouldn't have too. Easily could be a 5 star game.

Absolutely loved this game before the recent update! After the update, it is completely a P2W game! Other players either have weapons that you cannot even acquire, or weapons that you have to pay at least $50 to be competitive with. Where is the fun in that?! It is COMPLETELY INSANE! I can't express just how very disappointed I am with the developers. I used to play this game DAILY! I truly don't think I'll be back to play until changes are made. Who wants to play when people cheat also?

This game is immensely fun at first, but it quickly becomes apparent that it's pay to win. People spend their money buying guns that are significantly better than anything you will have for quite some time by playing for free. Tread with caution. Response to developer: It's true that most content is unlockable by simply 'playing the game', but the truly powerful items are so outrageously priced that it's unfeasible to get them without shelling out cash or thousands of hours of gameplay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Almost anything in Guns of Boom (except for some skins and costumes) can be obtained for free (by simply playing the game, completing daily quests and participating in events). And your skills are more important than any payments, but your enemies constantly improving their skills too, so train hard and find a clan to achieve better results.

scraped_reviews.content: Games of Boom = Hours of nonstop action. Super fun and totally addictive. In app purchases are a must for serious competitors. But if you're in it for the thrill and just shoot off some steam then upgrading your guns and gear shouldn't be a priority. Make some friends and battle side by side together. Create or join a Clan. Reduce some stress and let's get fraggin!!!! **In case you couldn't tell, I LOVE THIS GAME!!!!

The developers keep introducing new equipment into a game that is full of bugs. All they want is your money. Win you give it to them so you can get all the best guns they make a better gun and ask for more money. The game lags, you get kicked out of games and lose rewards. They say they cant give them back but they developed the game. You mean to tell me you cant give me my due rewards but you can develop the game, new weapons, maps, etc. This game is a joke. No longer fun.

I worked hard and paid money for top tier weapons. Later when they came out with new weapons they weakened the ones I earned/paid for. It's a scam to constantly get pay for new weapons. Don't bother, it's a money grab. I also think the games are predetermined using connection, the lag is awful sometimes then other times it feels like I'm fighting bots that can't touch me all while using the same connection.

I have to say the gameplay is great but if u don't spend 100's of dollars on the game you are useless by the time you hit level 50(fully upgraded). the game starts pairing you with people with better equipment and guns which makes you lose everything you worked for. I'm finding this out because I just reached level 50. I am starting not to enjoy the game. also there is always lag so be prepared for it

Whats more fun than this game? Playing it with others. Its very difficult to find an active clan to combine skills with. The find clan feature is outdated and awkward to use. It'd be nice to have a global chat feature, its one of the best ways to find active players in any game. 3rd party apps are cool, but why not have it all in game? Fun graphics, easy controls, and cool guns.. Just a bit lonley.

Nice? It used to be nice. It was fun at one point. Right before they introduced classes. Now you can no longer run fast with your shotgun and quickly fire your sniper rifle, or machine gun. Lame. Plus you have to spend gold to get classes. Gold=real money Two guns in each class and one has to be an assault rifle. I dont know about you but I got one good AR and now I have to spend more gold for another one? Let's face it, this game is all about them getting richer at the cost of our fun.

You play alot of bots starting out I think. Then you move to the 2000 score range and are way out classed. You can unload a gun on a player and hit him with a grenade and then he two shots you with a shotgun. It takes forever to level up. on top of all this, they keep you just out of range of new weapons; unless you spend your hard earned paychecks. lastly, you can have a level 5 gun that doesn't touch an enemy, and the enemy with a level 1 gun 1 shot you.

Great game but it's changed from when it first started. Now it seems like you have to shell out money for power ups. Boosts, gold for better weapon, etc. Not to mention the price for most of the weapons to level up is rediculous. And the time you have to spend playing just to level up? C'mon GameInsight, surely you're not that hard up for cash? That's why I am only giving this game 3 stars. Make leveling up faster and the weapons cheaper in-game, and I'll give it 5.

Game is fun at first and is based on skill. But later becomes a pay to play. Ranking system isnt good since recent updates youll find yourself fighting against other players with better weapons and more health than you. What was a fun game at lower ranks becomes a game that will make u rage quit and wish u had invested your time in a different game. Really a shame tho cuz there arent many games with this kind of multiplayer in the PlayStore. Hope the developers catch on and listen to the players and adjust the game to an even playing field for the ranking and weapons system. Then it would be a skill based game. As of now once you reach rank 39 its unbalanced and unfair.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kris! Thank you so much for your such an honest and detailed review - it will definitely help us to improve the game in future. Meanwhile, if you have more ideas or suggestions, feel free to join our official Facebook page or Discord server (discord.gg/gunsofboom).

scraped_reviews.content: I recently changed my rating from 5 to 1 This game has changed too much. Haven't installed in a while, and now it's too much like fortnite. The weapons are way too unbalanced. The purchase system is ridiculous, and not to mention the damage system, like using a full mag of a shotgun and it still doesn't kill?! Full LMG and the person keeps on going! This is unfair and doesn't make for a fun experience. This used to be the best mobile experience but not the case anymore. Absolute garbage now!

It's a pretty fun and good looking game for the phone especially In the shooters genre the main problem is the same with every freemium game, if you can pay money you have the advantage. My main problem i have is the fact that the support items such as healing or grenades are limited items as well as cost the currency you will probably get enough of in 1 day to buy 10 of each when you need many, would be a little more fair if you could at least make those able to be purchased with guncash not gold .

Just another money grab game. I would suggest not even getting started on it. It starts off fun and competitive until you reach around level 20. Which will not take long to get there if you're any good at FPS. Then you're matched you up with players who's guns will leave you no chance. UNLESS you drop $$$. It looked into getting a same rifles. Talking like around $100. Just another money grab game. What started out as a great game turned into a big let down. Uninstalling after this review.

Way too much kill stealing. I do 90% damage to an opponent and a teammate comes along and shoots him once and they are rewarded with the kill and i get an assist? Issue NEEDS to be fixed. How is that justified? Gameplay is fun, dont get me wrong. Also, further into the game almost requires you to make in game purchases using real money. Otherwise, winning and having fun is no longer an option.

**EDIT** I came back to try the game out, faced with invisible enemies, getting shot through trucks, boxes and walls which is sad. Hasn't been fixed. WOW. Like to p2w? Wanna get ahead of the curve for a season and buy the best bundles? Get this game and pay hundreds of dollars to go up against hackers who never get banned and watch out, for them deals because you might buy something and itll be offered for 75% off the next day! Yes what a wonderfully designed poop game.

This is a fun and addictive game. You have various guns that can be used depending on what style of play you prefer. However this game is very much pay to win. They released an assault rifle that is almost as powerful as the max assault rifle but was available to anyone willing to pay a bit of $$$. The opponent stands absolutely no chance. Also match making is a bit unfair so even if you can pick up their gun they will have more armor than you so they will easily kill you!

There was a time when this game was entertaining and required actual skill. That time has unfortunately passed. With the addition of more and more "event-exclusive", overpowered weapons that are virtually unattainable to F2P players, the game became pay to win. Do you want to stand in place, facing an opponent, both of you unloading your clips into each other to determine which of you sunk more money into virtual weaponry? Well then this is the game for you!

Do you love multiplayer games that use Predatory matchmaking systems to "encourage" players to spend money? Do you love losing as many as 25 games in a row (I counted) to the same two or three maxed out weapons that have obviously been paid for? Do you love getting one-shot almost right after spawning from the very first player you see? Well, have I got a game for you!!!

I've been playing since 18', over the past 2 years, the game has become.. boring, I guess is the best way to say it. The lack of creativity and effort has made me pretty much stop playing. Used to do things for the month major holidays, allow you to unlock outfits, guns, ect. That's pretty much come to a halt. It really sucks, because this used to be a game I stayed on for hours, and looked forward to playing. Hope you guys bring back the talent and the effort that made this game awesome.

love the game. one thing I dislike is how ridiculously long it takes to upgrade weapons it's insane I understand you need to make money but I've spent money and it's still just gets to be ridiculous, like you expect the average player to put $1000 into the game. another thing I'd recommend is after you finish a game instead of going back to main menu you should automatically put the same players into another match with the obvious option to leave if they wish.

So before updating the game it worked just fine. But after I update, the game absolutely refuses to put me in a battle. It will either go to the loading screen, stop loading, or just not do anything no matter how much I press the battle button. If I do get in a game, within 10 seconds it will tell me that an error has occured and send me to the loading screen. Please fix this.

Hate the new update, they've taken away awards for certain actions you do in game so it takes much longer to save up and buy a new weapon, unless you purchase with real money. For example, they used to give $6 for each double elimination, $2 for knife kill, etc. So at the end of battle, you got certain amount of money PLUS whatever achievements you were able to do during the game. Not anymore. Unless they bring that back I will be looking for a new pvp fps.

It would be nice if we could decide which matches we want to play in, death or points. It's frustrating when I have to play points 75% of the time. Playing with others of the same skill, weaponry, would be better. One shot kills not fun and quite unfair. It would be really awesome if within your clan you could trade or send weapons to others. Otherwise it's a pretty good game.

I hate to delete this game because I really like it but your greed stops me from spending my money. You make it unbearable to play for free players. It is so unbalanced and as soon as you don't spend money it stops being fun. I am not willing to spend hundred dollars just to be able to play the game without being matched with people who are overpowered but if I could play the game without needing to spend money I would be inclined to spend hundred of dollars on this game just cusz its fun! I think u going the wrong way. Make the game playable first and the money will follow. Your mismatch is radiculious...

Great game, Great graphics, easy to learn and play. They keep the game play fresh and exciting with new items, maps, and competitive events. It is kind of geared toward pay to win. But, I don't mind paying a few bucks for a developers hard work, and my fun. You definitely can play for free, but be prepared for some frustration until you are leveled up, and spent considerable hours earning some better weapons. Overall, an awesome, very enjoyable game!

Excellent game but leveling up without spending money takes way way too much time! You'd have to spend hours a day for months to earn enough gold to purchase the top weapons. There's no reward for dedicated players without spending tons of cash which makes it difficult to be competitive. The game has turned into a "money grab". I'm downloading "Apex Legends" as I write this whose developers promise will have a more level playing field not ruled by cash.

I have been a player for two years now. Finally decided to give this a much deserved review. For a mobile MMOFPS, with a little shy of Borderlands style CGIs. The auto-aim. with toggle option mind you, is a beautiful concept to incorporate on this platform! Although i never spend money on any in-game currency, I do not believe in purchasing virtual items in ANY and ALL games unless they are extensions or the game software itself, I have yet to become bored! 10-Stars! I recruited 7 friends!!!!!!

Used to be me my favorite fps game, but not anymore. I was one of the first players of this game and it was very simple but super fun back then. Then I stopped playing for almost a year, and when I came back, you can see in ny past review that the game was still fine except for some minor bugs. I stopped playing again for almost another year and now I'm suddenly helpless. Everyone was literally just one shotting me because they had super OP weapons. I could barely get 2 kills in a single match.

This game use to be cool but ever since the last update I can't play a full game without it freezing ...its really annoying when you spend money on a game then not be worth it after because you can't use it properly. What's annoying also is when I contact support all they say is we are working on it . But what's the point of that of I can compete in the red event to get the gun. Always in second cause it shut down in the middle of the game

TURN FOR THE WORSE. I've been down since day one, when it used to be fun. I get there's going to b updates and programmers will attempt to satisfy everyone's needs and desires, but as I look thru the comments it seems that most players arent happy with the gameplay. Matchmaking takes forever. Upgrades on guns are difficult to come by. The extra perks for each level of fighting is difficult to understand. It was better when it was just all guns straight up and that was it.

This is a top game when it comes to phone FPS games. Controls are easy, game play is smooth, its challenging enough to make you work for upgrades but easy enough for still progress. Graphics could be better, it gets laggy at times but nothing that makes it hard for me to play. One of my favorite. Sometimes other opponents arent visible but the gun still reacts. That's weird. Sometimes I wish it were easier to get better guns but that's the greed in me. You have to win like 50 battles in order to upgrade or get enough fragments for the better, special, guns. But like I said it's to be expected. Not impossible. Thanks guys. Its fun

The game's controls were ok. It's controls were not as easy to use as advertised. However, I constantly was getting disoriented. The concept of auto-fire was cool. The healing items running out was rather annoying and to replenish it you needed the game's premium currency! If this game doesn't sound too bad, try this game out for size and see if you enjoy it. You never know!

Cool game for a phone ap overall.. Need to spend too much money or enormous amounts of time in the game if you want to earn new weapons and vests etc. The developers of this game do not seem to prioritize hacking as a big issue. 2 years of playing this game its getting frustrating. They lose a star for this from me. Customers service is horrible if there is an issue.

Such a great FPS. Fragments are a bit tough to come by. It is pay to win for sure with weapon balancing. The team at GI definitely are top notch with the community and what we have to say. Wish that games could be balanced a bit better so others including myself don't get insta-melted by others with $$$$. Fragments are tough to come by and the ranking system has seen some improvements. The challenges are just as it says.. challenging, sometimes grueling. You gotta grind and im okay with that minus some where it would be probably easier with a full team of friends to help out if you play solo like i do. It's Team Fortress without the special abilities. One of the best mp shooters online hands down. GI keeps doing amazing things, the events are some of the best in the biz, and like I said - they truly listen to the community.

Just uninstalled it. It used to be my favorite game, but ever since the update it's unplayable. Everyone has a maxed out Hurricane and Remedy and that's it. You need to have a serious weapon balancing because they are the only two guns that get used. I lost almost twenty matches in a row and it's no longer fun. And get rid of the double click switch weapon option. Constantly switch weapons mid fight and lose.

I've been playing this game since its started. And in the beginning it was almost impossible to get the guns without money. But now with patience and practice you can obtain any weapon you want, go so you dont get stuck with weapons that suck. This game is supercompetive and by far is better than any first person shooter on the competition game play. Very fast and to the point and the only thing I wish we had was the option to communicate via live headphones.... The longer you play the more uc

title: ToonSpace: Comics and Manhwa
description:
✨ Discover your next obsession on ToonSpace! ✨

ToonSpace is the ultimate platform to read webtoons, manga, manhwa, graphic novels, and romantic fantasy. Whether you love romance, BL, GL, drama, comedy, action, thriller, or isekai, we’ve got something for every kind of reader.

📚 What you’ll love about ToonSpace:
📅 New chapters every day — never run out of stories
🎁 Free episodes every week — premium content, no paywall
🌍 Massive global library — ToonSpace Originals, K-content, indie comics
🕒 Binge anytime — thousands of stories, one app
🔔 Stay updated — get notified when your favorite series updates

💡 Want to create your own webtoon?

ToonSpace is more than a reading app — it’s a creative community. Publish your comics, grow your fanbase, and connect with a global audience that supports your storytelling journey.

🌟 Top Genres:

Romantic | Drama | Comedy | BL / GL | Slice of Life | Isekai | Action | Thriller | Supernatural

🖌 Top Features:

+ Easy-to-use comic reader
+ High-quality art and translations
+ Personalized recommendations
+ Offline reading mode

📧  Stay connected with us:

Support: support@toon.space
Privacy Policy: https://toon.space/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://toon.space/terms-of-use.html

scraped_reviews.content: Ilove this app

title: VSCO: Photo Editor
description:
VSCO: Photo Editor & Inspiring Photography Community.
Our community-driven platform empowers photographers to flourish creatively and professionally.

With a comprehensive suite of photo editing tools for mobile photography editing and desktop, and a network for connecting with other creators and businesses, VSCO empowers photographers to develop their unique style and be discovered by the world.
VSCO — powerful tools, creative community, and exposure for all photographers.

PHOTO EDITING
Professional Grade Presets
Our preset library is the best in class for digital photography enhancement. Unlock over 200 curated photo presets, including the beloved member favorite AL3. Excellent for outdoor and indoor image edits and ideal for food and night photography, AL3 uniquely brightens and softens the light in your photos while they appear natural and untouched. Transform your photography with film emulation presets, achieving a timeless vintage film look.

Precise Editing Control
Take control and create the aesthetic you want with our advanced photo editing tools. Elevate your photography with our Grain tool. Effortlessly create authentic film texture, precisely controlling the grain's strength, size, and color for captivating image texture. Beautifully master your tones with HSL color adjustment. Effortlessly refine details using the powerful Dodge and Burn tool.

Photo Filters: Edit your photos with VSCO presets
VSCO presets allow you to elevate your photos quickly and easily. The VSCO app includes 16 of our most popular filters for free. You can edit images immediately without in-app purchases or subscriptions. Our presets craft unique photo looks, offering everything from quiet muted tones to vibrant saturated colors. Unleash your creativity with our expansive photography filters collection.

Camera: A camera app with built-in GIF maker and effects
A new way to create is just a swipe and a tap away for all your photography. Our Camera feature has four camera options: Burst, Retro, Prism, and DSCO, designed to enhance your creative photo capture.

Collage: Craft photo collages in seconds! Rapidly create from pre-set templates or a blank canvas. Customize your one-of-a-kind composition with your photos and adjustable shapes, colors, and sizes. Perfect for photographers to present their work.

Dodge & Burn: Flawlessly perfect highlights & shadows. VSCO’s Dodge and Burn tool empowers creators to expertly shape light, flawlessly correcting common problems and skillfully guiding the eye to the image's focal point, precisely like a traditional darkroom.

VSCO Spaces: Seamlessly share galleries, receive feedback, and enhance your creative process. Spaces are collaborative environments that provide a safe space for creators to workshop ideas, share photography inspiration, and connect through collective galleries. Engage with our creative photo community, designed for photographers.

VSCO MEMBERSHIP
Start your VSCO Membership with a free 7-day trial. After your trial, your annual subscription seamlessly begins. Your VSCO Membership continues automatically. Manage your subscription with ease. Easily cancel your trial before it ends. For assistance or any questions, simply visit vs.co/help to submit a ticket.

Plans for all photographers
Invest in your creativity with VSCO Membership. Join our global community of photographers and creators today.

STARTER (FREE)
Explore your creativity and the VSCO community.
Essential set of editing tools and presets
Post your work to build your personal profile
Collect inspiration from our creative community
PLUS
Discover your creativity and share your photography.
Enhance photos with 200+ presets & advanced mobile tools. Showcase identity brilliantly: Craft your member profile. Enjoy full access to community Spaces & Discussions. Explore our detailed Terms and Conditions https://vsco.co/about/terms_of_use and clear Privacy Policy https://vsco.co/about/privacy_policy.
