scraped_reviews.content: Generally, we love this app. My kids enjoy Wild Kratts, the train track builder, and many more. However, the train track builder needs to be edited to have challenges pop up on the SIDE rather than through the already made tracks. My son is currently in tears because a river just got added to his train tracks and sliced all his tracks in half, making none of them connect. I realize it's supposed to be a challenge, but it doesn't have to destroy what he already made. Please fix this. Thank you.

This is a good app and it's used a lot by our five year old. My only issue, much like the video app, is the data usage. Make SURE you have a WIFI connection or unlimited data. Frustratingly, this app also has issues disconnecting when minimized (currently on Android KitKat, though this has been an issue for awhile now), so you can't be sure the app isn't drawing data unless you manually close it out of the tray. For example you can minimize the app and turn off the phone, but occasionally it will randomly start playing music from the loaded game even when the phone is in "sleep" mode. It's still a good app for kids, but you might have to have some rules governing when it can/can't be used and make absolutely certain it's been completely closed out when your child is done or you can kiss your monthly data goodbye.

It's worth trying the app to see if it works on your device, because it's really a great set of games for kids. I trust the games to be fun, safe, and lacking manipulative marketing. That said, I have to rate it poorly because it's been broken on my daughter's Chromebook for about 6 months. Emails to the developer email listed on the Play Store have fallen on deaf ears. Unfortunate.

It's great, my son loves the games and characters. Where it's kind of a pain is the data management. There is a maximum amount of games it will allow you to keep at one time, but you can't choose WHICH ones to keep or get rid of. The only option is to erase ALL of them and start over with none, if your kid decides they want to try a new one that they don't have yet. Either getting rid of the cap on the number of games, or at least giving an option to manage which games to keep would be nice.

so far its great! a ton of free games to choose from. kept my toddler with a cold distracted and Im sure she'll want to play again! even I enjoy them actually, especially the Arthur games- brings back memories. Also LOVE the kids safe design and that there isn't an unnecessary ad every 5 seconds. I don't think there are any actually but we just downloaded this so I cant say that for sure. Educational games that are actually fun are always a win but so hard to find.. I definitely recommend.

Amazing quality and content of the games. Far more engaging and learning based, while at the same time super kid user friendly and fun for my 3 year old. He's starting to grasp certain concepts quite well due to the quality of learning / game content this app has. He loves a few charcterers from the PBS KIDS shows and the fact that he can play, learn and interact with them brings me joy. Way better than these other ad filled games that suck and make simple game pratically unplayable.
Great app for little learners, my son is a visual learner and loves the bright colors, fun games and songs. We can enjoy playing games together or he can play alone and learn. Highly recommend

I wish I could write negative reviews. This app used to be amazing 5 stars! Now it's horrid I live in New Mexico and we have our own PBS but it keeps reverting the game app to Arizona and it only has 3 games!!!!! I mean the kids' school currently has better access to this game platform than we do at home. Fix it for my 3 kids and I'll go back to the 5-star.
it is an amazing app for when your kids want to play games or watch videos on the go! we take it on vacation with us and when we go out to family events!

Old memories. The best things that you can't can have it's so easy, almost no time at all. So you should get this for your kids, don't have so much fun. They even learn from it, I learned a lot from it. It's just a lost it for a while, love you.

since the beginning of time and we're talking way back we've been fighting odd in our spare time we also like to draw pictures of ourselves we really like this one there's no case too big no case too small at odd squad we do it all and yes that is flying broccoli
This needs some adjusting because my daughter couldn't learn or play anything. It only allowed her to select a character and that's it.
love that you can download so you turn off internet so kids cant download or go to sites they're not supposed to. and you take their favorite games and shows wherever you go. love it love it love it.

so when I first downloaded the game I thought it was going to have scribbles and Ink ⚠️spoiler alert⚠️ it doesn't I might even delete the game I think I'm trippin', never mind guys the scribbles is on PBS kids
The games took a sec to load, but eventually the fully loaded.
No ads is a big win in my book. It is educational as well. My kiddo loves it
crashes or simply doesn't open often. have to uninstall and reinstall
it is for kids and im 7 and its so fun and amazing tor kids and i watch it on my TV and i play on my phone

I installed this app to try and get some childhood nostalgia out of myself, But it only had 3 games. Like why does it only hav that much? There used to be tons of games that used to keep me entertained now. Now There's only 3. What is happening with PBS Kids games? there used to be ready jet go, odd squad, the ruff ruffman show, and more. now there's only 3 things. please fix it to where all of the games will show and then I may reinstall this app and change my review to 5 stars.

The app use to be great on Pixelbook (chromebook), not won't even open. I have gone as far as to powerwash my chromebook to get the game my kids would play to work, that still has not resolved the issue. I can't even get past the boot screen now after the most recent update. Please revert to the previous version. My kids loved the game but can't play it now.

If I could rate it higher I would. My son is 3 and has been using this app for over a year. It is great, user friendly, and offers a wide veriety of games. It's easy enough for him to use without help and the fact that there are no ads make it blissful for me. The games are mostly very educational and I feel they have played a role in his quick development. We love it!

Amazing number of quality games. All educational and age appropriate. The games cover a wide range of skills and interests and the videos are available on demand or as broadcasted "live" as your local public broadcasting station airs them. I love being able to trust the content without worrying.

This app is horable! I tried to download a game off of it for my toddler, and it loads then put a big circle on top of the game. Tried to do it again, with another game and same issue. I thought maybe it was a wifi issue. I go to wherenyou can choose to download content while off wifi. I do the prompts to drag a number here, and it randomly disapears. Then i try to download again and nope, same issue. Seriously a waste of time!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chrystal, we're sorry to hear that you are experiencing problems with the PBS KIDS Games app! Our team would like to help find a solution, but will need more information about your device. Please feel free to contact help@pbs.org for assistance. Hope this helps! - PBS KIDS Team

scraped_reviews.content: So there's a game called slime store which sets the kids up with a store selling slime n the first order of slime is from the mom and is a slime we can't make since we haven't accumulated any coins yet so you can't make the order. We closed the game and tried doing it again with a different order . It's a different order alright but still can't make it bc it has no coins . Very frustrating for my 3yo. They obviously haven't work out the bugs yet

So many of the games on the app won't allow my kiddo to click on them and play. They seem to be faded like they're not downloaded or able to be played. Only a handful of games work. Wondering if the problem is on our side or the game's side. Please help us fix this problem because our three year old really enjoys playing the games that DO work. Thanks!

1 star due to technical end. No parental controls to prevent children from accessing 'Grown-up' tab, let alone from accessing the rest of phone. 2 gig cap is too low to download all games, which means there is perpetual downloads of games already downloaded previously, which is just wasteful. And worst, the 2 gig limit resets to the 500 mb limit on every little update, which will waste 1.5 gigs of data at the drop of a hat. Fix these sorts of issues, and this could easily be a 4 or 5 star app. As

My daughter likes this app. I don't know when it started, but the the audio stopped working. It possibly started when I got my new phone. I am a tech engineer & tried a few troubleshooting things. I couldn't figure it out. I noticed that the app attempts to change the audio settings when it loads, which is causing the audio to fail. Bug? I've noticed quite a few people have audio issues. I have an LG V30, which has an audio chip for Hi-Fi Quad DAC.

The app is great overall but you can't cancel pending downloads, so when my kids try to download 50 games at once, and they really only want the latest choice, there's no way to stop or prioritize the others. If I clear all data I would think I could start over from scratch but something still prevents it from starting new downloads after that. There should be some sort of queue parents can access to stop specific downloads, or we should be able to click a game once more to display options.

Great when it works. I have had to reinstall it 3 times as it freezes and won't load. That is 3 on two tablets....so I guess it has been 6 times...That wouldn't be a problem if it were a normal game. You have to re down load every game. It takes hours!!! My kids freak out. It is a big deal. Fix it and I will give you 5 because my kids love the games.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear that the game does not work properly. You could try to clear the cache, restart the device and ensure that enough memory is available. We hope one of these works for you. If not, please contact us at https://pbskids.org/help/write.html.

scraped_reviews.content: This was my sons all time favorite app. No issues and so much fun for him. He has learned so much while enjoying the games. Then suddenly it is no longer compatible with any of our kindle devices. Horrible. It works on our chromebook but that's it. Not sure what the problem is but hopefully this app progresses to be available on Kindle devices.

There are some great games in here, but the sheer amount of games and the fact that there is no ability to sort by age or only allow certain games makes the app really frustrating for my 3 year old. She keeps opening games that are too difficult for her age and then getting mad that she can't figure out how to play them. If there were an option to only show games for a certain age or just to allow parents to only select a few games to show on the main screen at a time then it would be perfect!

I got this app for my daughter when she was 3 for short trips here or there because she loved pbs so much. Little did I know, while I thought I was occupying her during boring adult things, she was learning things that, if I did know them, I've already forgotten it! She is 6 now, and this is still her favorite tv station and game!! If you want your child to learn to love learning, and keep loving it, this is the perfect app for you!! I couldn't ask for more out of a learning enterprise!! 👍👍📚

Storage problems, but otherwise good. The games take up space fast and the storage can't be changed to external, so if you don't have a 64GB+ storage device you'll have to keep limits low or constantly prune games for your kids. When storage fills up, it gets REALLY buggy. The games themselves are great, I have ages 3-6 and it keeps them all happy while being generally educational like the related shows.

The games should have settings so younger children can not access the advanced games. Also if the games were organized by age, that would be great. We love playing games with all of our PBS characters. I have two children that share the app on my phone. Switching between levels would help tremendously. Also, I have unistalled and reinstalled app to fix system crash.

Only 2 stars because my kids love the games and videos. Also because I'm glad they are learning and safe on this app. But huge problems with it working most of the time. Have tried on many devices (multiple phone's and tablets some of which are brand new) so I know the issues on their end not mine. But it takes forever to download any game they want to play into the app. If they click more then one there is no way to unclick them and it takes forever to download IF it even does usually not.

My 5 year old loves the games on here. Normally i dont let my kid play games but this is very kid friendly. Only problem i have is that you're supposed to be able to play the games you've already downloaded OFFLINE. It's only allowed my child to play offline once and that was only 3 games. The 20+ other games downloaded won't show up. All other times i open the app offline and it just stays on the loading screen. Even tried letting it sit there for 30 minutes but just stayed on loading screen

My 5 and 10 year olds love watching PBS kids and their games add a whole new fun element to his favorite shows. The only changes I would make would be the ability to cancel downloads. They can sometimes accidentally tap a game as they are scrolling and have a few downloading at a time. It would also be great to have the ability to uninstall individual games instead of having to delete all the games. Overall the PBS Kids games app is a household favorite.

This app was amazing and kept my daughter engaged. Recently, and it must be because of updates, it will not open AT ALL. She plays it on one of my old phones and her Amazon kids tablet and it will not open on either device. I've tried clearing cache and removing other apps to be certain there's enough room and still no luck. Fix the bugs please.

Warning! Though this app is really good, there seems to be a glitch for some of the games where if you fail to do a task enough times or take too long to do the task and the game gives you a hint on what to do, the games proceed to not recognise any input from the player. I discovered this why playing the grover game with my niece and anytime she would make a mistake too many times it would stop recognizing her inputs and I would need to restart the game for her to get it back to normal.

It can be a little glitchy depending on what device we're using, but it's PBS, so forgiven. If I could choose only ONE app to have for my daughter, this would be it hands down. There are so many games from all the shows she already loves and they are brilliant. My three year old now understands engineering and balancing ecosystems and she loves it.

App hasn't worked at all for months. It was great before, lots of really fun and educational games for kids to play with their favorite characters, but all of that is lost as long as the app doesn't work. For the last several months it would open but never actually load past the loading screen, but now it won't even open at all, it's just a blank pink screen and then it crashes. Severely broken app.

It desperately needs a "hide undownloaded games" toggle switch. If I could download the 10 or 15 games my son actually likes and hide the rest, this would be our absolute favorite kids app. -An easy 5 stars.- As it is, it's difficult to use, and frustrating for me and my kids. I wish we could use it more. Please, please Developers,, it's a tiny change but it would improve your app hundredfold. !!

My daughter loves the PBS kids games app. However, as noted by other reviewers, there's a reason I give only 2 stars. This app has bugs/glitches. Will spontaneously close, freeze/ act like it's losing a game that never starts. Usually I've been able to uninstall and reinstall to fix but at this time I've reinstalled and the app continues to close without even opening fully. Disappointing...

The Buggiest app my Daughter loves. Every update to the app seems to bring a hodgepodge of bugs and crashes. Currently it won't even start on her Fire tablet. That said, watching my two year old "decide" what she wants to do in it is really fun. It definitely spurs thought and innovation. She likes it more than most of the Disney and sesame street stuff. Finds it more engaging.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi K Nolan, we're sorry to hear that you are experiencing crashing and bugs with the app. Our team would like to help improve your experience and fix these issues, but will need more information about your device. Please feel free to email help@pbs.org for support. Thank you! - PBS KIDS Team

scraped_reviews.content: This is my 3 year old son's favorite app. He uses it all the time and we normally love it. But for the past 2 days, every time he tries to exit a game to play another, which- let's be real- can happen every 10 seconds because he's 3, the app freezes. It just stays on that hot pink loading screen without changing while I have a toddler on the verge of meltdown because he wants to play and can't. Fix the issue and the app is a solid 4 stars. (Because not all the games are always available.)

Content wise, this app is great-games are developmentally appropriate, fun, educational. Tech-wise it could be better. The app glitches quite frequently (on an iPhone, android, and Kindle), resulting in a frustrated child & parent. Some of the things you need to click are so low on the screen, my child cannot click them without bringing up the menu screen on his kindle, thus frustrating us both. The scribbles & ink game is wonderful but ALWAYS freezes up.

Overall a great app, but a few of my God daughter's favorite games either freeze or do not respond at certain points. For instance the Sesame Street marble race game. The first run, before you add the third ramp works, but on the second run, after adding the third ramp, clicking the marbel makes the chime sound but nothing happens. It works on the rare occasion, but mostly doesn't. Many other games will freeze. Using it on a Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+.

Keep having to redownload games multiple times a day. Even as I'm downloading them, they disappear. You must download while on network or Wi-Fi and they don't stay. Downloaded 20 games yesterday. They were gone by this afternoon. As I'm downloading them again and the screen times out, I go back and they are gone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry to hear that you are experiencing problems with downloading games! Our team is currently investigating this issue and hopes to have a resolution soon. Please reach out to our support team at help@pbs.org for further assistance. Hope this helps! - PBS KIDS Team

scraped_reviews.content: The inability to cancel a download is a huge drag when the kiddo hits multiple games whether on purpose or accident. But WORST of all is the inability to download games to an onboard external storage device. The size limit on downloaded games is a nice touch, but those games create their own storage data to bulk up your internal storage way worse than the app let's on.

It's fun! I love to watch the videos and play the games. But there not scary bad or gross. There interesting. I love this game a lot and play it 24/7 it's a lot of fun and cool and I love it. But the reason a 4 is because there can be tons of bugs in one game or episode. Otherwise it's a lot of fun, interesting, and good for teaching kids if they wanna be sientest when they grow up. Love it sm. Tysm for making a kid appropriate game to watch play game and episodes everday! Kids try this game!!!!

title: Navigation Watch
description:
After installation just launch the app on your phone and grant the requested permission.
Supported are Fitbit, Garmin, Huawei and Wear OS watches.

Every time when you want to use it:
 • Start a Maps navigation on your phone
 • on the watch launch Navigation from app menu
 • directions will be shown on your watch
 • Incoming turns are signaled on your watch by vibrations: left turns will be signaled via two, right turns via three vibrations

You need to install the free wearable "Navigation Watch" app on your smartwatch too.

This app displays turns, distance, direction, speed and arrival time, a map is not shown.
The Wear OS app is not standalone and requires phone interaction in order to function.
descriptionHTML:
After installation just launch the app on your phone and grant the requested permission.
Supported are Fitbit, Garmin, Huawei and Wear OS watches.

Every time when you want to use it:
• Start a Maps navigation on your phone
• on the watch launch Navigation from app menu
• directions will be shown on your watch
• Incoming turns are signaled on your watch by vibrations: left turns will be signaled via two, right turns via three vibrations

You need to install the free wearable "Navigation Watch" app on your smartwatch too.

This app displays turns, distance, direction, speed and arrival time, a map is not shown.
The Wear OS app is not standalone and requires phone interaction in order to function.
summary: See Maps navigation directions from your phone on the smartwatch.

scraped_reviews.content: Does what it's supposed too, the free trial is good. Helps me navigate on foot without pulling out my phone every couple of minutes. Technically a 4/5 or 5/5 app (missing a map like on wearOS maps though) Unfortunately no one time purchase option. I'd buy it for 10-15$, but there is only a stupid subscription option. The subscription is cheap enough, but I hate it.

Rating two stars because the speed does not work at all. If you pay for a service, everything should work. To be clear, it's not that it's inaccurate, it's simply does not work. Aside from that, I really do like the navigation. One thing is that I really wish there was a compass. In addition, I wish it was an option to remove the time.

Currently there are 2 navigation apps on Zepp. DON'T USE THIS ONE. You have to pay $.99 every 6 months to keep premium, otherwise your only gonna get 10min of navigation directions displayed on your amazfit watch before they pull the plug. They should charge a higher fee for forever unlimited access. Download Navigation Wear app, it's definitely the better one out of the two options they give you thru Zepp. Make sure you Download both versions for your phone and your amazfit store.

Bait and switch app. This app came pre-installed on my AmazFit GTS 4 watch, and when I successfully set it up, including the companion app on my phone, I discovered this is a trial version that will only run for 10 mins at a time. If I want it to run the entire time I'm navigating, I have to pay a subscription of $0.99 per six month. This app came pre-installed on my watch! It should be the full version. I didn't pay this much for a watch only to have trialware apps on it. Uninstalled.

This is a very, very bad app. I wish I could rate it -1 star. Even though I paid to buy the full app, when I opened the app to use it, it only showed a QR code and I couldn't do anything else except that. It's not like what it screenshotted, there is no navigation. The developers should review how they tricked users, and users should not install the app.

This is a very bad app. Even though I paid to buy the full app, when I opened the app to use it, it only showed a QR code and I couldn't do anything else except that. It's not like what it screenshotted, there is no navigation. The developers should review how they tricked users, and users should not install the app.

It's fantastic it works perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 & Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic 46mm LTE. The navigation & voice guidance is precise with Google Maps, but it will only work for a short while on every route you plan before you have to buy the paid version, but I haven't figured out how to do this. Also if I could get some help on how I change it to the map on the watch when it's giving guidance instead of the big arrow that would be appreciated.

Why does it stop showing directions all of a sudden and displays the message "Please start a maps navigation". This is very tiresome and not helpful at all. Sometimes it just says 200m. But 200m what? Do I turn right after that or left or keep going or is there something that comes up in 200m. It's such a buggy app. If anyone knows a better app, please drop in a comment. Thanks in advance.

worked once, almost 5 minutes, then never synced with Google maps again. no matter what I do. [edit 19.aug.] I figured out the order of steps to get my watch recognise navigation: Pick a destination in Google maps app. Make sure you press on "Start" to start the journey.Go to watch, choose Navigation app/activity. Watch asks, if you want to launch Navigation > tap Yes. Watch will give you your next direction (e.g. 50m turn left). I wish the watch would recalculate/sync with phone's Gmap retours.

this is ridiculously useless and misleading. its a blank screen with only the next turn displayed. no map, no route graphic, no other metrics. worse still, it locks that screen with no swiping to the others(like your Map, Home screen or any other course/nav/stats screens)

I use this with amazfit gts mini 4 with google map. 1. Install Zepp app. 2. Open Zepp app, install mini app "Navigation" 3. Install this app, Navigation Watch 4. Turn on location, open Google map. Click "Navigation" app on smartwatch. *Free version only shows navigation for 10 mins Tip: set your phone to DND (do not disturb) and add to exceptions [ Map, Navigation] so map will not get disconnected. Adjust watch display duration Turn when 20m-40m to turn alerts

Most of the time will not work, it looks like the app was made by very low quality developers. Sometimes it's stuck in telling you to start a Map navigation and overlaps the directions and ETA on the watch display
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, to make it work reliable, please open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", accept the dialog that asks you to allow "Run in Background". Also please don't use energy saving mode as it can stop the app. Regarding the watch display: What watch model do you use? You can email us at prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: This just did not work on my Garmin fenix 5. I had to cancel the subscription and uninstall. I did wanted it to work but it did not. I did all the things the app suggested and what the developer will recommend in response to this review. It does not work on my watch.

I've tried several times to make it work according to the instructions from the app and never succeded. The app does not show notifications from Google maps at all or shows only first direction and then crushes. Waist of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If it doesn't work, please activate Maps notifications: Open “Navigation Watch” on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", then click “Activate Maps Notifications” and activate Maps notifications. Also try starting a navigation on your phone and then open the 'Navigation' app on your watch. Or email us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute garbage. Paid a subscription. Worked once. Then wouldn't work anymore. Uninstalled and tried again. Doesn't work. Trying on a Garmin Epix gen 2. My advice... don't bother.. waste of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Russell, this is often caused by energy saving settings. Please disable any power saving mode to find out if it is the reason. Also, open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", accept the dialog that asks you to allow "Run in Background". Lastly open the appon the watch manually. Reach us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Does not work. It does not detect my watch and when pressing the navigation button it just opens Google Maps. In the app it offers a subscription for something that does not even work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If it doesn't work, please activate Maps notifications: Open “Navigation Watch” on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", then click “Activate Maps Notifications” and activate Maps notifications. Also try starting a navigation on your phone and then open the 'Navigation' app on your watch. Or email us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: I only got it to actually work once. I have followed all the troubleshooting steps, uninstalled, reinstalled, more troubleshooting still doesn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If it has stopped working, please do 2 things to fix it: 1. open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", accept the dialog that asks you to allow "Run in Background". 2. do what is explained in the last point on the page: disable and re-enable access to notifications. You can also email us at prog.apps@outlook.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It only runs for about 2 minutes on my fenix 7 and then stops. I disabled the power saving mode on my phone and re-installed as recommended but that didn't fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, what happens afetr 2 minutes when the apps stops? Does it close, or show the IQ logo, or does it freeze? If it closes, please open it again manually from the watch app menu. Please mail us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Time shown in app does not match watch. Not the arrival time but the one at the bottom of the navigation. For a subscription service i believe that this is a major mistake.
Only buy if you want it to break your watch. Made my watch flick between different settings constantly, couldn't use the buttons or the screen at all until I uninstalled this app on my phone

I purchased this app some time ago. I just updated it after finding out it would not respond. It was not wokingany. I read rhe troubleshooting: TURN ON NOTIFICATIONS ON "MAPS" Now it works - Garmin Vivoactive.
Your app is almost flawless, the only thing that is missing is the total distance of the whole trajectory, and it would help a lot
Does not launch automatically on my Garmin instinct 2, not sure why, but I pay for this and get the navigation to launch maybe 30% of the time .
I paid the $0.99 for 6 months. No icon on my phone! Therefore cannot use it. Rating is only 3 stars. Other free ones have higher star rating. I was duped!
Terrible app, you have to pay $1.89 for a 6 month trial. Also you're only able to use it for 10 minutes per day. Outrageous, if I could rate it 0 stars I would.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Anthony, the trial version is free. You can use the app for 10 minutes per navigation again and again without paying. We can give you a free 3 month voucher. Just email us via pine.apps@outlook.com to get it

scraped_reviews.content: It doesn't work on my watch gt 3 pro. I installed play store to my phone and app gallery to my watch. But navigations are doesn't shown on my watch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If it doesn't work, please activate Maps notifications: Open “Navigation Watch” on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", then click “Activate Maps Notifications” and activate Maps notifications. Also try starting a navigation on your phone and then open the 'Navigation' app on your watch. Or email us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Like the setup, but if I don't keep checking it on my watch, the watch app eventually closes. Needs to stay on to be sure to give me alerts for my next turn. If that's fixed, would give it a 5.

i need to pay if i want to use the map for more than 10 mins. Within 10 mins i am looking for Space technology to travel around the world. Who going to need an app who want to travel only for 10 mins . ? This is costlier.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Harish , if you wait one hour or buy premium the message will go away :)

scraped_reviews.content: Works, great interface. However, I don't believe it's worth it 2.50€ a year. It's not much, but it's a too simple app for this price
The blurb says it needs access to Google maps, then when you go to grant access it wants near full access to lots more info, most of which is unecessary. I'll pass thank you.
It's simple, but while using it with my T-Rex 2, it keeps closing and resetting the watch screen when Always-on-Display screen show up.
after watch display auto turn off, when wrist raised and display on, the navigation on the watch is off. need to go to the phone each time & really really not safety during driving
works easily. but you need to pay about usd 1 / 6 months. will do great if we can have colourful navigation icons
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please change the color of the navigation icons: Open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, scroll down to settings, tap on the text or item where you want to change the color.

scraped_reviews.content: App is free trial for 10 mins only. To use, you'll need to pay ₹190/- per year. Also, watch app is already installed on mobile but still asking to install again. Uninstalling it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sushant, the watch app needs to be installed in the watch, as a companion to the app on the phone. What watch model do you use? You can use the app for free the first 10 minutes of any navigation, repeatedly. Please email us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Why is this app requesting permission to Read SMS . Permission should only be needed for maps notifications\directions . Not trusting 🚫 In SMS notifications is received verification codes from banks etc etc ...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan, It's because of the functionality of the app. Because it processes Google Maps Navigation notifications, the app needs access to your notifications. Nothing else is read and the app is compliant with Google Play Store rules.

scraped_reviews.content: Works then doesn't work. Have to uninstall and install to only work once. Very frustrating to say the least!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm sorry to hear. Please deactivate power saving mode on your phone, this solves most of these issues. Or email us via pine.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: App shown as installed on Zepp, but do not seem to be transferred to the watch. Opening on Zepp simply displays a blank page
It just forced close on me, At first. Tho after developer guidance it works. Though the app on the watch should be turn on before start navigate on google map.

scraped_reviews.content: Demo version worked but as soon as i paid it stopped working. No support was given.
Fair performance. Would be better with a more in depth app interface.

Please allow to cross sync the license because it's doesn't work on my Huawei Watch. I can't made a payment on Huawei AppGallary thats why I subscribe on Playstore and then the app not work on my watch
Just tried to install the app on a Pixel 6 pro and it failed. Waited 10 minutes and it wouldn't install.
The app did not connect to google maps,even after trying all the trooble shooting options. Vivoactive 4

Also try starting a navigation on your phone and then open the 'Navigation' app on your watch. Or email us via prog.apps@outlook.com

scraped_reviews.content: Technically modest, but you have keep restarting the app on your mobile, if you start navigating on Maps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please do 2 things to fix it: 1. open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", accept the dialog that asks you to allow "Run in Background". 2. do what is explained in the last point on the page: disable and re-enable access to notifications. Now start navigating. You can also email us at prog.apps@outlook.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use, clear to follow and understand. The app was quickly updated to support a new Garmin model
$1.60 for 6 months. Can't do a full year or say $10 to have a lifetime subscription. Thats crazy.
Worst navigation app, not working. Full of bugs and glitches.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If it stopped working, please do 2 things to fix it: 1. open "Navigation Watch" on your phone, go to "Open Troubleshooting Guide", accept the dialog that asks you to allow "Run in Background". 2. do what is explained in the last point on the page: disable and re-enable notification access and start navigating. Or email us at prog.apps@outlook.com.

scraped_reviews.content: garbage. keeps telling me to turn on navigation when it's already running. amazfit T-Rex 3
10 minutes only directions unless you upgrade. Need both a phone app and watch app. Far too much trouble
Installed, then uninstalled when I saw what permissions it needed. Doesn't this mean that it can receive and acknowledge 2FA from my bank and send them on to daddy?

title: Deliveroo: Food & Shopping
description:
Hungry? Get your favorite meals, takeout and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVORITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favorites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighborhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.
descriptionHTML:
Hungry? Get your favorite meals, takeout and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVORITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favorites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighborhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.
summary: Takeout, groceries & retail delivered fast — all your favorites in one app

scraped_reviews.content: App offers a lot of choice of restaurants where we are, more than other similar apps. Perhaps because they charge less? What I don't appreciate is the constant, full screen advertising. I'm not interested in anything else than ordering food with this app. But it keeps showing me 'special offers' and on every single food order it wants me to allow notifications and calls. Which I don't want. Also annoying; the original delivery slot moves ahead with time, then they still celebrate 'on time'...

compared to doordash in the US, not as good. much more options but the customer service takes a long time to resolve issues and seems to be more company focused, where as, doordash is cares 100% about their customers concerns. Will still use them while out of the country. also, wish there was a translation option for meals & descriptions. it is an ok app.

A joke. because I've been loyal and used this app for a long time I have built up occasions of people sending the wrong item or missing items to the point where now deliveroo won't refund me when they don't send me items. we aren't talking loads of missing items either, we are talking what would be expected over the course of a couple years deliveries. so now my supermarket missed £45 worth of stuff from my order and deliveroo seem to not care

terrible app. Gives you wrong updates. I waited over an hour for an order with regular updates saying my order is accepted and is being prepared, driver arrived etc etc and then boom. order cancelled. The customer services could only tell me it's because the restaurant was closed. but can't explain why I was getting false updates. plus they don't give any support for poor orders. Won't be using deliveroo anymore.

NEVER ORDER IN ADVANCE. When ordering ASAP it works fine and is on time and cost effective. Of the two times I ordered in advance, one was over an hour late (the app showed at least 4 different riders as "close to the restaurant") and one was nearly two hours late and left with my food before I could get to him. App interface is functional, selection of restaurants is appropriate, but I'm only using it because they didn't let me know when the free trial of their free delivery expired.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mark. Sorry things didn't go so well with previous orders. Please hop onto our social media platforms such as Facebook or Twitter and send us a message with your account email + more info. Thanks for getting in touch. We'll sort it out!

scraped_reviews.content: Have used most of these delivery apps in multiple countries. This one worked most of the time, but when it doesn't, customer service is terrible. After one disconnected call, I was then on the phone for over 20 minutes just to get the order refunded for a delivery to the wrong address. Was initially told they couldn't do it. Eventually they did after much hold time. They don't realize the competition is falling over themselves to make happy customers. I reordered with Doordash.

Worst food delivery app. The GPS location does not let you type in the exact address. Aside from that, delivery fee is almost always above 5 dollars, and they expect you to tip the drivers as well, just so the app can get a cash in on that too. Finally, payment methods are a nightmare, you can't just wrote down your info, you need a verification code, and 4 out of 5 times they don't even work. Customer service is also a nightmare, I was charged for a meal I never got. Don't get this app.

App works ok, but the real let down is the company itself. Customer service is awful. They don't understand that missing items from an order can ruin the whole meal. Refunding the missing items doesn't sort the issue, I can't just reorder the missing items without paying the service and delivery fee again. They also don't refund the percentage of service fee that those missing items contributed to. I was basically told it was tough luck, no help at all. The whole order should have been refunded.

Abysmal. When there is a rider shortage, other apps will let you know. Deliveroo, on the other hand, pushes the order through. Then they move the expected time of arrival for an hour and a half. When you go to cancel, you have to talk to a "real person" that itself takes like 5 minutes to respond. Had this interaction like 4 times in 2 months It's an app of inconvenience, it is the Comcast of food delivery sites, and I am overjoyed to hear they're leaving my country in a few weeks.

WORST experience today. I just ordered my food like usasual. The driver couldn't find my clearly marked location and address. I've never had a problem with any of my numerous orders before. The driver stops in the wrong spot. I walk out to find the driver and they say they don't have an order and drive away. After that my order is canceled. I had an awful time with the customer service. They weren't able to help me at all. I am out money for food I wasn't given. Worst delivery app.

Used to think the app was better than competitors but the delivery service is getting worse. There is no point ordering from a restaurant close to your location, if there's a delivery much further away from you and the restaurant, you won't get your food first. Target delivery times are constantly shifting goals so they're never late, apparently. Thought these were isolated cases but it's happening almost every order now. Prices are also higher compared to competitors, without added benefits.

It's logged me out half way through placing an order and insisted I change my password. It randomly logs me out at the best of times. But most annoying is the delivery time which pretty much always gets pushed further and further back. It's been delayed an hour and a half before. But the app just pushes the delivery time back and tells you it's running on time. Infuriating, if there's a spike in orders at a certain time put a longer delivery time on.

If you have a complaint, they are usually quite good with sorting it out. But recently a company substituted a potato dish for a fish dish. With out notifying me of the change as I would of cancelled my order as I can not eat fish! I got the standard email back asking for photos well by the time I thought about putting a complaint through I had eaten the rest of the food. Apparently my receipt was not good enough, they wanted pictures of the food. Apparently a plate of bones is not sufficient.

Any app is only as good as the associated service. Repeated late deliveries even when ordered more than one hour in advance. Edit: Yet again, unrealistic delivery times and a restaurant that doesn't track. They all should be trackable. The only thing this is good for if taking your money! I'm done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Sorry about that. For order-related issues, please get in touch with our social media team. Send them a message on Facebook/Twitter with your account email + more info. They’ll take care of the rest for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Food often comes cold because deliveroo doesn't have enough riders/drivers to collect... I'm in zone 2 London. Also the app on android will often just stay on the turquoise deliveroo logo screen and not open to the restaurants/groceries page. Very frustrating as the Apple app works all of the time - food still comes cold though so not much better. Uber Eats is a better choice if you want to eat hot take out

All the restaurants on this have alternative options to order. Bad after sales. Currently having to negotiate with them for a reasonable refund where 1/2 of a £30 order was seem to be making it up. 2nd issue and now will no longer used and just go direct to restaurant as at least no profit skimming and a possible route for a refund. The app doesnt offer the option for a refund for most options and there is no way past this.

the last 3 times I have ordered from 3 different restaurants and each time the driver picked up my food from the restaurant, it took 45+ minutes to get to me, despite it never being more than 3 miles. I can walk that faster, my food is always cold and they don't do full refunds for practically frozen food, they will give you £6 back if you spend £35 so don't bother, you will only be disappointed

Not what it used to be.... I used to love deliveroo, the app, the services they offer... Today it seems to be all about getting more money from their customers and providing a poor service. Seems that they forgot what they do. The business strategy that they seem to have now works on grocery delivery, not hot food delivery where time is of essence in order to deliver the food in optimum time. So if you really need to order get your ovens/ microwave ready ...

I just deleted my account. never going back. i have never seen such unacceptable customer service. not only the delivery time was constantly being pushed back and I had to wait more than an hour, but the order was the wrong one. Deliveroo refused to cancel my order, and offered absolutely no acceptable solution. Not the first time either they are useless when the order is not taken care of professionally. this was the last time for me.

The app keeps asking for location and microphone permissions, every time, again and again. I am not gonna change my mind. But I am now thoroughly annoyed... I don't want my food delivered to a "location". I got an address, with a house or flat number, easy to find, with a doorbell, etc. And I only ever order to my address anyways. Just stop asking. Edit: can't go less than one star to get their attention 🤷‍♂️ Perhaps it's time to try and use some alternative app?

Manipulative design. For starters, menu items are priced higher than what a direct take away from restaurant would cost you. The delivery fee seem small enough if you don't know there are hidden fees in the cost of the food. And then there is the service fee. Having been quoted prices without it and spent tome salivating over dishes- you get told of a "small" fee before you can order. Designed to extort money.

Pathetic customer service. I used Deliveroo for ages and never had an issue with them but my last order was completely wrong. I thought seeing as they had made the mistake that I would get a refund/credit but they are blankly refusing to give me one even though I have a copy of the order and a photo of the receipt (of the completely wrong items) but apparently this was not enough, even though this violates their own terms and conditions. Use any other delivery service instead! Steer clear!

I used to like this app until I got scammed recently. After I made an order from a market using this app, A pop out window showed that I can order for free from any nearby store and there was a countdown. I did that but they charged me again another delivery fee. After contacting customer support, they said there is nothing they can do and that I should have had a screenshot. Do they expect us to make screenshots of everything in the app? Very disappointed

I was overcharged when there was a buy 1 get 1 free offer, the item was £10.99 each and instead of deducting that amount they "credited" me £7 which is less than the item value and the chat support (Philia, Sat 15th Nov at 2:40am) just left the chat and when I said I still need help my messages stopping going through

I don't mind Deliveroo as a takeaway service, in fact it's my primary one. Someone though has given the marketing weenies far too much free rein and the app is becoming a sea of annoying popups. Their tech support is worse than talking to an AI and won't help you. It's becoming increasingly frustrating to have to fight through all the popups just to order a damn takeaway.

Really poor experience with Deliveroo. My order turned up crushed and spilled so I reported it with photos straight away. Days later they finally replied just to say I had not given enough evidence. If they had told me that on the day I could have taken more pictures. Instead the delay made it impossible. It comes across as a way to avoid dealing with the problem rather than actually helping customers.

when you have an actual problem there is ZERO help from customer service and support team, logged several requests for a manager to call me back and explained the error on deliveroo's end and the food store - 7 days later i still havent had anyone contact me to explain the error on their end. very poor service for an overpriced food delivery. i wont be using deliveroo again, use the cheaper options like Just Eat etc.

Registered, created an order, used a £12-off voucher. When time came to pay, the app did not allow me to do so through paypal. I tried again with a credit card - failed again, but now also deactivated the voucher (says it has already been used by my account). Haven't eaten all day, wasted so much time and still hungry. The worst first impression... never had an issue like that with other food deliveries

Worst delivery service ever, they called me they were at my door but my phone was on silent mode, usually they wrang my doorbell. this time they didn't and supposedly leave my food at the door. I went downstairs only 5 min later, but never saw any delivery, they probably ate my sushi on their way back. there is no phonenumber you can call, only a chatbot which keeps repeating "there is nothing we can do to compensate". I'm never using deliveroo again!

I am too disappointed with this app..They have offered 50% discount for first app users and when we download and login with new number, they are telling the offer is already redeemed🤷And when I opt for payment option, it doesn't work and when I try to cancel since there is no voucher, it automatically placed the order without offer🥺

Deliveroo is the only food delivery service app that I really really dislike and I think out of all of them you're better off not downloading this app or using their service because the prices are far more expensive than the others (justeat, uber eats etc) the promotions they have are really not good most of the time. Additionally, if you are missing items that you ordered and claim for a refund they do not give you your money back and deny it. Customer service is awful.

worst delivery app ever! Scheduling doesn’t work and editing an order cancels it automatically without confirmation. Yet deleting your account requires typing DELETE and confirming multiple times shows where their priorities are. Their UAE customer service is useless; I spent hours asking why a scheduled order didn’t arrive, and when I tried to edit the time after it was late, it got canceled automatically and team never answered why it was later they keep saying it was cancelled 😒 use ur 🧠

Sneaky thieves. pay extra for fast delivery then it doesn't arrive so you get a refund on the extra cost but they don't refund to card. instead they give you a credit against a future order but they don't automatically apply it so you lose it. just underhand theft

terrible experience used them for first time. normally an Uber eats customer. the main item was missing from the order when I rang customer support they told me it will take 48 hrs to get a refund when I was expecting the item to be delivered instead. and they said it will take this long due to the need of a credit check!

Bad customer service. Out of my entire order, only a Coca-Cola can was delivered, deliver guy's fault. Requested refund and Deliveroo still made me pay for the full price of the can (it was part of a menu). So in the end: - Waited 1h for the order to be delivered - Got nothing to eat, only a Coca-Cola can - Had to pay for full price Coca-Cola can and SERVICE!!! Unacceptable client support. Making me pay for their driver's mistake.

Yes, today I received my £12 off on £15 order as a new customer. I ordered some groceries from Sainsbury's. Definitely recommend especially if you don't want to spend £40/£50 on whole groceries, if only needed only a couple of essentials and top of that received in less than half an hour.

The latest update made the app insufferable - I do not care what is featured or "deliveroos choice" - I do not want to see a dozen fictional categories before I get to the list of restaurants. And the removal of "filters" option is ridiculous- the ability to filter by hygiene rating etc. was the only actually good thing about this app.

I experienced it recently that the app shows the coupon code on a restaurant. But when I tried to apply the coupon it says invalid coupon. It is really frustrating that they lure us to order something and then backs off.

deliveroo service has reached a new level. coslaw delivered was spoiled /rotten n when feedback, only said that I need to contact restaurant directly and then gave me a number that is not working. after that they tell me to post my feedback on the app itself? cannot do any form of refund. so beware! if you get spoiled /rotten food, you just feedback on the app. it's just too bad you get rotten food that you can't eat

The app was updated with a change in data sharing settings. Deliveroo will now share your location data with third parties. A lot of people won't notice this and will have their location data sent off to potentially anyone. What a sad and greedy practice this has become.

Do not use this app. Don't deliver what they say they will They charge way more than ordering direct & do not offer the restaurants full menu selection. An absolute shower. Their "Helpline" doesn't help, they are a bunch of shysters in my opinion.

Exceptional service from every driver I've met, and the wait times are surprisingly short, so it doesn't take long for my meals to arrive at the front door. Would highly recommend to anyone who's looking for a cheeky takeaway!

So much pomp and fancy UI, yet you persist in not listening to your users on absolute basic requirements for a service such yours. For example, notifying a user when the app arbitrarily resets the delivery time after adding a new item to the order, without ANY notification. Not to mention how awful the chat service is, and how difficult it is to retrieve previous chats within the app.

When they show you substitutions, you will be prompted to check out again, making you think you are confirming the new charge, when you're actually placing a new order. Deliveroo won't refund you for the extra groceries nor even try to assign a driver to pick up the groceries. Really bad costumer service.

consistently poor service w/ purchased items & refunds. You have to email several times for refund back to original payment. they only want to give you Deliveroo credit. if you use a delivery credit on any future items they say it's impossible to refund any unavailable items or wrong restaurant orders. even if it's $1.30 credit applied and you pay over $50 for an order. you'll never get a refund back to original payment. it's a scam. if you can, never accept a credit. always demand refund.

Pathetic customer service, orders dont get delivered, and they just update the status as delivered, and then all they do is apologise and never come up with a solution! Had faced this issue so many times, and I still tried to trust them with my orders. Seriously, they have failed badly! Deliveroo used to be the best delivery app, but now they have lost all standards!

I use deliveroo because it's useful, but they can really let you down when things go wrong. On top of that, if a restaurant leaves you waiting for an hour and then cancels your order, deliveroo does not allow you to leave a rating for that restaurant so you can't warn other potential customers. This is a clear failing on Deliveroo's part but all they can suggest is complaining to the restaurant directly. They need to allow ratings in this circumstance.

We had a discount code that we put in, but then an error occurred, and we had to imput the discount code again. Upon doing so, the app then said the discount code had already been redeemed from the first time we put it in even though we hadn't ordered anything yet. Extremely frustrating

Fine when it works but completely unreliable. Orders get delayed when trying to 'find a driver' and then you get the actual delivery, which itself is unreliable. Support is unable to do anything even when a driver is clearly fraudulent (e.g. the wrong person picks up the phone, photos of the wrong delivery place), etc. Just bad service

This app is incredibly frustrating. I specifically chose a restaurant because the delivery time shown was acceptable. The moment I placed my order, the estimated time started increasing, adding another 20-30 minutes to the wait. They are consistently late and never stick to the promised timeframe. The constantly shifting of delivery time makes planning impossible.

title: iFood comida e mercado em casa
description:
Buy in markets, restaurants, pharmacies and pet shops quickly and easily, all at your fingertips. Offers from the best markets and restaurants in your city are on IFood. Here you can also find products for your pet in addition to buying pharmacy items.

Thought about ordering food? Ask for IFood! Go to the market, pharmacy or pet shop? Forget it, go IFood!

Delivery from Restaurants
It doesn't matter if you want to eat sushi, vegetarian food, burger, pizza or try a new restaurant. Use iFood and order at several restaurants in the best food delivery app for your hunger and your pocket, without having to wait for Black Friday

Market Delivery
Did you hit that urge to prepare your food at home or was there any items missing from the purchase of the month? You can take advantage of our market delivery to buy the missing ingredients and have them delivered to your home!

Drink Delivery
How about some drinks to enjoy with friends over the weekend? With iFood you get drinks at home and still save with discount coupons and offers.

Pharmacy Delivery
Do you need to buy medicine, diapers, hygiene products, beauty products or some other pharmacy item? Just ask for iFood! Buy medicine, beauty products and other pharmacy items with discount coupons and offers available at pharmacies closest to you.

pet shop delivery
Is your pet's food over? Need sand for your kitten? No problem! With iFood you can order food, cat litter, veterinary medicine and other pet shop items with discount coupons and offers at pet shops near your home.

Coupons and discounts for you
With iFood you always have a market, restaurant, pharmacy and pet shop option to buy with quality while always spending little, not just on Black Friday. Check out the various coupons available to you and enjoy discounts at restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacy and pet shop with free delivery to order at any time of the day.

Thousands of cheap options
Use our search or browse the categories and special lists to find food offers in the best restaurants, drink promotions, pizzerias, pharmacies, pet shops or market purchases. Afterwards, just put it in the bag and close your order online. In no time, the delivery man will be at your door with everything you ordered from the restaurant or supermarket.

follow your order
At iFood you receive your food and market delivery quickly and you can even follow the order preparation and delivery steps through the app. Take the opportunity to do your grocery shopping, try a new restaurant or schedule your food and receive it at home.

Download the delivery app that brings your favorite dishes close to you, or if you decide to cook, you can find all the ingredients for your recipe in a few taps in supermarkets. With our delivery service, you can order dishes from the best restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and pet shops!

What are you waiting for to download our food delivery, market, pharmacy and pet shop app? Have the best supermarkets and restaurants, that pizzeria in the neighborhood or the market where you always shop just a few clicks away. Take the opportunity to place your food and drink order and order delivery wherever you are. Have pizza, hamburger, vegetarian food, sushi, fast food, Italian food and many other dishes from your favorite restaurant or supermarket in your house.

See the complete list of cities where iFood is delivered. Order your food and market delivery online now: https://www.ifood.com.br/cidades-atidas
