developer: iFood Delivery de Comida e Mercado

scraped_reviews.content: There are indeed a lot of options. However, the app itself is full of bugs, with awful user experience: my cards get randomly refused depending on the day (some days they work, some days they don't, back and forth!), an order with a refused payment method is counted as a duplicate order, the Google Pay integration is now broken, and I just had an order that was counted as successfully placed but which simply disappeared when I checked on where it was - not even in the history. Terrible.

I'm unable to control the types of iFood notifications on my Android. They send numerous promotional messages every day and I have no way of stopping this unless completely disabling notifications in the app settings. This means that if I fail to turn notifications on when expecting a delivery I may miss a message from the delivery person. This happened the other day.

Every time I want to order food or buy anything, I have to talk to customer service to prevent my credit VISA card from being blocked. I have asked them many times to find a permanent solution for this annoying problem, but they don't seem to care. Waiting for their response also takes a long time as well. If I could give 0 stars, I would. My card works fine with any other apps. Update 19 Oct 25 I tried to order food on Sunday at 17:52. Now it's 21:50. I still can't pay. I waited for hours. 👎

The app showed a “3 for 1” promo. Naturally, I expected 3 items for the price of 1. I added a burger, but only got one. If it’s 3-for-1, why not add 3 automatically? Or at least block checkout until the promo is applied? That’s basic UX and defensive coding. Instead, it feels like the app is designed to profit from people’s unawareness. If they had proper UI writers or reviewed their Portuguese, this wouldn’t happen.

If the app has spam/promotional notifications, it should use a separate notification category for that; instead it has a single "General" category, with the setting for not receiving such type of alerts being an internal one, which the app often disregards and spam you anyway.
Horrible customer service, never a single constructive response, never a resolution, never even an explanation, when encountering problems with ordering or payments.

So the this is the largest and main app for food in brasil, but don't count on using it if you are out of country, it doesn't take phone numbers outside of brasil, and you need a cpf to order.... Not tourist friendly tried using it again today and total fail! have a US number and it only gives you the option to input a Brazilian one

iFood is a really useful app, it helps me a lot when I have to order something. But, sometimes I have problems with some restaurants and I can't cancel my orders by an easiest way, or something like this. Besides, when I have to get out soon, I rely on restaurant's delivery time, which isn't always correct and let me reach late at my appointments. I know that some of these problems aren't iFood's fault, but maybe they can be more rigorous with these kind of restaurants.

Terrible consumer experience. Some restaurants doesn't support a kind of payment, so it should have a third party to do payments whitin the app. Minimum order price shouldn't exist. If I want to order something, it doesn't matter what is the price, I should be able to, but minimum order price doesn't let you do so. And most foods are greatly overpriced for what they really are, because of the app taxes in restaurants. Delivery tracking in real time only works if the delivery man is hired fromAPP

The app itself is pretty good, it's easy to use and there are a ton of options to pick from. HOWEVER. The prices are (a lot) higher than what you would usually pay, due to heavy taxes charged by iFood. Also, there was a recent policy change which benefits delivery guys who don't want to work. Everytime I order something I am afraid it won't arrive, and this has indeed happened 3+ times in the past few weeks. I don't use the app as much as I used to, as to avoid fruitless waiting and chargeback

Most restaurants don't have a cellphone for contact, so if you notice a problem after a delivery is made you will not be able to contact them. I ran into that two times already and they sent my money back, but its frustrating, before this "safe delivery code" I always solved any problems through the chat with the restaurant. Also, the section to get help from ifood is really slow.

Tried to order food on iFood in Brazil — you know, the app that’s supposed to make life easier, like Uber Eats or Grab. All was going well until I hit the “enter CEP” screen. For the uninitiated, a CEP is Brazil’s postal code, which apparently you now must have in order to eat. No CEP, no dinner. I used to be able to order just fine, but not anymore. Which is fascinating, because Brazil welcomes hundreds of thousands of tourists every year.
This all does not take foreign credit cards, and it does nkt explain that. 2 times trying to order, the order had not left the restaurant for over 1 hour. Not worth the headache.

Pretty bad. It takes very long to order a single meal. Also. It is impossible to pay. I had my credit card configured and had errors with NO details when paying. I will try one more time later. If same headache happens, I will uninstall it. Updating from 2 to 1 star. There is no notification when my order is cancelled. Google pay does not work. Some other bad stuff as well

It offers the WORST service EVER!!! Many times foods arrive way after the estinated time of delivery!! Not just 10 or 20 minutes. Almost 2 hours!!! I truly wantex to cancel my order but its freaking app doesn't even allow me to and I had to call the restaurant and a woman said it would be delivered in 15 minutes. It's been way over 15 minutes and the foods hasn't arrived yet. It's so frustrating!!! NEVER EVER USE THIS!!

Spams you with discount offers that are pure bait. They supposedly work with a few select restaurants, but after you take the time to choose you find that they no longer apply. Baited. I usually have about 3-5 of these offers at any time and none of them ever work. Payments fail to process for no apparent reason. Makes me spend half an hour talking to my credit card processor to find out the order was not declined, it was never submitted to them. This used to be great. Nowadays I'm using Uber Eats more and more because of all this BS.

Não está funcionando! Iz q esta bugado... ja limpei cache e reinstalei! Nada. Not working!!! It shuts down every time I try to open it... says there's a bug! I've cleared cache and reinstalled. still not working... somebody help, please
Absolutely useless customer service, changed my card on Google Pay, tried to make order and didn't work, asked support and they just tell me my payment are blocked and close my ticket?

It used to be easy to order, now it's a nuisance, depending on where I am. Here at Lorena/SP, restaurants that are a few blocks away have delivery fee greater than the order prices! When I reach the free delivery threshold, all payment methods are refused (the app actually froze on the error screen, last time!) This has happened for at least two months, and is getting worse!
I like being able to order my food and have it delivered. I have struggled to find how to leave a tip on the app.

Quite bad overall. Prices are high because the app takes a big chunk from restaurant profits, causing them to jack up their prices. Payment options are severely limited for such a popular app, they also frequently fail to work. The app itself is quite predatory and will ABSOLUTELY SPAM your phone with notifications. Also somewhat difficult to effectively navigate but that's subjective, I guess.

I hate this app. It keeps wanting to add 20 reais to any order I place, even after it confirms that there are no additional costs. Then, it can't give the correct code for me to make an app payment. It is expensive and does not work well. I installed and uninstalled it in less than thirty minutes. I will never install this again. I advise you to not install this app either. Use ubereats or contact the restaurant directly for a cheaper and quicker delivery.

Very bad app, hard to enter data, does not accept my credit cards. Does not have customer support. Still the worst in the market. Tried to update my credit card data, did not work. Tried to order and pay at delivery, delayed and I had to cancel. Just had another bad experience. Unbelievable.

Here's the real story, the APP works good and there is alot of variety to choose from , but if your order is wrong or they don't deliver, the restaurant or store will blame ifood for the issue and they will keep your money without resolving the issue, another way of taking your funds and not delivering the goods. They will drag it out and make the smallest issue a big problem, typical of food service with no attendance to help their clients. Eu não gosto ifood app, porque muito problemas.
very hard to use if im a just a visitor to brasil. cant order anything
Always quick and best prices
Latest update crashes the app and I can't even get past the first screen.

The interface is user-friendly and visually appealing. However, requiring a Brazilian phone number to place a food delivery order hinders foreigners from using the service. This unnecessary restriction meant I couldn't actually order food, and I unfortunately had to uninstall the app.

The first thing that brings down the score is the reliability of the delivery service iFood offers to restaurants, as I've had orders cancelled because the delivery guy refused to collect and deliver them. More importantly though, I recently made an order but didn't receive my food. The restaurant wouldn't answer the phone so I left a review, choosing the 'food didn't arrive' option. However, since then I've tried calling iFood without any answer, and I've recieved no messages through the app :(

As a foreigner and I can't use my card like everyone else's do , I have to pick only places that accept me to pay with the card on delivery which doesn't work everytimeand on top of that I miss a bunch of other places I would love to try only because your methods of payments. It's very inconvenient also the fact I can't tip the delivery person after a great service. So I will give you one star for now and hopefully someone will fix this issue so travellers without CPF can use your app like u all

All around pretty good, but everything on iFood is still more expensive than what you buy at restaurants and fast-food. Some stores are out-right closed or unavailable for months, yet they stay online, not working at all. This app needs some serious management and not only cater towards rich countries. I'm in Brazil by the way, and I know how good the service is in the US and how much it lacks over here and most other third world countries.

The app is severely annoying for foreigners for two reasons. First, you can not pay with any option that is not in person as you need a CPF for that and it is very bothersome to get one. Second, the in person payment option is not always available because ifood does not provide sufficient machines to the delivery personal and so you need to wait randomly and annoyingly until one delivery person with a machine is avaliable. This sucks as you are probably somebody who values his or her time.

I can't even log into my account, since i can't change the phone number associated with the existing account, nor create a new account, because it "has an error" (how helpful). I just use other food apps which work fine, like Rappi.

Second time and no interesting options. It was supposed to have a 1 Brazilian Real offers and there wasn't, like a false merchant just to capture more users. The 75% discount were about so many terribly expensive items which make nonsense to order. That's all for me about iFood. No plans to try it anymore.

Normally it works just fine, but more than once I've ordered something and for some reason the app tells me there has been a problem, so I go and order again. The thing is, both of them arrive and I end up having twice the food I wanted, which means I have to spend twice the money I would have normally.

the establishments are good, however, the Ifood company has been quite abusive. has now started charging a fee for orders less than $20, and that just doesn't make sense. This app purports to be free, but charges to be used by both parties (store and end customer) it's not free then. I recommend that merchants and customers migrate to other smaller but not abusive apps. here in my city I'm testing AiQFome. I'm having a great experience. And the best: REALLY FREE. I don't pay any fees... 😜

Too bad, there's no guarantee that an order will ever arrive, also - at least in Brasil - there's no proper way to get help, no phone number to call ifood to tell the issue you r having with the restaurant or the deliveryman, You r told to try a chat in the app that takes ages for someone to answer, mainly in the evening when you r most likely to order smt, of course the restaurant closes before Ifood finally tries to help you. [Edit] Online payment is now broken and chatting doesn't help.

I ordered food in a restaurant that confirmed my order and closed. I can't cancel the order for the hell of it (it's been late for over half an hour already, I called the restaurant, and they said my order is not coming). There's no support function to be found in the app, and I can't get into the refund process.

If you're using an external monitor and switches back to device your shopping cart is gone. When you check out and click Fazer Pedido when all is ready to go and pay with Beneficios card, it simply refreshes the screen. Then you try going over all the purchases again using the browser, but your card is not there either. Useless app lacking software testing services before release to production.

These people are just thieves. They will straight up rob you and call it a day. I've cancelled the "iFood Club" payments twice already, both the plan and the automatic payment, and after a month goes by, they charge the account once again. Of course, there is no refund because "it was made through an automatic payment". There is also no customer service to talk about this either.

A bad app for tourists, first thing, they don't accept my Italian credit card, despite the fact that when I go to the restaurant and pay with my card, it works well, but when I order delivery through the app, it doesn't accept my card. Secondly, most of the restaurants on the app require CPF! I am a tourist, why would I get a CPF? Am I not allowed to order food delivery?! A useless app.

This app just don't work with my Moto G4 Plus. Keeps lagging and when I needed help to solve a address problem, the app just can't make a chat with me and the restaurant. Seriously, ANNOYING! I'm not going to use it anymore. And even some friends say that the percentage that you pay for IFood don't worth the time you're not spending going to the restaurant to buy. Some foods literally double the price just because the IFood cut. Isn't IFood's fault? I'm not so sure! A lower cut isn't better? Bye

The app does the bare minimum. But the prices of the restaurants are robbing people blind. Uninstalling, things are way, way, way too expensive. Plus the delivery rate of R$ 30 or above, it's too much for 2 or 3 km. Also, they charge your card before the food comes and don't deliver it. The delivery rate is sometimes more expensive than the food itself. Also, no international credit cards and phone numbers are accepted, not to mention CPF or CNPJ, not everybody has those. So, bye-bye.

Completely worthless! If you don't have a number in Brazil not allowed to use the app. Shocking that in a place like Rio they wouldn't let tourists order food for delivery. We don't have cars. Of course we want to order food for delivery! What a terrible business decision. Don't download the app.

Horrible experience for foreigners. I spent over an hour researching and setting up a complicated order. When my cart was full I tried to check out and none of the payment options would work without a Brazilian citizen number. I'm not a Brazilian! Such a waste of time.

too expensive, few cupons, I just don’t use Uber eats because it hasn't gotten well yet in my town. All the fees are higher than 10 reais and every thing is more expensive than in other food apps... I hope never have to use this app again , too expensive here in brazil, like everything else. Thos app must work nicely up in rich countries, but in junk countries like mine this app works awfully.

Good app, but no way to order with a phone number from outside of Brazil and asked to confirm the contact number even though a Brazilian phone number was provided. No way for a foreigner to have a CPF as well. Please make the account creation and ordering process simpler and more intuitive.

Payment online from an international card doesn't work even with a CPF, google pay doesn't work, if I filter payments on delivery it still gives a list of restaurants that won't accept that option. You loose so much time with this app. It has potential to be good because rappi's platform is awful (same restaurant won't have half the products) and uber eats no longer works in Brasil. They have potential to completely corner the market, but they don't want to get paid so rappi is the only choice left.

The app is really great when it comes to make ordering food easy. But there is an issue that is making me migrate to other services: I keep constantly getting notifications that a coupon os available, just to find out that there is nothing on the app, baiting me.

I actually don't know why I gave so many chances to this app. First of all their coupons are definitely a lie. Never works, has a lot restrictions. Second: tell me who is your software engineering because the payment method never works. This app was good only to fill my cellphone memory. Completely unsatisfied!

title: Mercado Pago: cuenta digital
description: With the Mercado Pago digital account you can always keep your money safe, in addition to having a line of credit, make payments and transfers online immediately from your cell phone. Enjoy the benefits of a digital account in Mercado Pago! Ask for a free card and without annuity! Use the virtual card to make purchases online and in physical stores. If you also want a physical card, request it through the app, and we will send it to your home for free! Withdraw cash with your card in supermarkets and at ATMs throughout the country. You can also get a line of credit to pay for services, recharge your cell phone and buy in Mercado Libre. Know the advantages of Mercado Pago: Daily returns: Generate daily returns on your account, it's simple and you activate it through the app. Transfer money with a debit card or money in an account and cash in stores. Digital account With the Mercado Pago digital account, it is much easier to pay bills, recharge your cell phone and make transfers to any bank or to whomever you want, receive payments online and take care of your finances. Make all your transfers from one place. Take care of your personal finances The digital account works like a virtual wallet that allows you to make payments, avoiding paperwork and saving time. • Start paying bills and services from the app. • Have the facility to pay services with QR code or payment link and transfer money between accounts. • You can use many alternatives to pay for your purchases: with a top-up balance in your Mercado Pago account, credit, debit or rechargeable card, cash with transfer, bank deposit or request a line of credit. • Request a physical card or a free virtual card, without paying an annuity or issuance. • Make purchases online or pay in up to 12 fixed monthly installments with Mercado Credito, without using a credit card. • Recharge cell phones and MI cards. • Enjoy the benefits of Mercado Puntos: discounts on purchases, free shipping, easy returns and more. • With your digital account you can also obtain a line of credit to make payments with QR, recharges, pay for services and purchases in Mercado Libre, using your money as you need. See your business grow From now on, you choose how to charge! Receive payments however you want - payments with QR code, payment link through social networks or web, payments with the Point card reader - and start selling online and in person. • Acquire the Point card reader to sell, collect and receive payments. • Charge with QR code or payment link for WhatsApp, social networks, chats and more. • Charge by card without paying fixed costs. • Offers the customer the possibility of transferring money and paying through the app to your digital account. • Take the opportunity to increase your sales:: with the Point card reader, you can receive secure payments online, collect payments and improve your finances. • If you wish, with Mercado Crédito you can access a loan to boost your business. You order it 100% online, without formalities or paperwork and the money is deposited instantly in your digital account. Get ready to sell more with Mercado Pago! You can sell online or in person and charge the way you want. Start receiving payments with Point or via transfer, directly into your online account. Choose the Point card reader for your business by going to www.mercadopago.com.mx. * Product available only for the Metropolitan Area of ​​CDMX.
descriptionHTML:
With the Mercado Pago digital account you can always keep your money safe, in addition to having a line of credit, make payments and transfers online immediately from your cell phone. Enjoy the benefits of a digital account in Mercado Pago!

Ask for a free card and without annuity! Use the virtual card to make purchases online and in physical stores. If you also want a physical card, request it through the app, and we will send it to your home for free!

Withdraw cash with your card in supermarkets and at ATMs throughout the country.

You can also get a line of credit to pay for services, recharge your cell phone and buy in Mercado Libre.

Know the advantages of Mercado Pago:

Daily returns: Generate daily returns on your account, it's simple and you activate it through the app. Transfer money with a debit card or money in an account and cash in stores.

Digital account
With the Mercado Pago digital account, it is much easier to pay bills, recharge your cell phone and make transfers to any bank or to whomever you want, receive payments online and take care of your finances. Make all your transfers from one place.

Take care of your personal finances
The digital account works like a virtual wallet that allows you to make payments, avoiding paperwork and saving time.
• Start paying bills and services from the app.
• Have the facility to pay services with QR code or payment link and transfer money between accounts.
• You can use many alternatives to pay for your purchases: with a top-up balance in your Mercado Pago account, credit, debit or rechargeable card, cash with transfer, bank deposit or request a line of credit.
• Request a physical card or a free virtual card, without paying an annuity or issuance.
• Make purchases online or pay in up to 12 fixed monthly installments with Mercado Credito, without using a credit card.
• Recharge cell phones and MI cards.
• Enjoy the benefits of Mercado Puntos: discounts on purchases, free shipping, easy returns and more.
• With your digital account you can also obtain a line of credit to make payments with QR, recharges, pay for services and purchases in Mercado Libre, using your money as you need.

See your business grow
From now on, you choose how to charge! Receive payments however you want - payments with QR code, payment link through social networks or web, payments with the Point card reader - and start selling online and in person.

• Acquire the Point card reader to sell, collect and receive payments.
• Charge with QR code or payment link for WhatsApp, social networks, chats and more.
• Charge by card without paying fixed costs.
• Offers the customer the possibility of transferring money and paying through the app to your digital account.
• Take the opportunity to increase your sales:: with the Point card reader, you can receive secure payments online, collect payments and improve your finances.
• If you wish, with Mercado Crédito you can access a loan to boost your business. You order it 100% online, without formalities or paperwork and the money is deposited instantly in your digital account.

Get ready to sell more with Mercado Pago! You can sell online or in person and charge the way you want. Start receiving payments with Point or via transfer, directly into your online account.

Choose the Point card reader for your business by going to www.mercadopago.com.mx.

* Product available only for the Metropolitan Area of ​​CDMX.
summary: Your account to pay with a QR code, have a line of credit, a card and more

scraped_reviews.content: Great app but the new interface after the update is absolutely terrible. It completely bloated the original clean and efficient interface with useless ads and flourish, you could simply open the app and pay something with a single touch to scan codes, now you have to navigate multiple pages just to do the same. Don't change what already worked, this is a digital bank app not a kid's game menu, stop adding useless stuff. Wish I could remove the update to have the app back to normal...

Forced me to use biometry, dark patterns to push credit card, excessive notifications, multiple processes get stuck on infite loops. It is not on par with the rest of mercado libre. The UI is cluttered and have too many calls to action.

Positives: 1. Transfer the money to the app and it immediately starts earning daily interest Negatives: 1. App prompts saying it needs Play Services (though it still opens without it) 2. App refuses to open if you don't put a lock screen password, PIN or other methods 3. App makes connections to Facebook domains for some reason (privacy concern)

Mercado Pago is awesome! I Completely recommend to download this App, as well as Mercado Libre App. They give you the best value and worth for your money, and have the best of the best deals on such a diverse and wide variety of products, merchandise and financial services. Your money is worh every single peso! 💵💳👌🏻. Way Two Thumbs Up! 👍🏻👍🏻. Thank you very much, Mercado Pago and Mercado Libre! 🙏🏻😃

MercadoPago força a ativação da tela bloqueada aos usuários, algo que nenhum outro aplicativo bancário faz, já que tudo o que pedem é a senha. Esse PIN/Padrão imposto a nós é extremamente irritante. It forces locked screen on users, something any other bank app doesn't do when all they ask for is one's password. This PIN/Pattern forced on us is extremely annoying.

I've been accepting payments with Sr. Pago for the last 7 years with no issue. I wanted a more professional terminal and thought to try MP. It's been a disaster from day 1. They call me daily, apparently nothing works, theres a pending block on the account that hasn't actually happened but they sure do want to tell me about it every day. Total disaster.
counterintuitive if you just want to do one thing (sell a couple of things) and many bugs to open and manage it
the best app to buy things and helps you out with the payment, it really help me to get anything I wish it's really helpful
the app is beautiful, that's the best UI I've seen in a long time! congratulations to the engineering team
It's a very good application, the transactions are really fast, thank you mercado pago.
it is better than I thought it was the simple fact that the money keeps growing just for having it there should be the only reason you need to go ahead and do this thing.

Actual rating 0 ⭐ 🤪 App only fully functional for DNI card holders. ​With my C.E. ID, I'm unable to use the funds in my account. The platform is functionally incapable of recognizing any other Peruvian ID other than DNI. Customer service repeatedly refuses direct access to my funds, and only offers a risky, discriminatory "solution" to transfer my funds to another person's account who has a DNI. This has caused a significantly unacceptable banking inconvenience, and experience.
excellent 👌 service everything comes right always love it!
Ableist app wouldn't provide an alternative to facial auth and I had an ACV on January.
best app really easy and fast
the app is good, it would be nice if it was a sofipo or a traditional bank but it's good overall.

Has a problem with Cedulas de Extranjeria and constantly wants me to fix data that's already correct. In some parts of the system, it assumes that your data is wrong and you must actually have a Cedula de Ciudadania, which it then can't confirm because it doesn't exist. The app is useless for me until they fix this programming "assumption". (You know what happens when you "assume" in English, right?)

The app seems to mix languages occasionally. For example: the My Money screen usually shows "Meu Dinheiro" as expected, but sometimes shows "Tu Dinero" (although the rest of the screen is in Portuguese, the expected language). A simple solution for this issue would be a language option within the app (something that is really missing from the vast majority of apps nowadays).

Platform is unstable. Have money from credit card charge that was not reembursed to credit card but the amount was sent to mercado Pago and now can't transfer the money to my banks accounts. Besides that, in (failed/denied by their platform) processing stages they charge a fee to give your money back... Emailing them 3 times already and they/staff/AI or whatever don't read the previous data and proof attachments. I guess they don't care in customer service or solutions to their platform issues

Terrible, you need to specify a great number of terms and conditions, it is important that you let people know, what kind of cards you accept, and witch kind you don't, I've been trying to get in touch with an employee for 2 weeks now, and all I get is he same link that doesn't work. Wouldn't recommend absolutely anyone to download this app.

Although a digital bank, it doesn't save the complete history of transactions except for the last year. Should you need to complain about a transaction older than one year you won't be able to do it, and Mercado Pago will not facilitate anything, even in cases of a mediation through the COPREC. In Argentina, e-books are tax free, exempt by law of the "Impuesto PAIS" and "Percepción Impuesto RG AFIP 4518". Mercado Pago charges them nonetheless, and it does not register the transactions with AFIP.

got my Debit Card renewed, got the details into the app, made a purchase and everything went smoothly, 3 days later I got 4 a notification for 4 different transactions from my bank, all from this app and not even duplicates since they all were for different amounts... got my data out and had to replace my new debit card again beware.

The app is easier to use than Banorte and Banamex (Mexico). I have never had an issue and transfers are so easy to do. Has a lot of functions such as being able to save accounts you transfer to. I never had an issue receiving the card. I have personally never had an issue YET although family and friends who have, have told me support sucks.

Definitely would NOT recommend if you are an expat. The identification system is set up for nationals. If there's an issue expats need to prove identity with your passport and curp. If your American bank credit card is not listed on THEIR list refunds are impossible.. I had a go through my American bank to finally get a refund on a cancelation. This is NOT EBAY equivalent or Amazon.

THE WORST CUSTOER SERVICE, AVOID!! I have been trying for 4 weeks to be able to spend or refund my credit, but their system will not let me. They keep telling me to fill out a verification form, which assumes i am a politician or related to one... I am not. I have explained that there is a system problem, but they still keep telling me to fill out this form online that says I'm a politician. This is the STUPIDIST information loop. there is no one to actually fix my problem.
the best way to send and receive money, lot of promotions too, bills paying and more.

Generally works well. Also, the service is trustworthy. My problem is with the app itself. It mixes different languages in the same screen but my main problem is the following: every other time it asks for my device's authentication it freezes* the whole device and forces me to restart. Either it's not reading the return of the authentication or it's not telling the OS to stop asking for it. Other apps ask for the same authentication and never have this problem. *By freezing I mean that it makes

Generally works well. Also, the service is trustworthy. My problem is with the app itself. It mixes different languages in the same screen but my main problem is the following: every other time it asks for my device's authentication it freezes* the whole device and forces me to restart. Either it's not reading the return of the authentication or it's not telling the OS to stop asking for it. Other apps ask for the same authentication and never have this problem. *By freezing I mean that it makes it impossible to do anything else on the device because the authentication screen stays on top of everything else, even after inputting valid fingerprints or the correct password. Attempting to close the app or to back out of the authentication doesn't work.

It offers discount to stimulate the usage, but when it doesn't work properly, no one helps. Several times I asked for support due to an error in the app and everytime I received the exactly same predetermined answer. There is no attention to the customer individual needs.

good discounts nonetheless if they charge you a different amount you have to wait a long long time before getting an answer. After that issue of clicking one of the offers you show in one of your 758 notification a day and charged me the full amount with no discount not pretty convinced about using this app. Already 15 days past no answer yet
facial recognition is incredibly terrible.

I did a purchase in an external web app, with a mercado pago link. There was a 20% discount with MasterCard which was not applied. The best part is there is absolutely not way of starting a complaint. Worst customer service. I won't be using it anymore.

I can't use the app at all. After the login it gives me a message that there is no internet connection and the image of a cat which broke the antenna of the router (I found it funny though). Anyway, the problem is not my internet connection as this is the only app I'm not able to use.

The app signed me out with no reason. It did not accept my phone number as login. The captcha to tell I'm not a robot are the worst I've ever seen. The app lost my transaction history. It couldn't process a payment, told me to wait for the accreditation but does not show it in the "services" tab. *EDIT* And support is awful. Trying to change my mind without hearing me out. Asking me to share private information on social media.

After receiving a notification from this app and clicking it the app opened a fingerprint read request which I tried to turn down by closing trying the app. However , the app crashed my phone as the app's finger print request froze my screen. Not even after I turned the screen off and logged in to my phone again the screen was still frozen by this mercado Pago app. One must disable all notifications from this app as they may crash and you will have to restart the phone.

Can't even open. The app says that they need to validate some information, then it shows a message saying that "we couldn't check my information (I didn't even give any information), try again" and gets stuck there in an infinite loop.

The app is giving all kinds of errors and I'm not able to pay my bills because of those errors. When I go to the "help" section, it also gives an error. There's nowhere for me to talk to someone to try and fix those problems, so I'm writing this message hoping for help. And yes, the app is updated.

It always worked well but after the latest update it started giving me problems with digital purchases. They say the site received my payment, the money leaves my balance but I never receive what I bought. And worst part? Non-physical purchases are NOT protected against these issues.
I love Mercado Pago México, because it has a practicity to use your debit money and yields at the same time. It's awesome.
It asks you to update it right when you open it and need to use it. Ain't nobody got time for that
I think everyone should try having a chance to check out mercado pago I like it because they give you advice on all the moves that you try to do before you do then to save money
Super user friendly and very convenient as per how to manage your money and loans!! Thumbs up for you Mercado Pago👍👍

This is a great app to be able to manage your money. It makes it easy to pay your bills or personal shopping. I highly recomend it the only struggle that I've had at the moment is on recivng the fisical card. It says 5 business days aprox and it's been over a month and it hasent arrived yet. Other than that its an awsome app

The app works fine for transfers, but the LOUD sound it makes every time you make a new transfer is unbearable. There’s no option to lower the volume or mute it, and it’s incredibly disruptive. It’s frustrating that there’s no way to customize or disable this notification sound. Until this is fixed or made configurable, I’m giving it 1 star. Please address this ASAP

The app is a scum. At any moment they can start additional "Verification" and block your balance with no withdrawal option. I see the same "Wait 48 hours" message for two months. The support doesn't work, they just quote FAQ.

Terrible, doesn't matter how many times I ask them to solve their problems, they never do. I tried to create an account, always shows that something is going wrong, and that the problem is in their system, however, one month later and I still can't create my account.

Terrible, they cancel what u buy and then don't give money back because they send it to this app so if u can't get it u are done,... It's creepy, careful with payment if u have any problem with this app u will have problems with getting money back!!! Very bad app, doesn't let me in, shos an error, I mean,not good way of managing money

Very annoying that it asks for a review multiple times as I am navigating the app and does not give you an option to decline. It should at least limit it to once a day when you first open the app. Very unprofessional, spammy behavior

I bought an item that was not as described but the refund was made into Mercado Pago, even though I did not request that. So I registered so I could then transfer the refund to my ban account but the problem is that the app will not recognise me in the security checks. My RUT seems to cause no problems so I guess it's the facial recognition that fails. I've tried over ten times now and it never succeeds. I begin to suspect this is a deliberate way to retain my cash and wil take legal advice soon

the mercado libre app is forcing you to install this app to access your acct. it ask you to scan a QR code that lands you Mercado pago. this does not feel good because I don't have plan to use mercado pago at this time.

title: Zalo
description:
Zalo is a messaging application that provides fast, stable, convenient, and private connection for users anytime, anywhere.  

Fast and stable 
    Messages, calls, images, high-quality files... is promptly and stably delivered in any conditions and contexts.  

Simple and convenient 
    A simple interface that is easy to use for all. 
    A multi-functional app supporting text message, voice, stickers, pictures, audio call, video call, 1-1 connection, group chat, file sending, screen capture...for various use case. 
    Easily accessible from multiple platforms such as phone, desktop, or website. 
    Enjoy sharing and saving beautiful moments with your family, your beloved friends on Zalo Timeline 

Privacy Priority 
    Users' privacy is upheld and protected with end-to-end encryption,disappearing messages, instant recall messages …  
    Users actively control permission to friend requests, receiving messages and calls, following Timeline...  
    The violation reporting mechanism helps protect users when using the Zalo app 

Extra helpful utilities 
    Effortlessly scan, store your QR 
    Promptly access to public services 
    Connect and support community in emergency situation. 

Activate Zalo now to connect and chat  with your friends now!
