scraped_reviews.content: Worse... App... Ever! I don't use this app but I had people ask if I can help. Nope! I almost threw the phone in frustration. Main issue is getting the verification code that never arrives! If I can't get pass that, how am I supposed to register for an account. And recovering password. Mind as well just give up and use another app that is user friendly.

This app has so many problems. Notification issues are a constant annoyance. Voice call quality is so poor it is honestly unusable. Regardless of whether you're connected to WiFi or cellular data, the call quality is shockingly bad. Calls drop suddenly, and one person nearly always has a "poor connection quality" warning during the call. Using a different device doesn't solve anything either. Unfortunately,Zalo has a monopoly in the Vietnamese market, so they can get away with terrible products.

Application had problem that I could see incoming calls only when application is opened. So I reinstalled the application to fix this bug. As result my 3 last months messages history was lost! Because it was exactly 3 month ago when I backed up messages on old phone to migrate to a new phone. No any warning was showed to me that I might loose the chat history when deleting it in Play Store. Besides the recent 3-6 months of history must be saved on the server automatically in all modern chat app.

I enjoyed using the app for a couple of years until my account was locked for suspicious activity. Needing to verify my identity from the US is impossible. contacting support does nothing since I can't send them a message, and there is no response to my emails.

Before it was good but now it becomes terrible. Because they disable or delete accounts without any reason. If we need to register, we need to send SMS by paying international SMS charges for people from other countries. Before they used to allow registration of new accounts with an OTP but now they screwed the system. I guess they're blindly following Kakao talk. Because Vietnam people blindly follow Koreans. Kakao talk app also sucks. They implemented something and zalo is blindly following it

account lost unable to log back in, unable to get verification code from SMS , unable to recovery family and friend contact from vietnam, unable to call zalo support. account was hacked or remove by zalo and i can not get it back, tried every thing but still not working. i believed zalo is stealing family and friend information from user then use them to scam user family and friend in vietnam. i will have to report google play apps. this zalo app have took all of my family and friend contact.
I set up the English language. but still receive notifications in Vietnamese. and messages from zalo in Vietnamese... well either install the translator or use my settings for everything in the app.

what a scam, requesting money for a verification code to register. took my money twice and didn't give me the code. The funniest thing is to contact them about your issues you need to pay even more money
maybe don't send notifications on things like a Contacts birthday, or at least make it that you can filter this kind of nonsense... if zalo wasn't required in this region I would uninstall.
you'd be a fool to even consider giving this app any rating higher than 2 stars. Just poor functionality all around, won't go into details since you can't cure a hunchback.
If you buy a simcard and the number is already used for a zalo account you are stuck. You will not be able to create an account. So be lucky.

✨Feedback: In the Create Reminder feaure, It's currently only possible to scroll day by day to select a date, without an option to quickly choose by month/year. This becomes inconvenient when setting reminders far in the future (several months or even a year ahead). 🎍Suggestion: Please add an option to select month/year directly or tisplay a monthly calendar view to make it easier for users
app is pretty good, always improve the app through each patch, except the function to record the call while calling is not available at the moment. Wish Zalo to add this feature soon. Overall 4/5
Many times it doesn't give notifications when the phone is locked this should be fixed its important to have notifications on time
terrible experience even before I could get into the app. slow captcha, can't detect the slider even if right on top. requires international SMS. I'm out. adios
1)doesn't allow to create next line, for Android users. 2) would be a 5 star if it has a Translate function for communication.
Lagging video call and it made phone heated up so bad. Video loads so slow
Stop with the annoying notification! Even "mute" doesn't work
I'm from Malaysia can't install the Apps. the verification by msg and call it's not working my ultra S24

It is an amazing app. The only problem is that every 2 days, my account gets disabled and I have to verify my account. So basically I can't use it until the verification is approved, it happened once and I was like okay that's okay. But then now it is the 4th time happening and it is super frustrating as it is affecting my work, as my schedules pop up on zalo. Now with being disabled every 2 days. It is costing me my job. I really hope the zalo team can look into this problem and sort it out.
Great app. I am using it everyday. I wish Zalo had a Translate button in the chat box for communication with/for foreigners.

Using too much ram and bad at video chat with bad or good wifi My tablet have 12GB of ram only the system only take 3.5 ram but zalo take 4 or 5 ( with video calling ) . And so bad at design and too much that my eye couldn't handel it And make video call bad when my wifi is the 6 gen And adding stranger in my people list.

I am very annoyed with Zalo. I broke my phone, and I was phoneless for a few months, and when I eventually got a new phone I tried to log back in only to find that Zalo has deleted my account? This mean I have lost contact with many of my good friends who I will most likely never cross paths with again, and I only had access to them via Zalo. Why would you delete an account after being inactive for a few months? This is so frustrating. No other messaging app does this. Very bad. 👎
Very few issues setting it up. Some of the fetures are not as user friendly but very manageable. I use it to communicate with some friends who live in Vietnam.

Am I the only one experiencing this error in creating account stating that I need to call hotline number for OTP? and when I do, the call automatically ended. I already submitted a ticket a bunch of times and even emailed you guys but still there's no progress at all. I even tried installing your apps older version both in pC and mobile phone, but it does not process. In addition, your website doesn't even have an option for it. What do you expect me to do? I really need to register for work.🥺
trashed features delete people's message and don't allow them to never, ever looking it back from new device

Extremely poor user journey design. To register you need to enter verification code. You can only receive code by an automated voice call. The call is only in the language of the country of the number you are registering with. So if you are travelling somewhere where you don't speak the local language (i.e. 90%+ of all travel), you can't register for the app using a local SIM. Genius!

Crazy how they automatically delete your account for just 45 days of inactivity. For god's sake, just make it so it is left there even after this inactivity! Plus, you literally have to call a foreign number (mostly not from your country) in order to register again and receive a verification code for that, instead of just an SMS message. Ridiculous.

When I first installed it about a month ago the Nearby feature worked great. After about a week it no longer works consistently. Sometimes it finds a lot of people, sometimes it can't find anyone. Since the problems started, when I use the Nearby feature I can't find anyone in HCM City and sometimes it doesn't work for Hanoi. Outside those two cities it works great though. I tried reinstalling the app on a different phone but no change. I hope they can eventually fix the Nearby feature.
Weak, slow, and delayed notifications.
This app so bad, can't even save old messenger like FB Messenger or another messenger app. My old phone is dead and now this app want me open up my phone for backup messenger. What a stupid app ever.
have tried several times to register an account, but not once has the verification code from zalo arrived. preventing new users from joining is a strange way to run a social media company.

App lỗi ko fix, dùng 1 ngày lỗi 2 lần quá chán. App bị lỗi bong bóng chat kèm theo ko bật đc bàn phím). Zalo làm app ngày càng đi xuống, đề nghị xem và fix lại app cho người dùng (tôi đang sài s24ultra)........ The app has many bugs (like i have white screen at chat bubble and i can't turn on keyboard) and is not fixed. It's so annoying to use it twice a day. Zalo's app is getting worse and worse. Please review and fix the app for users (I'm using the app on s24 ultra).

Try sending more than two pictures with captions at once. You can't. Try sending more than a few photos at once, even without captions. You can't. "Only jpeg, jpg, and PNG are supported." Unless you try again with fewer pictures, then it's fine. Sometimes. And each time one of your pictures is rejected by Zalo you have to scroll all the way back through your gallery to find it and try resending it. Sometimes it will send, sometimes it will tell you it's not a jpg, jpeg, or png. Infuriating.

I don't know whether it's only my zalo app had problems or others too, but since middle July this year, I cannot download any files or images that people sending to me. This is becoming trouble to my life. My scholarship letter, my family images, my subjects files,...,. all cannot download. Fix those bugs. 3 stars was my polite.
Decent messaging app. There's support section, but no real support. Important features are behind a paywall (which sucks). Overall it's still smooth.
due to security reasons, I cannot login with the pass, it is not because your security is good it is cuz the service is worse!
Despite spending multiple times verifications SMS, Zalo app still claimed didn't receive my SMS code verification. Please advice how to activate my Zalo account!
very bad. can not create new account. have to pay 5k for new account. forget it. there are plenty of choices out there
All good but translate option is not working on my s22 ultra

Keep showing Error code 50002, No network connection. I have very good network connection of mobile and wifi both. still it receives, send messages in zalo. But when i am on homepage, it shows connecting to the network continuously and i can't add friends or do anything except sending and receiving messages. No one replied me on my email. I already send few emails along with screenshots, log files to you. I guess you didn't check or have time to look in to your inbox
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear
For your convenience, please provide screenshot of the error and your Zalo activation number as messages to Android Support OA ( on tab More, select Settings > About us > Online Support ), or email us at: hotro@zaloapp.com, so that we can clarify the issue and help you with your problem. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Since the last update, it continues to glitch whenever I open a chat. It is impossible to write and/or to read messages. I contacted the support via email and asked for help. However, on the contrary of others developers team, they do not reply in a short time. In fact, I sent them an email 1 week ago and I have not received an answer yet.

If you play a voice message, is sounds from the earpiece (so quiet), but if you put the phone to your ear, it switches to speakerphone (so loud). If you pull away, it switches back to earpiece (too quiet). Zalo ignores volume settings. If you connect BT headphones, it's silent while playing and you can't hear it on any speaker or headset. I think the devs must use WhatsApp so they have no idea how bad they failed

I'm installing the app for the second time after almost a year. Previously it was available to find a friend and request by their name card (username), but this is not working anymore other than finding them just by phone number or QR code. That's obviously a huge weakness. I hope the team works on it.

It always ask for mobile phone verification every single time I use my Laptop instead of the phone. But it doesn't automatically sync my messages which should have been a basic feature in all messaging apps. The default settings are absolutely horrible,automatically downloads every file under a certain amount of storage regardless of your permission, eats up alot of storage, lacks a lot of QoL features like dark mode. It just underwhelming, I dont get why it's the main messaging app in Vietnam.

Messages on PC are not same as phone. How is that possible ????? It doesn't happen that with any other apps when using desktop Mode. Very difficult to understand how can be possible that some messages are missed?? Lot of work needed in the background as the basics are not covered, even it has other great functions. I would also remove the function of the bubble at the front when receiving a message as this is annoying

Great and useful app for Vietnamese and who live in Vietnam. However, if there are some functions from the phone updated like the web/PC app that could be more perfect. Moreover, maybe should be upgraded to connect with email, it could be easier to the foreigner 😍😍 and this app is not notified in foreign country. I didnt receive any notification from my friends and family when I was abroad. Anyway, you did a great job, Zalo teams. P/s: Please reply in english to the foreigner comments 😁

Was excellent up until recently. Now 'Nearby' search function doesn't work at all, even with 'Improved Accuracy' settings on... Oh well. Edit: I've just found out that Zalo has capitulated to Google's inherently invasive 'location service' which follows your every move. If you don't accept this, then you can't use the 'Nearby' search function.

Great utility features, such as sending large files and HD pictures. HUGE privacy concerns. Zalo is detected to use the camera while running in the back ground -- meaning it secretly harvest your data, the kind of data that you did not give permission to. Zalo default settings make you an easy target for annoying strangers, even creeps. It has too many system-generated spams, like weather updates, petty news... for which you did not subscribe, and cannot unsubscribe. Very annoying.

Gosh, this is the worst communication app that I'm using currently. Someone was able to use my phone number to create an account. I hope they don't have access to my previous messages and contacts! Big privacy concern. -------------------------------------- It's been 2 weeks, and the customer service team still hasn't responded to the email that I sent them.

title: Samsung Music
description:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, AAC, FLAC.
 (Supported file formats may vary depending on the device.)
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
4. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you’ll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

For further inquiries about Samsung Music, please contact us via the following methods.
* Samsung Music App > More (3 dot) > Settings > Contact US
(In order to use the "Contact us" feature, the Samsung Members app must be installed on the device.)

*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. Music and Audio(Storage)
  - Allows storing and playing music and audio files
  - Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. Notifications
  - Provide notifications related to Samsung Music.
3. Phone : Korean devices only.
  - Verify your phone when using the music service.
descriptionHTML:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, AAC, FLAC.
(Supported file formats may vary depending on the device.)
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
4. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you’ll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

For further inquiries about Samsung Music, please contact us via the following methods.
* Samsung Music App > More (3 dot) > Settings > Contact US
(In order to use the "Contact us" feature, the Samsung Members app must be installed on the device.)

*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. Music and Audio(Storage)
- Allows storing and playing music and audio files
- Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. Notifications
- Provide notifications related to Samsung Music.
3. Phone : Korean devices only.
- Verify your phone when using the music service.
summary: - Music player for Samsung Galaxy series- Supports for Android

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes it doesn't work very well. Bare with me, my issues are kind of specific- in the Artists tab, I can no longer select a letter on the side to skip to that place in the artist list. A couple of my albums are inaccessible throught the albums tab, but can be located via recently added or by artist. Any albums with strange fonts or symbols all show up as "???" and it doesn't look very pleasing in the app, and finally sometimes it doesn't remember where I was paused in a song. Edit: got worse

At first the app was good, especially with sorting things out, but NOW it doesn't really want to do that anymore. Ever since the update, it made organizing harder. I have a few albums that has over 90 songs that I decide to put in that album. I went to update a song to go to that album, and it just doesn't. It kept separating from the album, and the only way to fix this is to update the songs in the album with the SAME name in order for it to go in. It makes sorting music a tedious task.

4/25/25: Had to decrease it to one star. I just got a new device & the app hasn't acted right ever since. It continually skips songs with the error msg "failed to play track", sometimes it'll play another song right after & sometimes it won't. I'm not happy about it. Plus, I just learned playlists can only have 1000 songs! Not enough for real music lovers like myself. Very disappointing!

I don't care about Album art displayed. I just listen to the music in Playlists. I have them sorted by artists, music groups, years, decades, and more. Easy app to create Playlists in and are easy-to-use. What I have is a continuing problem, an intermittent garbled sound between songs. It comes and goes. Otherwise, what more can you ask for?

Samsung music is a basic player. it does the job without craming ads down your throat. I literally have never seen an ad since iv started using it years ago. I do wish that it would auto scroll when viewing lyrics while a song is playing. other than that its solid player. I have tried looking for a replacement. but others hit you up with ads or they have features i just don't need.

It's a solid app. No ads or major issues from my experience. I love that it tells you the most listened tracks, artists and albums. Would love to see It give more stars. I would rate it a 5/5 if it had some more features. Here are some recommendations: - Search for tracks/artists within a Playlist - Allow us to add a track to more than 1 Playlist at a time. - Better Playlist organization like folders - More visual costumization of interface. - Mata data edits. Don't abandon this app!

This use to be my goto app, but now it's just terrible. The app is now disorganized like when I update my folder, for some reason the update does not put the band on its rightful name file, it will be on a separate file with the exact same name with no changes. And what bother some for me is that they got rid of a widget that I like for some stupid reason.

Love Samsung Music! I love the fact that I can listen to music without having to connect to the internet and having to watch ads (provided you listen to only mp3's). Samsung, if you're reading this, one suggestion I would like to see implemented in the future is a better and more precise control of crossfading. Instead of just seconds, we should be able to do milliseconds, too. Please consider this as a better option for smooth song transitions!

I really like this app but I am upset about one thing. In one of the last updates there was a change to the background color. It is now white with splotches of colors, that don't even relate to the album cover, or you can change it to dark mode and have it be solid black. I loved the previous version where the background color would change to match colors of the album to the song I was listening to. Please bring that back! That was what made me fall in love with the app in the first place.

I liked this program initially, like other reviewers, but with the pop up ads that you can opt to skip only for 7 days closed the curtain on it. Since I have an expensive phone, you would think this program could continue to be not pop up ads. Disgusted. As soon as i transfer my play lists I'll be deleting it. Oh, and you can't move playlists either, even to another phone same program. So that always sucked.

Useless. All I wanted was to change my default alarm sound instead of having to manually change every single blasted alarm separately. Reddit said download this. Okay. Only one song in the library. Okay. Try to add more. Must download Spotify. Okay, even though I dont use it but I'll download it. Try to select song in the music app again. Opens Spotify. Click the three dots on the top because maybe it has the option there too like this app. No. Useless. Waste of time. 0 stars tbh.

So far so good. My only complaint is that it doesn't let you see the songs that are coming up. I like to just hit random but I need to see if the next songs are in the vein that I'm wanting to hear. I don't want to be listening to mellow tunes & then suddenly get blasted with Rob Zombie, whom I love but not when I'm in a mellow mood. Give us a way to delete songs from the upcoming random playlist.

I wish I hadn't downloaded the new update. I like this app, but they just made it harder to use with the new update. I can no longer tap the letters in the library, can only drag. And they got rid of the button to change album artwork from the album. I have to go into every individual song now and put it in, which wastes more time. I really wish there was also a way where I could modify the info for multiple tracks at once, because putting it individually takes a long time. Just my 2 cents.

I would have never thought that I would leave a review on an actual Samsung app - maybe a 3rd party app, but not one that comes pre-installed on a flagship phone (S9+). The recent update now contains ADS on your track listing amidst your songs, which is disgusting. I'd expect that from some free game you install to pass the time, but not on Samsung Music. For one of the top manufactures that charges $1,000+ for a device, I'd expect a bit more class. Horrible decision. Samsung sucks for this one.

Was the best. WAS. Now it's showing advertisements. Hell no. I didn't spend 1500 on a device to have to see advertising on a stock application. Samsung, you've pissed off a lot of people, and lost a few over it. Myself included. Since the original Note, I've been a fan, but I draw the line here. No more Sammy products for me. Now I'm half expecting my fridge to start showing ads. Hard pass, thanks but no thanks.

Been using Samsung music for years. Recently within the last year or so, sound only plays on the left earbud. Every other app I use, I have no problem, Netflix, YouTube, Firefox, everything is fine. But as soon as I open Samsung Music, the right earbud stops working. If another application makes my earbud make a sound while the music is playing, like messenger, the right earbud will work for the rest of that song, but then stops working as soon as the next song plays. Very frustrating.

I've used this app for years. It still has it's quirks but overall is a good player. However, Samsung in its infinite wisdom has choosen to add ads to this app. Either a popup or a banner ad. I don't understand why paying a $1000 (more or less) means they need to generate revenue from this app. It makes me wondee what information they sell from your music library contents. I'm sorry, but if you are going down this road on aspects of your phones I expect a discount in price.

I loved it before they changed the background to white, and got rid of the edge lighting. They could at least give us the option to change it if we want, instead of forcing it on us. - Edit to add - I do like the new dark theme, but I was more fond of the grey background, not just solid black. I would be more than willing to give 5 stars if they brought back the edge lighting as an option.

I used to love this app, but the last update seems to have removed the ability to jump by the alphabet side bar, so I have to scroll to find a song I want to play. Extremely annoying, especially while driving. I am actively trying to find a new app to use because this one just cycles through the same songs over and over, and it's too much work to scroll through and find the song I want when I am driving somewhere. I would go less than one star if I could.

One star, I'd give zero if I could. Not only did they put ads on this app now, but to opt out of them "selling your personal information" is a lengthy complicated process. I can't seem to get any sort of response or verification that my personal info is no longer being sold, so I uninstalled the app. Will no longer be buying Samsung phones or products. This is messed up.

A simple music player: it's easy to navigate and make playlists, and integrates with Spotify. The player is accessible from the lock screen, to pause/play/skip files. I am not a fan of the pink background tho. It's ugly and it can't be changed or turned off. Unable to edit file names or album covers, and unable to reset the cache. Also there isn't a "night mode" anymore. Will use this app until I find something with more customizing power.

I always use this app but with this update or not sure what there is a hug that needs to be fixed ASAP. When I click play it automatically stops and only sometimes works, also when it comes to Bluetooth it stops and when I resume it starts the song all over and stops mid way again. This is the issue I'm having and I've reininstalled, reseted the app, and even restarted/resetted my phone until I found out it's Samsung music the one with the bug. Please fix or give me a solution. I've done all.

Using a Samsung Galaxy A71. After last update, lost the ability to go straight through an album. Even if the shuffle is off, it plays as though set on shuffle. Track by track with the entire library, it plays chronologically, but in an album, it plays everything as random. Really frustrating when you have concept albums that are meant to play in order. Otherwise my favorite music app.

Wish there was a "play next" option instead of having to drag a song from the bottom of a playlist to be the next song. Also, when adding music to a playlist, it would be nice to not be able to select songs that are already on the said playlist so that they are not added again. Other than that, looks great and cool lockscreen. Also very cool that the whole theme changes colors based on the album art.

Update: since the most recent update the last 30s-1m of may songs are being cut off. Will update review if this is ever fixed. The music player is great, although it's missing the feature to select a track to play next. In one of my other favorite music players, Black Player, you can press and hold a track and then select play next from the pop up menu. If the Samsung player had a similar feature, I'd give it five stars.

For some strange reason my songs won't move in my Playlist anymore. I try to move the songs into different orders, but they keep glitching back to the same spot. Plz fix😣 Edit: FIXED thanks guys. Also, the speed when moving songs in the playlist is way too slow, especially if there's lots of songs, if that could be improved, that would be amazing

Albums are completely randomly sorted. Before they were sorted alphabetically, but now there's no rhyme or reason to it.Titles of bands and tracks should not be alphabetized in 'T' if the title includes 'The', etc. "The Beatles" belongs in "B" for "Beatles", not "T" for "The". Albums and artists are frequently split up on the software as well, not sure why. Otherwise, the music player works and I love being able to navigate on the lock screen.

Great music app, but it could use a few tweaks. When u play a track, it has the song title and artist name but it needs the album title as well. Plus when u exit out the app and then go back to it, if I could play the song from where I left off would be great. I like to play my music on shuffle alot of times so I want all my music to play through. I hate when the player stops itself and I have to reshuffle all over again, please fix this. Needs a Shuffle All button as well. I pay $10 a month for Spotify but since it's accessible on this app, could I cancel it or do I have to have the account in order for it to work on the Samsung app?

I really like this app cause I can listen to artists who have digital copies of albums and aren't available on spotify. But there is no way to rearrange the songs in a playlist you create. This sucks for me because I like listening to songs in chronological order as in when the album or EP came out from earliest to latest. It just messes with my brain, and it doesn't feel right listening to albums out of order. I hope you can bring back the rearrange playlist feature.

Good app but after the last update the app picked a album cover from 1 cd and put it as the album cover for songs that's not even the same genre. So I have hundreds of songs with the same album cover. Please fix before I download this next update. You guys shouldn't change anything on the app. It's fine the way it is. Just dont make it pick album covers. Or give an option to set a album cover manually. Thanks.

I'm very upset that there is ads now. I enjoyed the freedom of being able to use a music app that didn't have ads, let you play the song you choose, and was free. It was a great app before. It was definitely one of my favourite music apps beside the LG music apl. This app should be free and come with the phone like the calendar app or the clock app.

I used to love this app. I spent a lot of time creating Playlist for different activities...such as walking, using the hot tub, relaxing....etc. Since the upgrade, half of my music files won't play. The only fix is for me to download a converter and change all my file types. An easier way to do it is to stop using this app. VERY DISAPPOINTING.

I loved this app until it was updated to include ads you could only ignore for 7 days and banner ads IN YOUR MUSIC LIBRARY. I immediately switched to a different music app. I don't understand why Samsung thought this was a good idea when there are so many other alternatives that are free and don't include ads. If anyone is looking for clean alternatives I would recommend Aimp or Musicolet.

Would really appreciate if the app were more up to date with modern competitors. Some features would be great, like having sub-folders for better organization. I also think it's way overdue, but when you go to add a song to a playlist, it would be really nice if it told you whether or not the song was already in there. It's frustrating sometimes adding a song to a playlist and realizing it's already in there after the fact and having to remove one of the instances. Otherwise, pretty alright.

This app has slowly gotten worse as time goes on. First off, it doesn't ignore "The" at the beginning of band names, so they all go under 'T'. Originally, when songs would play it would re-theme the app and edge lighting to match the album art. That got removed in an update. That's all well and good, but this most recent update added advertising. Not just the occasional ad stuck at the top of the tracklist, but also fullscreen popup ads that can only be turned off for 7 days!

I am normally quite happy with the app, but once I turned on the "shuffle" feature, I can't get it to go back to straight play. I play a song, it jumps to another random track once it ends. I hit the shuffle button to turn it off, go to the correct track, it jumps again when the song ends. Rinse, repeat, no change. it doesn't even have an indicator to say if the feature is on. Many albums, that's fine, but if you play an audio book, order matters....

Great app, but the most recent update is a huge bummer on a visual level. I really preferred the black interface and I loved the edge lighting with the color pulled from the album artwork. The white backdrop with what seems to be just random colors is much more jarring when managing my music in the dark before I go to sleep. I wish there were an option to switch to the old interface.

This is my favorite music app because it's clean and simple, and I love the "Most Played" playlist it creates based on the music I listen to the most. I do wish there was an option to remove specific songs from shuffle rotation (so they only play if you actually select that song). That feature is available on other music apps I've used. it would also be great if you could select a custom image for playlist covers, instead of it defaulting to the first album cover in the track list.

Definitely love this app, very easy to use. I don't like that sometimes I have voice notes and it plays in my music. One thing I would love to see is how many times I've listened to a song. I'd also like to see a way to actually choose the color or color range you want the tabs/backgrounds to be like the rest of thebphone options. But that's just me being specific.

I love the simplicity of it i really really do! Ive been using it loyally for quite a while. But i have some concerns that have sent me looking for another player. Whenever i download a song where the title is in another language, the foreign letters show up wrong, and not accurate. i would not be as bothered with this if we had the option to rename our tracks, yet we cannot. If renaming our tracks and renaming artists was available, it would be a lifesaver.

The default Samsung music app used to be good, but it's been ruined by ads and dumb changes (for example, the album art in the selection screen grew so that it's harder to navigate if you have a large collection with no way to change it.) I personally believe that the last good version of the app was 16.2.13.24, and you can ditch the new versions of the app by going to a website like Uptodown and downloading an apk file of an old version. Turn off auto-update, and you're good to go!

Having originally had this on my J7, and now my S7: I can say it has improved greatly over the years! Until last year...when they added spotify. That's not the issue, the issue is it asking you EVERY 7 DAYS to try out spotify premium, even after you tell it NO. There shouldnt be any type of ads on a music service thats PART of your phone. If yall put any, just do banner ads, but please for the love of everything the popup is awful.

Samsung Music is a great app, but I feel like it should be more personalized. We all love dark mode and it should be an option on the app! The removal of it was rather unecessary and brought down the rating. Another thing is the Spotify; it's useless to have it because you have to download it in order to work. My suggestion is that either remove it or allow us to connect our Spotify accounts with it so that we don't need to download the extra app. Lastly, please allow us to change song pictures!

Ever since the most recent software update, random tracks will not play properly. I press play, and the track either does not play at all (stays at 0:00) or will "play" the track with no audio. This happens at random with random tracks. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, which fixed nothing and cost me all of my playlists-some of which I've been curating for years. If I had any other choice of on-device music player I would use it. Please fix this.

I use this app every day to listen to my music while at work. I have a large list of a variety of songs in a specific order, mostly video game sound tracks and instrumental music. The most recent update messed up my playlist and when I tried to fix it I discovered that now when you add songs they are added to top of the list instead of the bottom like every other music app. Instead of being able to easily add the missing songs I had to delete everything and add 700+ tracks in reverse order.

Really loved this app for it's simplicity and usability. Putting ads on the stock music app is, I believe, a poor decision, and a previous reason why I haven't bothered looking at other apps since I assume they'll usually have ads. A pretty "Apple" kind of thing to do and it doesn't feel good, since ads are on everything else and it would be nice to not have them in my personal music collection. A lovely app but the ads do kind of ruin it.

This is a great application, and everything works great, but there's two problems. One, the background color (white) sucks. Don't like it, to bright, even when I lower the brightness of my phone, the white background is still to bright. Is there any way, we can put our own personal background picture. Two, what happen to the edge light? Please fix. Thanks....

This has been my default music player since the s4. And in my opinion the version that comes with the phone is always the best. Everytime time they release an update after they drop a new phone, it ends up being bad. I loved the black background that the phone started off with. And I like that they made the albums easier to read. But like many others have said, that bright white background is damn near a deal breaker.

Liked it much better before the all-white update. What the heck? It was kind of beautiful before with the way it picked up colors from the album cover and flashed them around the edges. Now, it's... White. Very white. No contrast, no night version. White. Good job, programmers. That said, I enjoy this app best of all the music apps I've tried. Lets me play from folders that I've created and named. So I'm still using it. But PLEASE put the old interface back. It was so much better.

Great except for the ads. This app is exactly what I want in a music app, but ad for something I don't want is annoying. Being able to disable it for 7 days is annoying. Believe me you're not going to bug people into getting it. If they wanted it they'd get it, and if they don't, no amount of bugging will make them. Again, the perfect app for those of us with extensive music collections than we've accumulated over years.
